original: prayājādyapūrvāṇi darśapūrṇamāsāpūrvopakāritvāttadhikṛtena puruṣeṇa tatsiddhyarthamuddiśya kriyamāṇānīti yuktaṃ yadasatyapi sākṣānniyojyopādāne  #

original: 'upanīya tu yaḥ śiṣyam' iti ktvāpratyayo hi kathañcit 'darśapūrṇamāsābhyāmiṣṭvetivadasatyapyaṅgāṅgibhāve 'vakalpyate punarvidhānaṃ

na syāt

original: kartrarthatvaṃ ca phalasya kartrabhiprāyatvaṃ natu tatsamavāyaḥ,

original: yacca 'upanītasya vyāpārāpekṣāyāmupanayanaṃ prakramya vihitamadhyayanaṃ tadvyāpāratvenādhyavasīyata' iti,

original: kartavya iti tadāpi spaṣṭamevādhyayanamarthajñānārthatayā vidhatte nādhyāpanaupayikatayā,

na hi atra pratyakṣa ādīni kramante
saṃnidhānāt iti ced

original: na saṃnidhānaṃ nāma svayaṃ pramāṇaṃ śabdasya tvarthaṃ pratipādayataḥ saṃnidhyapekṣāyogyatvānītikarmatavyatā netrasyevonmīlanam /
analyzed: na saṃnidhānam nāma svayam pramāṇam śabdasya tu artham pratipādayataḥ saṃnidhi apekṣā yogya tva anīti karmatavya tā netrasya iva unmīlanam
śabdaḥ ced adhyāpana aupayika tayā vidadhyāt na artha jñāna artha tā sidhyet
atas na upanayana saṃnidhau svādhyāyaḥ dhyetavyaḥ iti vihitasya adhyayanasya upanayana dvāra adhyāpana vidhinā prayukti saṃbhavaḥ
yadi param adhyāpanasya adhyayanam antareṇa asaṃbhavāt tad artha adhyayanam ākṣipyate
tathā asatya vihitena laukikena adhyayanena tad saṃbhavāt na vihitasya adhyayanasya niyogataḥ tad prayuktiḥ
na ca prayukti lāghavāt api vihita upajīvanam
tad upajīvane pi prayukti anavalopāt
vihitam api adhyayanam adhyāpana vidhinā eva tvad mate prayujyate na sva vidhinā
tasmāt laukikam eva adhyayanam upanītānām adhyāpana vidhiḥ ākṣipet
vidhi vihitam adhyayanam para prayukti abhāvāt adhikāram prakalpayet
kiñca yadi upanayanam adhyāpana aṅgam tatas dhyayana vidhiḥ artha jñāna arthaḥ san ādhyāpana artha tayā upanītaiḥ traivarṇikaiḥ saṃbadhyeta
ye dhyāpana artha tayā upanītaḥ traivarṇikāḥ tad upayogi vyāpāram apekṣante te rtha jñāna artham adhīyīran iti a saṃbaddham eva syāt
tatas ca upanītaiḥ asaṃbadhyamānaḥ dhyayana vidhiḥ caturṇām api varṇānām syāt iti śūdra adhikāra prasaṅgaḥ
tasmāt upanītānām prayojana apekṣiṇām adhyayana karaṇikā artha jñāna bhāvanā vidhīyate iti adhyayana aṅgam eva upanayanam
sva vidhi prayuktam ca adhyayanam
prapañcena ayam pakṣaḥ nyāyaratnamālāyām eva nirastaḥ iti aparamyate
tasmāt pūrva uktaḥ eva vicāraḥ kim adṛṣṭa artham adhyayanam uta akṣara grahaṇa ādi paramparayā artha jñāna artham iti
adhyayana vidhi upasaṃhāraḥ
athavā na atra kiñcid vicāryeta
na āvamika nyāyena eva adhyayanasya akṣara saṃskāra ādi paramparayā artha jñāna artha tva siddheḥ

original: navame hi-- sāmnāmṛgakṣarābhivyaktidvāreṇa stutyupayogitvadarśanāttādarthyameva nādṛṣṭārthatvamiti vakṣyate /
analyzed: navame hi sāmnā mṛgakṣara abhivyakti dvāreṇa stuti upayogi tva darśanāt tādarthyam eva na adṛṣṭa artha tvam iti vakṣyate
tena eva nyāyena adhyayanasya artha jñāna artha tva siddheḥ adhyayana anantaram dharma jijñāsā kartavyā iti siddham eva etat prayojana vivakṣayā sūtrakāreṇa ucyate

original: yadāhuḥ-- “dharmākhyaṃ viṣayaṃ vaktuṃ mīmāṃsāyāḥ prayojanam” iti /
analyzed: yat āhuḥ dharma ākhyam viṣayam vaktum mīmāṃsāyāḥ prayojanam iti
nanu atra kaścid veda vākya arthaḥ vicāryate

original: tadapyāhuḥ--“nacātra codanāvyākhyā gauravaṃ tatra coditam” iti tatsiddhamadhyayanānantaraṃ dharmajijñāsā kartavyeti /
analyzed: tat api āhuḥ na ca atra codanā vyākhyā gauravam tatra coditam iti tat siddham adhyayana anantaram dharma jijñāsā kartavyā iti

original: sā caturvidhā-- dharmasvarūpa- pramāṇa- sādhana- phalaiḥ //
analyzed: sā caturvidhā dharmasvarūpa pramāṇa sādhana phalaiḥ
nanu adhyayana vidhinā veda vākya artha vicāra mātra ākṣepāt dharma svarūpa pramāṇa jijñāsayoḥ kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ
ucyate upoddhāta tvāt prasaṅgaḥ

original: yadi hi vedavākyārtho dharmaḥ syādvedaśca pramāṇaṃ tato 'sau vicāraḥ kartavyo bhavati /
analyzed: yadi hi veda vākya arthaḥ dharmaḥ syāt vedaḥ ca pramāṇam vicāraḥ kartavyaḥ bhavati
itarathā kākadanta parīkṣā vat syāt
tad adhyayana vidhiḥ eva pramāṇa ādi vicāram ākṣipati
dharma grahaṇam ca upalakṣaṇa artham adharmasya api hānāya jijñāsya tvāt
akāra praśleṣaṇe vā sūtram adharma jijñāsāyām api vyākhyeyam iti niravadyam
codanā lakṣaṇaḥ rthaḥ dharmaḥ

original: prathamaṃ tāvat ko dharmaḥ kathaṃlakṣaṇakaḥ ityetadvayamanena sūtreṇa śrutyarthābhyāṃ nirūpyate- yo dharmaḥ
analyzed: prathamam tāvat kaḥ dharmaḥ kathaṃlakṣaṇakaḥ iti etat vayam anena sūtreṇa śruti arthābhyām nirūpyate yaḥ dharmaḥ

original: sa yodanālakṣaṇaḥ codanaiva tasya lakṣaṇaṃ pramāṇam /
analyzed: sa yodanā lakṣaṇaḥ codanā eva tasya lakṣaṇam pramāṇam

original: codanā ca tasya lakṣaṇameveti śrutyā pramāṇavidhāvarthāccodanāgamya evāgnihotrādidharmo nātallakṣaṇaścaityavandanādiriti svarūpamapi siddhyati
analyzed: codanā ca tasya lakṣaṇam eva iti śrutyā pramāṇa vidhau arthāt codanā gamyaḥ eva agnihotra ādi dharmaḥ na a tad lakṣaṇaḥ caitya vandana ādiḥ iti svarūpam api siddhi ati
tathā yaḥ codanā lakṣaṇaḥ sa dharmaḥ iti svarūpa vidhau arthat pramāṇa siddhiḥ veditavyā

original: kaścitvāha- kāryarūpo vedārtho na siddharūpa ityetadanena sūtreṇocyate,
analyzed: kaścid tu āha kārya rūpaḥ veda arthaḥ na siddha rūpaḥ iti etat anena sūtreṇa ucyate
codanā lakṣaṇa śabdena kāryam ucyate
dharma śabdena veda arthaḥ iti

original: tadayuktam- yāni tāvadvidhivākyāni teṣāṃ vidhāveva prāmāṇyaṃ vastusvarūpaṃ cāprāmāṇyaṃ vispaṣṭameveti na tatra kiñcidvaktavyam /
analyzed: tat ayuktam yāni tāvat vidhi vākyāni teṣām vidhau eva prāmāṇyam vastu svarūpam ca aprāmāṇyam vispaṣṭam eva iti na tatra kiñcid vaktavyam
kṣepiṣṭa ādi vākyānām api vidhi ekavākyatayā tatra eva prāmāṇyam

original: mantrāṇāmapi prakaraṇena pradhānavidhiśeṣatvaṃ dvitīyapāde vakṣyata iti na tatrāpi vaktavyamasti /
analyzed: mantrāṇām api prakaraṇena pradhāna vidhi śeṣa tvam dvitīya pāde vakṣyate iti na tatra api vaktavyam asti
tena kasya atra siddhārtha tām nirasya kārya artha tā ucyate
avināśī vai are ayam ātmā ityādīnām upaniṣad vākyānām iti ced na
teṣām api yadi vidhi eka vākya tvam asti tatas ūrthavāda adhikaraṇena gatam

original: atha nāsti kathaṃ teṣāṃ kāryārthatā syāt //*//
analyzed: atha na asti katham teṣām kārya artha tā syāt
atha teṣām vidhi aśravaṇa ādi vidhi antareṇa eka vākya tva abhāvāt ca kārya artha tva anupapatteḥ vyutpatti virahāt ca sigaddhi arthe prāmāṇya yogāt aprāmāṇyam eva abhimatam
kim idānīm ātma ādi vākyānām aprāmāṇya pratipādana param idam sūtram

original: suvyāhṛtaṃ tarhi śāstrārambhe prathamaṃ tāvatsūtrakāro 'prāmāṇyameva vedavākyānāṃ pratipādayatīti //*//
analyzed: su vyāhṛtam tarhi śāstra ārambhe prathamam tāvat sūtrakāro prāmāṇyam eva veda vākyānām pratipādayati iti
katham ca kāryam eva prāmāṇyam
tatra eva vyutpatteḥ pravṛtti adhīnā hi vyutpattiḥ

original: sā ca kāryāvagamādhīneti vyutpattirapi tatraiva bhavatīti cet /
analyzed: sā ca kārya avagama adhīnā iti vyutpattiḥ api tatra eva bhavati iti ced

original: avaśyaṃ pravṛttyadhīnaiva vyutpattiḥ- kāṣṭhaiḥ sthālyāmodanaṃ pacatītyādivartamānāpadeśeṣvapi
analyzed: avaśyam pravṛtti adhīnā eva vyutpattiḥ kāṣṭhaiḥ sthālyām odanam pacati ityādi vartamāna apadeśeṣu api

original: atha prathamavyutpattiḥ kāryaviśeṣayaiva- nahi tadā śabdāntaravaśena śabdāntarasyārthe vyutpattiḥ saṃbhavati sarvasya dharmasyāprasiddhatvāditi  #
analyzed: atha prathama vyutpattiḥ kārya viśeṣayā eva nahi tadā śabda antara vaśena śabda antarasya arthe vyutpattiḥ saṃbhavati sarvasya dharmasya aprasiddha tvāt iti
ced
astu evam

original: tathāpi paścādbahuśaḥ siddhārthe śabdaprayogadarśanāt 'ko 'yaṃ rājā' 'pāñcālaḥ' ityādiṣu praśnaprativacanādiṣu kāryasya vyabhicārādavyabhicāryārthamātraṃ  #

vācyam iti sujñānam

original: yathaiva hi kasyāñcidvyaktau prathamaṃ gośabdasya prayogadarśanātsaiva vācyetyavagame
analyzed: yathā eva hi kasyāñcid vyaktau prathamam go śabdasya prayoga darśanāt sā eva vācyā iti avagame

iti adhyavasīyate tathā kārya para tām avagatām api paścāt siddhārtha prayoga darśanena bādhita tva artha mātram eva avyabhicārāt vācyam iti yuktam

original: kiñca prathamavyutpattau katipayānāmeva śabdānāṃ kāryārthatvamavagataṃ na sarvaśabdānāṃ paurvāparyaniyamo 'sti,
analyzed: kiñca prathama vyutpattau katipayānām eva śabdānām kārya artha tvam avagatam na sarva śabdānām

original: ataḥ sarve śabdāḥ paścādvyutpādyamānāḥ kaiścitsiddhārthā bhavanti /
analyzed: atas sarve śabdāḥ paścāt vyutpādyamānāḥ kaiścid siddhārthāḥ bhavanti

original: sarveṣāṃ tu kāryārthatve siddhārthapareṣu laukikavākyeṣu sarvaśabdānāṃ lākṣaṇikatvānna kaścidanvitābhidhāyī syāt /
analyzed: sarveṣām tu kārya artha tve siddhārtha pareṣu laukika vākyeṣu sarva śabdānām lākṣaṇika tvāt na kaścid anvita abhidhāyī syāt
tatra anvita pratītiḥ katham siddhyet
vaktṛ jñānam anumātavyam
na ca anvita pratipādakam vākyam uccāritam iti katham anvita jñāna anumānam
atha artha svarūpa smārakaiḥ padaiḥ anvita jñānam anamīyate
tatas kārya vācake pi asiddheḥ anvita abhidhānam na syāt
kiñca prathamam eva kārya vyabhicāraḥ śakyaḥ na gantum

original: yadā hi putraste jāta ityuktasya kasyācinmukhavikāsaṃ pārśvasthaḥ paśyati tadā harṣaheturanena
analyzed: yadā hi putraḥ te jātaḥ iti uktasya kasyācid mukha vikāsam pārśva sthaḥ paśyati tadā harṣa hetuḥ anena

original: śabdena pratipādita iti harṣahetubhūtasiddhārthapratipādane śabdasya sāmarthyaṃ kalpayati /
analyzed: śabdena pratipāditaḥ iti harṣa hetu bhūta siddhārtha pratipādane śabdasya sāmarthyam kalpayati

original: yadyapi ca tadānīmarthaviśeṣo na jñāyate harṣahetūnāṃ bahūnāṃ saṃbhavāttathāpi siddhārthatā tāvadavagatā,

tāvatā api kārye vyabhicāraḥ siddhaḥ

original: kiñca bahuśaḥ putrajanane sati evaṃ śabdaprayogādanyeṣu harṣahetuṣvaprayogāt putrajananarūpārthaviśeṣo 'pi sujñāna
analyzed: kiñca bahuśas putra janane sati evam śabda prayogāt anyeṣu harṣa hetuṣu aprayogāt putra janana rūpa artha viśeṣaḥ sujñāna
eva

original: tathāhi yadā kaścitpravṛttāvatyantāsamarthaṃ vṛddhamāturaṃ vā prativinodārthaṃ vākyaṃ
analyzed: tathā hi yadā kaścid pravṛttau atyanta asamartham vṛddham āturam vā prativinoda artham vākyam

analyzed: prayuṅkte nadyāḥ tīre pañca phalāni santi iti tatra anyaḥ daiva saṃgataḥ kaścid arthī tad vākyam arthāt śrutvā

original: etatsarvaṃ paśyannanyo vyutpitsuḥ phalasadbhāvapratipādane śabdasya sāmarthyaṃ vyutpadyate,

original: yadi tāvat 'yatkāryaṃ tadvedārtha eve'ti kāryamuddiśya vedārthatā vidhīyate,
analyzed: yadi tāvat yat kāryam tat veda arthaḥ eva iti kāryam uddiśya veda artha tā vidhīyate

original: tathā satyuddeśyasyopādeyena svaraniyamātsarvasya lokikasyāpi gavānayanādikāryasya vedārthatā syāt /
analyzed: tathā sati uddeśyasya upādeyena svara niyamāt sarvasya lokikasya api gavānayana ādi kāryasya veda artha tā syāt

original: kiñca upādeyasya vedārthasyoddeśena dhūmenāvyāpterakārye 'pi vedasya prāmāṇyanirastaṃ syāt //*//
analyzed: kiñca upādeyasya veda arthasya uddeśena dhūmena avyāpteḥ akārye vedasya prāmāṇya nirastam syāt

original: tato 'yo dharmaḥ sa codanālakṣaṇaḥ' iti vatanavyaktiḥ syāt,
analyzed: tatas yaḥ dharmaḥ sa codanā lakṣaṇaḥ iti va tana vyaktiḥ syāt

original: tataḥ sarvasya vedārthasya kāryatvamarthatvaṃ ca vidhīyate iti śyenādiniyogānāmapyarthatvaṃ syāt //*//
analyzed: tatas sarvasya veda arthasya kārya tvam artha tvam ca vidhīyate iti śyena ādi niyogānām api artha tvam syāt

original: tato 'yamartho bhavati yor'thātmako 'bhyudayātmako vedārthaḥ sa kāryarūpaḥ,
analyzed: tatas yam arthaḥ bhavati yaḥ ṛtha ātmakaḥ bhyudaya ātmakaḥ veda arthaḥ sa kārya rūpaḥ

original: tataśca śyenādiniyogānāṃ niṣiddhaphalatvenānabhyudayarūpāṇāṃ kāryatā na syāt /

original: kiṃ kāryaṃ eva dharmarūpo vedārthaḥ sa eva jijñāsyo nānyaḥ,

original: atha tvarthaśabdamanādṛśya yo vedārthaḥ sa kāryarūpa ityucyate tator'thapadamanarthakaṃ vastumātraparyāyamanuvādakaṃ syāt /

arvācīnānām tu codanā gamyaḥ iti aparaḥ

original: jagadvaicitryārthāpatyā kimapyadṛṣṭamastīti sāmānyena prasiddho dharmaścodanayāgnihotrādiviśeṣarūpeṇa gamyate tasmātsamuccaya ita pakṣāntaram,
analyzed: jagat vaicitrya arthāpatyā kim api adṛṣṭam asti iti sāmānyena prasiddhaḥ dharmaḥ codanayā agnihotra ādi viśeṣa rūpeṇa gamyate tasmāt samuccayaḥ ita pakṣa antaram
codanā eva sā ca pramāṇam eva iti siddhāntaḥ

original: tadiha codanaiva pramāṇaṃ sāca pramāṇamevetyavadhāraṇadvayaṃ pratijñāyate //
analyzed: tat iha codanā eva pramāṇam sā ca pramāṇam eva iti avadhāraṇa dvayam pratijñāyate

original: nimittasūtre tu prathamadvitīyasūtramātrālocanayā vedo dharmamūlamityādivadupadeśaśāstratāśaṅkā mā bhūditi parīkṣāśāstramevadamiti jñāpayituṃ  #
analyzed: nimitta sūtre tu prathama dvitīya sūtra mātra ālocanayā vedaḥ dharma mūlam ityādi vat upadeśa śāstra tā āśaṅkā mā bhūt iti parīkṣā śāstram eva dam iti jñāpayitum
parīkṣā pratijñānam

original: yadyapi coparitanavyāpārādeva parīkṣāśāstratvaṃ gamyate tathāpi vakṣyamāṇameva śrotṛbuddhisamādhānāya kīrtitam //*//
analyzed: yadi api ca uparitana vyāpārāt eva parīkṣā śāstra tvam gamyate tathā api vakṣyamāṇam eva śrotṛ buddhi samādhānāya kīrtitam

pratyakṣa sūtre tu pratyakṣasya vidyamāna upalambhana tvāt bhaviṣyati dharme prāmāṇya asaṃbhavāt tad pūrvaka tvena itareṣām api aprāmāṇyāt pramāṇa antara niyama vikalpa samuccaya nirākaraṇāt codanā eva iti ayam arthaḥ  /
siddhi ati
autpattika sūtre tu svatas prāmāṇyam artha anyathātva kāraṇa doṣa jñānābhyām aprāmāṇyam iti āśritya agnihotra ādi codanābhyaḥ saṃdigdha jñāna utpatteḥ svatas
prāmāṇyam prāptam
na ca apavādakam artha anyathātva jñānam sākṣāt asti
na api kāraṇa doṣa jñānam
puruṣa āśraya tvāt śabda doṣāṇām
pada padārtha saṃbandhasya akṛtrima tvāt tad dvāreṇa puruṣa anupraveśa abhāvāt codanānām iti sthite samāhite
mā abhūt padārtha saṃbandha dvāreṇa puruṣa anupraveśaḥ
vākya vākya arthayoḥ tu loke saṃbandha adarśanāt nirmūlaḥ gnihotra ādi vākya artha pratyayaḥ iti atas vyāmohaḥ
sāmayikaḥ vā
atas na vākya arthe vedasya prāmāṇyam iti āśaṅkya

original: padārthānāṃ saṃbandhagrahaṇaṃ samayaṃ cānapekṣamāṇānāmeva vākyārthe prāmāṇyaṃ saṃbhavatīti tadbhūtādhikaraṇena pratipādite //*//
analyzed: padārthānām saṃbandha grahaṇam samayam ca an apekṣamāṇānām eva vākya arthe prāmāṇyam saṃbhavati iti tad bhūta adhikaraṇena pratipādite
punar vedānām vākya ātmaka tvāt kāṭhaka ādi samākhyānāt ca pauruṣeya tvāt tad dvāreṇa doṣa saṃsparśam āśaṅkya
smartavya tve sati a smaraṇāt yogyaḥ anupalabdhi nirastasya kartuḥ anumāna asaṃbhavāt samākhyāyāḥ ca

original: pravacananimittatvādapauruṣeyā vedāḥ iti tadekadeśānāṃ codanānāṃ siddhaṃ prāmāṇyamityevaṃ
analyzed: pravacana nimitta tvāt apauruṣeyāḥ vedāḥ iti tad eka deśānām codanānām siddham prāmāṇyam iti evam
samastaḥ prathamaḥ pādaḥ codanā sūtra pratijñāta artha upapādena tasya eva parikaraḥ
saḥ yam bhāṣyakāra anusāreṇa pādārthaḥ
vṛtti kāra matam tu paścāt anukramiṣyāmaḥ
dharmasya pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa gamya tvam

original: prakṛtamanusarāmaḥ- pratijñātaṃ tāvaccodanaiva pramāṇaṃ sā ca pramāṇameveti /
analyzed: prakṛtam anusarāmaḥ pratijñātam tāvat codanā eva pramāṇam sā ca pramāṇam eva iti

original: nanu pratyakṣāderanyānapekṣaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ saṃbhavatīti tasyaiva dharme prāmāṇyaṃ,
analyzed: nanu pratyakṣa ādeḥ anya anapekṣam prāmāṇyam saṃbhavati iti tasya eva dharme prāmāṇyam

original: śabdasya tu sarvadaiva pramāṇāntarapramitaviṣayatvānna tadanapekṣaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ saṃbhavatīti /
analyzed: śabdasya tu sarvadā eva pramāṇa antara pramita viṣaya tvāt na tad anapekṣam prāmāṇyam saṃbhavati iti
ucyate

original: pratyakṣaṃ tāvatsaṃyuktaviṣayatvena vidyamānopalambhanatvādbhaviṣyati dharme na samartham //*//
analyzed: pratyakṣam tāvat saṃyukta viṣaya tvena vidyamāna upalambhana tvāt bhaviṣyati dharme na samartham
yadi api godohana ādi dravyam
yāga ādi kriyā
nīcaistva ādi guṇaḥ ca
phala sādhana tvāt dharma śabdena ucyate na apūrva ādayaḥ iti śreyaskara bhāṣye vakṣyate

original: tathāpi teṣāṃ phalasādhanarūpeṇa dharmatvāt phalasya ca janmāntarādibhāvitvāddharmasvarūpeṇa pratyakṣaviṣayatvaṃ na saṃbhavati,
analyzed: tathā api teṣām phala sādhana rūpeṇa dharma tvāt phalasya ca janmāntara ādi bhāvi tvāt dharma sva rūpeṇa pratyakṣa viṣaya tvam na saṃbhavati
tad pūrvaka tvāt ca anumāna ādikam api na pramāṇam

original: bhāvanābalajaṃ tu yogipratyakṣaṃ bhaviṣyatyapi dharme samarthamiti manorathamātram /
analyzed: bhāvanā bala jam tu yogi pratyakṣam bhaviṣyati api dharme samartham iti manoratha mātram
bhāvanā hi anubhūta gocara niyata anubūteṣu eva niścaya rūpām smṛtim janayet
na ca sā atra pramāṇam smṛti tvāt eva
nitarām pratyakṣam an indriya ja tvāt
na indriya ja tvam pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam api tu kalpanā apoḍha tvam iti ced
sutarām dharmasya apratyakṣa tvam phala sādhana rūpasya a vikalpa grahaṇa saṃbhavāt
tasmāt animittam pratyakṣam
tad pūrvaka tvāt ca anumāna ādi api

original: kāśyapīyāḥ punaḥ prātibhajñānamṛṣīṇāṃ dharmo pravartata ityāhuḥ,
analyzed: kāśyapīyāḥ punar prātibha jñānam ṛṣīṇām pravartate iti āhuḥ

original: tattu liṅgādyabhāsajatvātpramāṇameva na bhavati kiṃ punardharme /
analyzed: tat tu liṅga ādi abhāsa ja tvāt pramāṇam eva na bhavati kim punar dharme
śabdasya tu yuktam prāmāṇyam

original: nanu na buddhijananamātrātprāmāṇyaṃ yuktaṃ ayathārtheṣvapi vākyeṣu buddhijananāviśeṣāt /
analyzed: nanu na buddhi janana mātrāt prāmāṇyam yuktam ayathārtheṣu api vākyeṣu buddhi janana aviśeṣāt
satyam
tatra tu kāraṇa doṣa bādhaka pratyayābhyām yuktam aprāmāṇyam
vede tu tad bhāvāt sataḥ prāptam prāmāṇyam an apoditam bhavati
atha prāmāṇya vicāraḥ
katham punar pramāṇasya svatas prāpti

original: tadarthamidaṃ sarvajñānānyadhikṛtya cintyate kiṃ prāmāṇyamaprāmāṇyaṃ cobhayaṃ svata evāvagamyate,
analyzed: tad artham idam sarva jñānāni adhikṛtya cintyate kim prāmāṇyam aprāmāṇyam ca ubhayam svatas eva avagamyate
athavā anyatarat api svabhāvena anirupitam kāraṇa guṇa doṣa pratyayābhyām avagamyate
āhosvit aprāmāṇyam svatas vagamyate
prāmāṇyam svatas prāptam sat artha anyathātva kāraṇa doṣa jñānābhyām avagamyamānena aprāmāṇyena apodyate iti

original: tatra sarvakāraṇānāṃ svakāryaśakteḥ svabhāvikatvādubhayamapi jñānasya svarasādevāvagamyata iti kecit /
analyzed: tatra sarva kāraṇānām sva kārya śakteḥ svabhāvika tvāt ubhayam api jñānasya svarasāt eva avagamyate iti kecid
tat ayuktam

original: nahi jñānaṃ svaviṣayasya tathātvamatathātvaṃ ca yugapacchaknoti vedayituṃ virodhāt //*//
analyzed: nahi jñānam sva viṣayasya tathātvam atathātvam ca yugapad śaknoti vedayitum virodhāt

original: atha kāpi jñānavyaktiḥ svaprāmāṇyaṃ svato bodhayati kāpyaprāmāṇyamityucyate,
analyzed: atha kā api jñāna vyaktiḥ sva prāmāṇyam svatas bodhayati kā api aprāmāṇyam iti ucyate
tathā api na yuktam

original: kāraṇāntaranirapekṣasya jñānasyaivopalambhahetutve kiṃ kva jñāne bhavatīti na śakyaṃ vivektum /
analyzed: kāraṇa antara nirapekṣasya jñānasya eva upalambha hetu tve kim kva jñāne bhavati iti na śakyam vivektum
atas dvayam api sva svabhāvena anirūpitam kāraṇa guṇa doṣa jñānābhyām avagamyaḥ iti apare
tat api apeśalam
evam hi guṇa doṣa avadhāraṇāt prāk anyatareṇa api ākāreṇa artham an avagamayat vijñānam niḥsvabhāvam syāt
tasmāt aprāmāṇyam svatas
prāmāṇyam tu saṃvāda jñāna ādibhiḥ iti edat eva yuktam

original: tathāhi na jñānamutpannamityetāvatārthatathātvāvadhāraṇaṃ yuktaṃ vyabhicārādaniścayācca aprāmāṇyameva tasyāṃ velāyāṃ prāptaṃ,
analyzed: tathā hi na jñānam utpannam iti etāvatā artha tathātva avadhāraṇam yuktam vyabhicārāt aniścayāt ca aprāmāṇyam eva tasyām velāyām prāptam
paścāt kāraṇa guṇa jñānāt artha kriyā jñānāt vā prāmāṇya avagamāt apodyate
śabde ca āpta praṇīta tvam guṇaḥ
na ca vede tat asya apauruṣeya tva abhyupagamāt
valaspatayaḥ satram āsata śṛṇota grāvāṇaḥ iti evamādīnām unmatta pralapita kalpa tvāt

original: apratyayitatarapraṇītatvādaprāmāṇyameva vedānāmiti prāpte 'bhidhīyate- parāpekṣaṃ pramāṇatvaṃ nātmānaṃ labhate kvacit /
analyzed: apratyayitatara praṇīta tvāt aprāmāṇyam eva vedānām iti prāpte bhidhīyate para apekṣam pramāṇa tvam na ātmānam labhate kvacid

original: mūlocchedakaraṃ pakṣaṃ ko hi nāmādhyavasyati yadi hi sarvameva jñānaṃ sivaviṣayatathātvāvadhāraṇe
analyzed: mūla uccheda karam pakṣam kaḥ hi nāma adhyavasyati yadi hi sarvam eva jñānam siva viṣaya tathātva avadhāraṇe
svayam asamartham vijñāna antaram apekṣeta tatas kāraṇa guṇa saṃvāda artha kriyā jñānāni api
sva viṣaya bhūta guṇa ādi avadhāraṇe param apekṣeran

original: aparamapi tatheti na kaścidartho janmasahasreṇāpyadhyavasīyeteti prāmāṇyamevotsīdet /
analyzed: aparam api tathā iti na kaścid arthaḥ janma sahasreṇa api adhyavasīyeta iti prāmāṇyam eva utsīdet
atha artha kriyā jñānam svatas pramāṇam iti ced kaḥ viśeṣaḥ
avyabhicāraḥ iti ced na
svapna avasthāyām asati api udaka āharaṇa īrtha kriyā vijñāna darśanāt

original: atha sukhajñānamevārthakriyā taccāvyabhicāryeva nahi kvacidapyasati sukhe sukhajñānamasti /
analyzed: atha sukha jñānam eva arthakriyā tat ca avyabhicāri eva nahi kvacid api asati sukhe sukha jñānam asti
satyam etat
na tu tena pūrva jñānasya prāmāṇya adhyavasānam saṃbhavati
apramāṇena api priya asaṃgama vijñānena svapna avasthāyām sukha darśanāt
tasmāt svatas prāmāṇyam prāptam artha anyathātva kāraṇa doṣa jñānābhyām apodyate iti avaśyam aṅgīkaraṇīyam
evam ca śabdena āpta puruṣa sparśa kṛta tvāt doṣāṇām apauruṣeye vede tad abhāvāt sākṣāt ca artha anyathātva jñāna abhāva dapoditam prāmāṇyam bhavati

original: pauruṣeyavacanāni tu puruṣabuddhiprabhavatvādbhrāntyā vipralipsayā vā prayuktāni mūladoṣeṇa duṣṭatvādayathārthāni bhavantīti vaiṣamyam /
analyzed: pauruṣeya vacanāni tu puruṣa buddhi prabhava tvāt bhrāntyā vipralipsayā vā prayuktāni mūla doṣeṇa duṣṭa tvāt ayathārthāni bhavanti iti vaiṣamyam
kecid bāhuḥ na loke śabdasya ayathārthā tvam asti tad abhāvāt

original: na hi loke śābdaṃ pramāṇamasti vakrabhiprāyānumāpakatvātpuruṣavacasām,
analyzed: na hi loke śābdam pramāṇam asti vakra abhiprāya anumāpaka tvāt puruṣa vacasām
tena anumānasya eva ayam vyabhicāraḥ na śabdasya
na vā tasya api viveka agrahaṇāt aliṅge liṅga vyavahāra pravṛttiḥ
yadi tu śabdasya eva ayam vyabhicāraḥ bhyupeyate
svābhāvikam eva apramāṇam syāt

original: na hi puruṣadoṣeṇa śabdasya doṣo bhavati yathāvasthitaśabdābhivyaktimātre puruṣasya vyāpārāt //*//
analyzed: na hi puruṣa doṣeṇa śabdasya doṣaḥ bhavati yathā avasthita śabda abhivyakti mātre puruṣasya vyāpārāt
tat idam asāram

original: yadi loke śābdaṃ nāsti tadā vede 'pi kathaṃ tatsyāt /
analyzed: yadi loke śābdam na asti tadā vede pi katham tat syāt

original: nahyabhiprāyānumānakṣīṇasya śabdasyārthaṃ prati vācakatve pramāṇamastītyuktaṃ nyāyaratnamālāyām //*//
analyzed: na hi abhiprāya anumāna kṣīṇasya śabdasya artham prati vācaka tve pramāṇam asti iti uktam nyāyaratnamālāyām

original: yacca vyabhicārābhyupagame svābhāvikamaprāmāṇyaṃ bhavati puruṣadoṣasya śabde 'navatārāditi /
analyzed: yat ca vyabhicāra abhyupagame svābhāvikam aprāmāṇyam bhavati puruṣa doṣasya śabde nava tārāt iti

original: syādetadevaṃ yadi yadīyaṃ yadvākyaṃ tat sa puruṣo 'bhivyañjyāt /
analyzed: syāt etat evam yadi yadī iyam yat vākyam tat sa puruṣaḥ bhivyañjyāt
tat tu

original: tenaiva kriyate varṇā nityāḥ padāni ca,
analyzed: tena eva kriyate varṇāḥ nityāḥ padāni ca
vākyāni tu puruṣaiḥ eva kriyante pauruṣeya tvāt eva
yathā avasthitāni vyajyamānāni veda vākya vat apauruṣeyāṇi eva syuḥ
tatas ca vaktṛ abhiprāya anumāpaka tvam api na syāt

original: tadyathādhyetṛbhirabhivyajyamānāni vedavākyāni nādhyetṝṇāmabhiprāyaṃ sūcayanti tathā puruṣavākyānyapi na sūcayeyuḥ /
analyzed: tat yathā adhyetṛbhiḥ abhivyajyamānāni veda vākyāni na adhyetṝṇām abhiprāyam sūcayanti tathā puruṣa vākyāni api na sūcayeyuḥ

original: yadi hi vyabhicāraśaṅkyā loke śabdasya prāmāṇyaṃ na saṃbhavatītyucyate,
analyzed: yadi hi vyabhicāra śaṅkyā loke śabdasya prāmāṇyam na saṃbhavati iti ucyate
tarhi tad vaktṛ abhiprāya anumāne tulyam
anyathā saṃvidānasya api anyathā vākya racanā darśanāt

original: kiṃ ca śabdasya cakṣurāderiva svasāmarthyena bodhakatvādvyabhicāre 'pi na bodhakatvahāniḥ /
analyzed: kim ca śabdasya cakṣuḥ ādeḥ iva sva sāmarthyena bodhaka tvāt vyabhicāre na bodhaka tva hāniḥ
liṅgasya avyabhicāriṇaḥ eva gamaka tvam iti vyabhicāriṇaḥ liṅga tvam upapannam
atha vaktum āpta tvāt vyabhicāra śaṅkām nirvarti anumānam

original: tathāsati śabdamevārthe pramāṇamastu pratibandhakāyāḥ śaṅkāyā nirastatvāt /

original: avaśyaṃ hi buddhiviśeṣamanumitsatā prathamaṃ padārthāsteṣāṃ cānvayayogyatālocayitavyā,

original: te ālocyamānā drāgeva vākyārthaṃ bodhayantīti nānumānaṃ pratīkṣante //*//

original: kiñcānumite buddhiviśeṣe paścādanuvādabhūtaṃ vākyaṃ vākyārthamavabodhayatīti vaḥ siddhāntaḥ,

original: tataśca yo nāmānāpta evābuddhyā gṛhītastadvākyādayathārthameva jñānamutpannamityabhyupagantavyam,
analyzed: tatas ca yaḥ nāma anāptaḥ eva abuddhyā gṛhītaḥ tad vākyāt ayathārtham eva jñānam utpannam iti abhyupagantavyam

original: tataśca doṣādhīnatvādapramāṇyasya vaktṛdoṣāṇāṃ ca śabde saṃkrāntyanabhyupagamātsvārasikameva śabde
analyzed: tatas ca doṣa adhīna tvāt apramāṇyasya vaktṛ doṣāṇām ca śabde saṃkrānti anabhyupagamāt svārasikam eva śabde

original: duṣṭatvamāpannamiti balādapramāṇyaṃ vedasya prasajyata ityāstāṃ tāvat /
analyzed: duṣṭa tvam āpannam iti balāt apramāṇyam vedasya prasajyate iti āstām tāvat

original: tasmādanāptāvacasāṃ satyevāprāmāṇye vaktṛdoṣādhīnatvādvede ca tadabhāvātprāmāṇyameva vaktavyam /

tasmāt codanā lakṣaṇaḥ eva dharmaḥ śreyaskaraḥ iti arthaḥ

original: yadeva śreyaḥsādhanarūpaṃ yāgahomādi tadeva dharma ityucyate loke,
analyzed: yat eva śreyaḥ sādhana rūpam yāga homa ādi tat eva dharmaḥ iti ucyate loke
na apūrvam antaḥkaraṇa pravṛtti ādi vā loka prasiddhi virahāt
nanu apūrvam eva śreyaḥ sādhanam na

tad rūpa abhāvāt ca na śūdra kṛtasya dharmatā āpattiḥ
codanā lakṣaṇa mātrasya dharma tvam mā abhūt iti artha śabdena viśeṣyate

original: codanāśabdena ca pravartakaṃ nivartakaṃ ca vākyamucyate tataśca niṣedhavākyaiḥ na
analyzed: codanā śabdena ca pravartakam nivartakam ca vākyam ucyate tatas ca niṣedha vākyaiḥ na

original: hiṃsyāt ityādibhiranarthatvena lakṣyamāṇānāṃ hiṃsādīnāmapi dharmatvaṃ syāt tadvyāvṛttyarthaṃ

nahi indriya janya tvam hetuḥ kintu indriya saṃprayoga ja tvam

original: nacānumāne 'tītāyā bhaviṣyantyā vā vṛṣṭeranumīyamānāyā manasā saṃprayogo 'stītyavyabhicāraḥ /
analyzed: na ca anumāne tītāyāḥ bhaviṣyantyāḥ vā vṛṣṭeḥ anumīyamānāyāḥ manasā saṃprayogaḥ sti iti avyabhicāraḥ
atha pratyakṣam
tat evam pratyakṣam tāvat animittam tad pūrvaka tvāt ca anumāna ādi api

original: nahyagṛhīte dharme tena saha kasyacitsaṃbandhagrahaṇaṃ saṃbhavati /
analyzed: na hi agṛhīte dharme tena saha kasyacid saṃbandha grahaṇam saṃbhavati
sādṛśya viṣayaka tvāt ca upamānam dūra bhraṣṭam
arthāpattiḥ api dharmeṇa vinā anupapadyamānasya kasyacid adarśanāt asamarthā
nanu jagat vaicatryam anupapannam na
svābhāvika tvena upapatteḥ

original: yadyapi tadanupapattyā kiñcidadṛṣṭaṃ kalpyeta tathāpi ko dharmaḥ ko vādharma iti vivekābhāvādavaśyaṃ codanaivārthanīyā /
analyzed: yadi api tad anupapattyā kiñcid adṛṣṭam kalpyeta tathā api kaḥ dharmaḥ kaḥ vā adharmaḥ iti viveka abhāvāt avaśyam codanā eva arthanīyā
sā ced aṅgīkṛtā kṛm arthāpattyā
sāmānyatas dṛṣṭena vā
nanu vikalpa nimittam saṃbandha grahaṇam tat katham pratyakṣa pūrvakatvam
sa vikalpakam api anuparata indriya vyāpārasya jāyamānam aparokṣa avabhāsa tvāt pratyakṣam eva iti adoṣaḥ
pratyakṣa bauddha matam
vikalpa paśca aparokṣa avabhāsaḥ ca iti citram
aparokṣam iti hi sva lakṣaṇam ucyate tad viṣayaḥ parokṣa avabhāsaḥ
vikalpaḥ tu abhilāpa saṃyogi apratibhāsa tvāt na sva lakṣaṇam spṛśati
na hi abhilāpaḥ sva lakṣaṇam spṛśati
yadi spṛśet abhilāpa mātreṇa api vinā akṣa vyāpāram aparokṣa avabhāsaḥ syāt
na ca asau asti
tat uktam anyathā eva agni saṃyogāt dāham dagdhaḥ hi manyate
anyathā dāha śabdena dāha arthaḥ saṃprakāśate iti

original: yastvayaṃ visphāritākṣasya- gaurayam- iti vikalpo viśadāvabhāsaḥ sa samānakālaviśadavabhāsanirvikalpakasaṃsargakṛtaḥ,
analyzed: yaḥ tu ayam visphārita akṣasya gauḥ ayam iti vikalpaḥ viśada avabhāsaḥ sa samāna kāla viśada avabhāsa nirvikalpaka saṃsarga kṛtaḥ
tad abhāve bhilāpa mātre numāne ca vikalpa ākāra pratibhāse vaiśādya abhāvāt
tasmāt nirvikalpakam eva pratyakṣam
tatra eva hi viśadasya sva lakṣaṇasya avabhāsaḥ
bauddha mata khaṇḍanam
mā evam

original: unmīlitanetrasya vikalpo 'pi gaurayamityaparokṣāvabhāsa eva pratīyate nacāsāvanyasaṃsargakṛtaḥ pramāṇābhāvāt /
analyzed: unmīlita netrasya gauḥ ayam iti aparokṣa avabhāsaḥ eva pratīyate na ca asau anya saṃsarga kṛtaḥ pramāṇa abhāvāt
abhilāpa saṃsarga yogyasya api sāmānya ākārasya abhilāpa liṅga ādibhiḥ avaiśadyam indriyaiḥ ca vaiśādyam upapadyate eva
na hi ayam parokṣa aparokṣa vibhāgaḥ viṣaya kṛtaḥ

original: yadi hi tathā syāt sarvadaiva sāmānyaṃ parokṣaṃ syāt,
analyzed: yadi hi tathā syāt sarvadā eva sāmānyam parokṣam syāt
na ca evam asti
sāmānya ākārasya api parokṣa aparokṣa vibhāga darśanāt

original: tathāhi - dūrācchvetaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ paśyannanirdhāritagavāśvajātiviśeṣo heṣāviśeṣo heṣāśabdaśravaṇādaśvatvaṃ tasminneva svalakṣaṇe 'numimāno  #
analyzed: tathā hi dūrāt śvetam sva lakṣaṇam paśyan anirdhārita gavāśva jāti viśeṣaḥ heṣā viśeṣaḥ heṣā śabda śravaṇāt aśva tvam tasmin eva sva lakṣaṇe numimānaḥ
pi parokṣam budhyate

original: vadanti hi aśvo 'pyayaṃ na cakṣuṣā tathāvabhāsata iti /
analyzed: vadanti hi aśvaḥ pi ayam na cakṣuṣā tathā avabhāsate iti

original: pratyāsannastu vadati- saṃpratyaśvatvamapyasya cakṣuṣā paśyāmi na pūrvamiti /
analyzed: pratyāsannaḥ tu vadati saṃprati aśva tvam api asya cakṣuṣā paśyāmi na pūrvam iti

original: svalakṣaṇaṃ tu prāgapi viśadameveti sāmānyāṃśagata evāyaṃ dūrasamīpavartinaḥ parokṣāparokṣavibhāgaḥ,
analyzed: sva lakṣaṇam tu prāk api viśadam eva iti sāmānya aṃśa gataḥ eva ayam dūra samīpa vartinaḥ parokṣa aparokṣa vibhāgaḥ
tasmāt kāraṇa kṛtaḥ yam vibhāgaḥ

original: ekasminnapi hi viṣaye 'kṣairjāyamānaṃ vijñānamāparokṣyaṃ janayati liṅgādijaṃ tu neti kiṃ nopapadyate /
analyzed: ekasmin api hi viṣaye kṣaiḥ jāyamānam vijñānam āparokṣyam janayati liṅga ādi jam tu na iti kim nā upapadyate

original: jñānajanyo viṣayagataḥ phalaviśeṣo 'yamāparokṣyaṃ nāma sarvasya saṃvedyaḥ /
analyzed: jñāna janyaḥ viṣaya gataḥ phala viśeṣaḥ yama āparokṣyam nāma sarvasya saṃvedyaḥ

original: yadbhāvābhāvābhyāṃ liṅgābhyāmakṣaiḥ paśyāmi na paśyāmīti visphāritākṣāṇāmeva vyavahāraḥ pravartate /
analyzed: yad bhāva abhāvābhyām liṅgābhyām akṣaiḥ paśyāmi na paśyāmi iti visphārita akṣāṇām eva vyavahāraḥ pravartate
atas sti vikalpasya api viśada avabhāsi tvam iti pratyakṣa tva upapattiḥ

original: kecittu savikalpakameva sarvaṃ jñānaṃ na nirvikalpakaṃ nāma kiñcidastīti manyante /
analyzed: kecid tu sa vikalpakam eva sarvam jñānam na nirvikalpakam nāma kiñcid asti iti manyante

original: tattu pratīti viruddhaṃ- pratīmo hi vayamakṣasaṃnipātānantaramavivaviktasāmānyaviśeṣavibhāgaṃ saṃmugdhavastumātrahagocaramālocanajñīnam /
analyzed: tat tu prati iti viruddham pratīmaḥ hi vayam akṣa saṃnipāta anantaram avivavikta sāmānya viśeṣa vibhāgam saṃmugdha vastu mātra ha gocaram ālocana jñīnam

original: tadabhāve tu vikalpa eva na jāyeta /
analyzed: tad abhāve tu vikalpaḥ eva na jāyeta

original: vikalpatayā hi pūrvānubhūtaṃ jātiviśeṣaṃ saṃjñāviśeṣaṃ cānusmṛtya tena puraḥsthitaṃ vastu vikalpayitavyam /
analyzed: vikalpatayā hi pūrva anubhūtam jāti viśeṣam saṃjñā viśeṣam ca anusmṛtya tena puras sthitam vastu vikalpayitavyam
na ca artham adṛṣṭavataḥ tad smaraṇam ākasmikam eva utpadyate
tasmāt asti nirvikalpakam api jñānam
tat ca sat mātra viṣayam iti kecid
bhedasya vikalpa vedya tvāt agṛhīte ca bhede viśeṣāṇām agrahaṇāt

original: kiñcetarābhāvo bhedo pratyakṣeṇa grahītuṃ śakyate natarāṃ avikalpena /
analyzed: kiñca itara abhāvaḥ pratyakṣeṇa grahītum śakyate natarām avikalpena

original: ataśca neha nānāsti kiñcanetyādiniṣedhānāṃ pratyakṣavirodhābhāvāt ekamevādvitīyamityādiśrutibhiradvitīyam brahma siddham /
analyzed: atas ca na iha nānā asti kiñcana ityādi niṣedhānām pratyakṣa virodha abhāvāt ekam eva advitīyam ityādi śrutibhiḥ advitīyam brahma siddham
advaita mata khaṇḍanam

original: tadidamatisāhasam- kiṃ bhavato nīlapītayostiktamadhurayoḥ śītoṣṇayoḥ sukhaduḥkhayoścāvilakṣaṇā buddhiḥ /
analyzed: tat idam ati sāhasam kim bhavataḥ nīla pītayoḥ tikta madhurayoḥ śīta uṣṇayoḥ sukha duḥkhayoḥ ca avilakṣaṇā buddhiḥ
yadi evam na atra uttaram vaktavyam
na ca sat svarūpe sa vikalpena viśeṣa grahaṇam iti vācyam
avikalpena vikalpasya api vilakṣaṇasya utpatti asaṃbhavāt

original: yaccāvaśyamidamasmādbhinnamityevaṃ vikalpenaiva bhedo grahītavyo nāvikalpena tasya saṃbhavatīti /
analyzed: yat ca avaśyam idam asmāt bhinnam iti evam vikalpena eva bhedaḥ grahītavyaḥ na avikalpena tasya saṃbhavati iti

original: na brūmo bhedasya grahaṇaṃ kintu bhinnānām /
analyzed: na brūmaḥ bhedasya grahaṇam kintu bhinnānām

original: teṣāmapi na bhinnatayā kintu svarūpeṇa- yadanyasmādbhinnaṃ nīlaṃ pītaṃ vā tadgṛhyata iti brūmaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām api na bhinna tayā kintu svarūpeṇa yat anyasmāt bhinnam nīlam pītam vā tat gṛhyate iti brūmaḥ
nahi nīlam pītam vā bhedaḥ
tayoḥ hi dharmaḥ bhedaḥ
tad agrahe pi dharmiṇām grahaṇam na anupapannam

original: yadica sanmātraṃ pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyate na nīlaṃ pītaṃ vā tato vikalpenāpīdamasmādbhinnamiti kathaṃ bhedo gṛhyeta /
analyzed: yadi ca sat mātram pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyate na nīlam pītam vā tatas vikalpena api idam asmāt bhinnam iti katham bhedaḥ gṛhyeta

original: na hi sadeva sato bhinnamiti saṃbhavati /
analyzed: na hi sat eva sataḥ bhinnam iti saṃbhavati

original: tasmānnīlādiguṇānāṃ pṛthivyādidravyāṇāṃ ca pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇātprapañcāpalāpaḥ pratyakṣaviruddha eva //*//
analyzed: tasmāt nīla ādi guṇānām pṛthivī ādi dravyāṇām ca pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇāt prapañca apalāpaḥ pratyakṣa viruddhaḥ eva

original: yadi tu pṛthivyādiprapañcaṃ nāpahnumahe taddharmaṃ tu bhedameveti brūyāt,
analyzed: yadi tu pṛthivī ādi prapañcam na apahnumahe tad dharmam tu bhedam eva iti brūyāt
tat api aśakyam
nīla pītayoḥ itaretara abhāvasya pratyakṣa anupalabdhi siddhasya apahnava asaṃbhavāt
pratyakṣa abhāvaḥ pi hi pratyakṣa vat eva pramāṇa antarebhyaḥ balīyān
itarathā śaśe catuṣpād tvāt viṣāṇi tvam anumīyate
atas bheda apalāpaḥ na saṃbhavati
yadi tu itaretara āśraya tayā itaretara abhāva grahaṇasya anavakḷpteḥ avidyā mātra nimittam tat iti ucyate

original: tadapi - yadi bhinnatayā pratiyoginamāśrayaṃ ca gṛhītvā tata itaretarābhāvo gṛhyeta tataḥ syāt,
analyzed: tat api yadi bhinna tayā pratiyoginam āśrayam ca gṛhītvā tatas itaretarābhāvaḥ gṛhyeta tatas syāt
nīla pītayoḥ tu itaretarābhāva anādareṇa sva rūpeṇa gṛhītayoḥ paścāt ataretarābhāva grahaṇe
kim itaretara āśraya tvam

original: yadi tu dvitvamapahnūyate na pṛthivyādayasteṣāṃ ca mitho bhedaḥ tadapi pratyakṣaviruddham /
analyzed: yadi tu dvi tvam apahnūyate na pṛthivī ādayaḥ teṣām ca mithas bhedaḥ tat api pratyakṣa viruddham
saṃkhyāyāḥ pratyakṣa tvāt
sati api pratyakṣa virodhe tad apamardena pravartamānaḥ tad bādhena avāgamaḥ dvaitam avagamayati iti ced na
pravṛtti asaṃbhavāt

original: pratyakṣaṃ hi nirapekṣaṃ śīghraṃ jāyamānaṃ svaviruddhasyāgamikajñānasya padapadārthasaṃnidhyapekṣāyogyatvanyāyālocanasāpekṣatayā vilambitapravṛtteḥ  #
analyzed: pratyakṣam hi nirapekṣam śīghram jāyamānam sva viruddhasya āgamika jñānasya pada padārtha saṃnidhi apekṣā yogya tva nyāya ālocanā sāpekṣa tayā vilambita pravṛtteḥ
pravṛttim eva niruṇaddhi
kiñca aśakyam eva śrutyā prapañcasya asatya tvam boddhum

original: budhyamāne hi śrutirapi prapañcāntargatatvādasatī boddhavyā syāt /
analyzed: budhyamāne hi śrutiḥ api prapañca antargata tvāt asatī boddhavyā syāt
katham ca śrutyā eva śruteḥ asatvam budhyeta

original: asatvena hi pratīyamānā na pramāṇaṃ syāt /
analyzed: asatvena hi pratīyamānā na pramāṇam syāt

original: pramāṇatve tvavasthite sattayā pratīyamānāyāḥ śruterna mithyātvaṃ śakyaṃ vaktum /
analyzed: pramāṇa tve tu avasthite sattayā pratīyamānāyāḥ śruteḥ na mithyātvam śakyam vaktum

original: nahyekasyaiva vastuno yugapadeva sattvamasatvaṃ ca samuccitya boddhuṃ śakyam,
analyzed: nahi ekasya eva vastunaḥ yugapad eva sattvam asatvam ca samuccitya boddhum śakyam
anyatara upamardena hi anyatarat buddhau ārohati
tatas ca śrutiḥ asti iti ced
na prapañca apalāpaḥ saṃbhavati
nanu svayaṃprakāśam brahma kim asya anyena pramāṇena
bhavatu brahma svayam prakāśam prāpañca abhāvasya kim āyātam
sa hi pramāṇam apekṣate eva
katham ca a vidyamānasya prapañcasya pratibhāsaḥ
avidyayā iti ced
kasya punar iyam avidyā
jīvānām iti ced na
teṣām abhāvāt
bhāve vā dvaita prasaṅgaḥ
brahmaṇi tu viśuddha vijñāna ātmake niravakāśā eva avidyā
vidyā ātmakam api brahma vidyā śabalam iva bhrāntyā avagamyate iti ced
kasya iyam bhrāntiḥ
yadi na kasyacid sūktam
jīvānām iti ced na
tad abhāvāt
yadi brāhmaṇaḥ
na asya bhrāntiḥ saṃbhavati iti uktam
yadi ca vidyā rūpe pi avidyā syāt kena asau ucchidyeta
dhyāna ādibhiḥ iti ced
na teṣām api abhāvāt
bhāve tu dvaita āpattiḥ

original: brahmaṇi tu sahāvasthānādaviruddhāvidyā na tenocchettuṃ sā śakyā /
analyzed: brahmaṇi tu saha avasthānāt aviruddha avidyā na tena ucchettum sā śakyā
tatas ca anirmokṣa prasaṅgaḥ
tasmāt brahmaṇaḥ praśaṃsā arthaiḥ asthāyi tvena prapañcasya asattvam upacaradbhiḥ aupaniṣadaiḥ vādaiḥ tad anusāribhiḥ ca itihāsa purāṇaiḥ bhrāntānām
vākya tātparyam a jānānānām nyāya abhiyoga śūnyānām pralāpaḥ umā dvaita vādaḥ iti upekṣaṇīyaḥ
tat siddham avikalpasya pratyakṣasya viśeṣa viṣaya tvam
nirvikalpaka viṣayaka bauddha mata khaṇḍanam
apare tu sva lakṣaṇa mātra gocaram nirvikalpakam icchanti
tat api pratīti viruddham

original: pratīyate hi saṃmugdhākāraṃ vastu sahasaiva yatpañcājjātidravyaguṇakriyānāmabhiḥ pañcadhā savikalpakena vikalpyate gaurayam,
analyzed: pratīyate hi saṃmugdha ākāram vastu sahasā eva yat pañcāt jāti dravya guṇa kriyā nāmabhiḥ pañcadhā sa vikalpakena vikalpyate gauḥ ayam
daṇḍayam
śaklaḥ yam
gacchati ayam
ḍ itthaḥ yam iti
tatra nirvikalpakam aneka ākāram vastu saṃmugdham gṛhṇāti
sa vikalpam tu ekaika ākāram jāti ādikam vivicya viṣayīkaroti

original: nanu ṣaṣṭho 'pi vikalpo 'sti tadevedamiti tatkathaṃ pañcadhā vikalpa ityucyate /
analyzed: nanu sti tat eva idam iti tat katham pañcadhā vikalpaḥ iti ucyate
na tu ayam jāti vikalpaḥ vyakti pratyabhijñā hi iyam
na saṃjñā vikalpaḥ
anavagata saṃjñānām api bhāvāt

original: tiryañco 'pi hyadyajātāḥ svamātaraṃ prathamamupalabhya kṣaṇāntare punarupalabhamānāḥ saiveyamiti śabdānuvedhaśūnyameva pratyabhijānanti,
analyzed: tiryañcaḥ pi hi adya jātāḥ sva mātaram prathamam upalabhya kṣaṇa antare punar upalabhamānāḥ sā eva iyam iti śabda anuvedha śūnyam eva pratyabhijānanti
tasmāt iyam ṣaṣṭhī kalpanā iti pṭhacavidha tva anupapattiḥ
ucyate iyam eva asmābhiḥ nāma kalpanā iti ucyate

original: tathāhi ḍittho 'yamiti tāvadgaurayamitivadbhāvātmanā ḍitthātmanā vastu vikalpyate,
analyzed: tathā hi ḍitthaḥ yam iti tāvat gauḥ ayam itivat bhāva ātmanā ḍittha ātmanā vastu vikalpyate
na daṇḍī iti vat tad saṃbandhi tayā matu artha anupādānāt

original: tatra na ḍitthaśabdena jātivadarthasyātmā atyantabhinnatvāt yatastenaivārtho 'nurajyeta /
analyzed: tatra na ḍittha śabdena jāti vat arthasya ātmā atyanta bhinna tvāt yatas tena eva arthaḥ nurajyeta

original: tadetadevaṃ vijñeyam- ḍitthaśabdena tadvācyaṃ pūrvāvagataṃ ḍitthamupasthāpya tadātmanā puraḥsthitor'tho vikalpyate ḍittho 'yamiti /
analyzed: tat etat evam vijñeyam ḍittha śabdena tat vācyam pūrva avagatam ḍittham upasthāpya tad ātmanā puras sthitaḥ ūrthaḥ vikalpyate ḍitthaḥ yam iti
kim uktam bhavati

original: yo 'sāvasmākaṃ ḍitthaḥ so 'yaṃ puraḥsthito nānya iti /
analyzed: yaḥ sau asmākam ḍitthaḥ saḥ yam puras sthitaḥ na anyaḥ iti
sā iyam vyakti pratyabhijñā eva

original: sāca śabdavidāṃ nāmarūṣitaiva bhavatīti nāma vikalpeneti vyavahriyate /
analyzed: sā ca śabda vidām nāma rūṣitā eva bhavati iti nāma vikalpena iti vyavahriyate
etena yat āhuḥ
ḍitthaḥ yam iti a śabda ākārasya arthasya śabda ākāreṇa vikalpa nāda pramāṇam sa vikalpam
iti tat api nirastam

original: nahyatra śabdākāreṇārthaḥ pratīyate kintu pūrvāvagatārthasmaraṇamātre śabdasya vyāpāraḥ,
analyzed: na hi atra śabda ākāreṇa arthaḥ pratīyate kintu pūrva avagata artha smaraṇa mātre śabdasya vyāpāraḥ
tena ca smṛtena arthena tādātmyena puras sthita artha vikalpanāt

original: āhaca- yadā tu yādṛśaḥ piṇḍaḥ pūrvaṃ śabdātpratīyate /
analyzed: āha ca yadā tu yādṛśaḥ piṇḍaḥ pūrvam śabdāt pratīyate
tādṛśa smaraṇe hetuḥ śabdaḥ tatra yathārtha tā iti
tasmāt nāma vikalpe pi jāti ādi vat na asti a tad rūpa āropaḥ
kim punar jāti ādibhiḥ vikalpyate
dravyam
kim punar idam dravyam nāma
pṛthivī udaka tejaḥ vāyu prabhṛti
dravya abhāve bauddha matena pūrvapakṣaḥ

original: nanu rūpādivyatiriktaṃ dravyaṃ nāma na kiñcidupalabhāmahe /
analyzed: nanu rūpa ādi vyatiriktam dravyam nāma na kiñcid upalabhāmahe
na ca tasya upalambhakam asti
cakṣuḥ ādīnām pañcānām rūpa ādiṣu eva upakṣīṇa tvāt

original: pratyabhijñā ca- yathā badaraphalaṃ śyāmāvasthāyāṃ raktāvasthāyāṃ ca yathā vā ghaṭapiṇḍakapālāvasthāsu mṛddravyam /

analyzed: asti hi tatra piṇḍa avasthā bhede śyāma rakta rūpa bhede dravya pratyabhijñā mṛd iyam piṇḍa avasthām apahāya dravya pratyabhijñā mṛd iyam piṇḍa avasthām apahāya saṃjātā śyāmi mānam ca tyaktvā

original: tredhā hyatra puruṣānupraveśaḥ- padapadārthasaṃbandhadvāreṇa vākyavākyārthasaṃbandhadvāreṇa grandhasyaiva vā bhāratādivatpauruṣeyatvāt /

original: nanvevaṃ dhārāvāhikeṣuttareṣāṃ pūrvagṛhītārthaviṣayakatvādaprāmāṇyaṃ syāt tasmādanubhūtiḥ pramāṇamitipramāṇalakṣaṇam,

smṛti vyatiriktā ca pratītiḥ anubhūtiḥ

anumānāt
bāhye ca pravṛtti asāmarthyāt
yathā ca a sāmārthye tathā vakṣyāmaḥ

original: saṃpratyanumānamucyate- stambhādipratyayāḥ svāṃśameva bāhyatayādhyavasyanto mithyābhūtāḥ pratyayatvāt svapnapratyayavat śuktakārajatādipratyayavacca
analyzed: saṃprati anumānam ucyate stambha ādi pratyayāḥ sva aṃśam eva bāhya tayā adhyavasyantaḥ mithyā bhūtāḥ pratyaya tvāt svapna pratyaya vat śuktakārajata ādi pratyaya vat ca
svapna ādi pratyayāḥ hi yathā avagamyamāna bāhya artha abhāvāt deśa antara kāla antara vartinām ca
saṃnihita deśa kāla tayā pratibhāsa saṃbhavāt kvacid kadācid api asaṃbhavatām sva śiraḥ cheda ādīnām
svapne pratibhāsāt avaśyam sva ātmānam eva bahis vat gṛhṇanti iti abhyupagantavyam
atas tad sāmānyāt jāgrat jñānānām api sva aṃśa paryavasāyi tvāt mithyātvam iti prāpte
abhidhīyate
na tāvat svapna ādi pratyayāḥ sva aṃśa avalambanāḥ
te pi bāhya artham eva anyathā asantam eva anyathā gṛhṇanti iti vakṣyāmaḥ
bhavatu vā tatra ātma khyānam
na etāvatā nīla ādi pratyayāḥ tathā bhavitum arhanti

original: tatra hi nīlamidaṃ pītamidaṃ stambho 'yaṃ ghaṭo 'yamityevamidamākārāspadībhūtaṃ bāhyaṃ nīlādi pratyakṣeṇāvagamyamānaṃ na śakyamanumānenāpahnotum
analyzed: tatra hi nīlam idam pītam idam stambhaḥ yam ghaṭaḥ yam iti evam idam ākāra āspadībhūtam bāhyam nīla ādi pratyakṣeṇa avagamyamānam na śakyam anumānena apahnotum
ātma grāhi tve hi aham nīlam iti syāt
tat evam pratyakṣam eva bāhya artham upasthāpya tad apahnava pravṛttasya anumānasya udayam niruṇaddhi
svapna ādiṣu tu bādhakena jñāna antareṇa bāhya sadbhāva nirākaraṇāt yujyeta ātma khyātiḥ
na tu iha tathā bādhakam asti anyat bhavat uktāt anumānāt
na ca anumānam alam bādhitum iti uktam
dūṣaṇa sahasram ca asya anumānasya vārtike prapañcitam iti uparamyate
yoga ācāra sautrāntikayoḥ kalahaḥ

original: evamanumāne pratyakṣavirodhena nirākṛte pratyakṣasya bahiḥpravṛttau sāmarthye nāstītyevaṃ pūrvoktākṣepeṇa śūnyastvityādinā sa eva śūnyavādī  #
analyzed: evam anumāne pratyakṣa virodhena nirākṛte pratyakṣasya bahis pravṛttau sāmarthye na asti iti evam pūrva ukta ākṣepeṇa śūnyaḥ tu ityādinā saḥ eva śūnyavādī
punar pratyakṣa avatiṣṭhate

original: tadihaivaṃ cintyate- yadidaṃ nīlamidaṃ pītamidamiti nīlādyākāraṃ vastu prathate tatkiṃ vijñānameva tathā prathate kiṃvā bāhyaṃ vastviti /
analyzed: tat iha evam cintyate yat idam nīlam idam pītam idam iti nīla ādi ākāram vastu prathate tat kim vijñānam eva tathā prathate kiṃvā bāhyam vastu iti
tad artham idam vicāryate kim vijñānam pratyakṣam uta anumeyam iti
pratyakṣa tve sati nirākārasya pratyakṣa grahaṇa yogāt

original: ākārasya caikasyaiva grahaṇāt gṛhyamāṇa ākāro jñāna evāvatiṣṭhata ityarthasyāgṛhyamāṇatvādasattvameva bhavati /
analyzed: ākārasya ca ekasya eva grahaṇāt gṛhyamāṇaḥ ākāraḥ jñāne eva avatiṣṭhate iti arthasya a gṛhyamāṇa tvāt asattvam eva bhavati
anumeya tve tu bāhya artham vinā anumāna asaṃbhavāt bāhya artha siddhiḥ
tatra jñānam eva evam ākāram ātmanā prathate kutas
na apratyakṣasya tasya asti pramāṇa antarataḥ gatiḥ
saṃvedya tvāt ca nīla ādeḥ jñāna ākāra tva niścayaḥ
artha antarasya ca grāhya lakṣaṇam nahi yujyate

original: yo hi vijñānapratyakṣamicchati tasya jñānameva na sidhyet pramāṇāntarasaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: yaḥ hi vijñāna pratyakṣam icchati tasya jñānam eva na sidhyet pramāṇa antara saṃbhavāt
anumānam iti ced
na liṅga abhāvāt
na tāvat arthaḥ liṅgam
vinā api tena suṣupti ādi avasthāyām artha sadbhāva abhyupagamāt

original: arthavyavahāro liṅgaṃ - sa hi kādācitkaṃ kāraṇaṃ kalpayatīticet,
analyzed: artha vyavahāraḥ liṅgam sa hi kādācitkam kāraṇam kalpayati iti ced
evam tu prāk vyavahārāt jñāna pratibhāsaḥ na syāt

original: avyavahārannapi ghaṭaṃ paśyan jāne 'haṃ ghaṭamiti jñānamanusaṃdhatte
analyzed: avyavahārān api ghaṭam paśyan jāne haṃ ghaṭam iti jñānam anusaṃdhatte
iti pratīti sākṣikam
artha dharmaḥ jñāna janmā liṅgam iti ced na
tad sadbhāve pramāṇa abhāvāt
atīta anāgatayoḥ ca arthayoḥ dharma asaṃbhavāt atīta ādi anumāne jñāna siddhiḥ na syāt
tasmāt avaśyam vijñānam pratyakṣam eṣitavyam
evam ca tasya eva ayam ākāraḥ iti niṣpramāṇakaḥ ṛthaḥ
kiñca vedya tvāt api nīla ādeḥ jñāna ākāra tvam
na hi anātmanaḥ nīlasya pīta vat vedya tā
saṃbhavati

original: yadi cārthāntaraṃ nīlaṃ tato 'sya kiṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vedyatvam /
analyzed: yadi ca artha antaram nīlam kim lakṣaṇam vedya tvam
yadi artha tva lakṣaṇam syāt
sarvam sarvasya vedyam syāt vyavasthā hetu tva bhāvāt

original: atha vyavasthāpakaṃ - ya evārtho jñānasya hetuḥ,
analyzed: atha vyavasthāpakam yaḥ eva arthaḥ jñānasya hetuḥ

original: sa eva vedyo nānya iti cet / na /
analyzed: saḥ eva vedyaḥ na anyaḥ iti ced na
netra ādeḥ api vedya tva prasaṅgāt
sādṛśyam hetu tvam ca viṣaya tvam
nīla arthaḥ ca nīla jñānena sadṛśaḥ na netram iti ced

original: evamapi samanantarapratyayasya hetutvāt vijñānatvena ca sādṛśyādviṣayatvaṃ syāt //*//
analyzed: evam api samanantara pratyayasya hetu tvāt vijñāna tvena ca sādṛśyāt viṣaya tvam syāt

original: athāsādhāraṇatvena viṣayākāreṇa sādṛśyaṃ viṣayalakṣaṇam- jñānatvaṃ hi sarvajñānasādhāraṇaṃ nīlādyākārastu keṣāñcidevāsādharaṇastena tadākāreṇa  #
analyzed: atha asādhāraṇa tvena viṣaya ākāreṇa sādṛśyam viṣaya lakṣaṇam jñāna tvam hi sarva jñāna sādhāraṇam nīla ādi ākāraḥ tu keṣāñcid eva asādharaṇaḥ tena tad ākāreṇa
sādṛśyam viṣaya tvam

original: evamapi dhārāvāhikeṣu pūrvamuttarasya viṣayaḥ syāt- ubhayornīlarūpatvāddhetutvācca //*//
analyzed: evam api dhārāvāhikeṣu pūrvam uttarasya viṣayaḥ syāt ubhayoḥ nīla rūpa tvāt hetu tvāt ca

original: syānmatam- na sādṛśyaṃ viṣayatvaṃ kintu yo jñāne nīlādyākāraviśeṣasamarthako hetuḥ sa viṣayaḥ,
analyzed: syāt matam na sādṛśyam viṣayatvam kintu yaḥ jñāne nīla ādi ākāra viśeṣa samarthakaḥ hetuḥ sa viṣayaḥ
samanantara pratyayaḥ tu na nīla ādi ākārāṇām samarpakaḥ
tathā asati nīla jñāna antaram sarvadā eva nīla vijñānam syāt
tatra ekasmin saṃtāne nīla pīta ādi vicitra artha saṃnidhi viśeṣa kṛtaḥ ca ayam vicitra ākāra udayaḥ iti arthasya eva grāhya tvam
punar yoga ācāra śaṅkā
nanu kārya bhūta samaye kāraṇa bhūtasya arthasya kṣaṇika tvena atīta tvāt katham pratyakṣa grāhya tvam
etat eva arthasya grāhya tvam yat jñāna ākāra arpaṇa kṣama hetu tvam

original: yathāhuḥ- bhinnakālaṃ kathaṃ grāhyamiti cedgrāhyatāṃ viduḥ //
analyzed: yathā āhuḥ bhinna kālam katham grāhyam iti ced grāhya tām viduḥ
hetu tvam eva tat yuktam jñāna ākāra arpaṇa kṣamam iti
yadi evam kasya ayam ākāraḥ yaḥ vartamānaḥ prathate

original: yadi jñānasyaiva tarhi arthasyāprathamānasya sadbhāve jñānaṃ prati hetutve ca kaṃ pramāṇam /
analyzed: yadi jñānasya eva tarhi arthasya aprathamānasya sadbhāve jñānam prati hetu tve ca kam pramāṇam
jñāna vaicitryam eva
na hi tad samanantara pratyaya mātrāt saṃbhavati iti uktam
evam tarhi anumeya ūrthaḥ katham pratyakṣa grāhyaḥ iti ucyate
etat eva hi pratyakṣa grāhya tvam arthasya yat sākṣāt ākāra samarpaṇena hetu tvam
yaḥ tu paraṃparayā jñāna ākāra samarpakaḥ hetuḥ ca saḥ nu meyaḥ
tat yathā vahni sva lakṣaṇam dhūma sva lakṣaṇa tad darśana tad vikalpa praṇāḍyā vahni jñānam janayat anumeyam

original: ata eva pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca dve eva pramāṇe jñānārthayorbhinnatvāt /
analyzed: atas eva pratyakṣam anumānam ca dve eva pramāṇe jñāna arthayoḥ bhinna tvāt
asati tādātmye tad utpatti nibandhanaḥ eva jñānāt artha niścayaḥ

original: tatra sākṣādutpattau pratyakṣaṃ praṇāḍyau tvanumānamiti dve eva vidhe /
analyzed: tatra sākṣāt utpattau pratyakṣam praṇāḍyau tu anumānam iti dve eva vidhe
ete eva viṣaya sādṛśyam eva prāmāṇyam tad adhīna tvāt artha viśeṣa vyavasthāpanasya

original: na hi jñānamityeva nīlavedanaṃ bhavati pītādāvapi tulyatvāt /
analyzed: na hi jñānam iti eva nīla vedanam bhavati pīta ādau api tulya tvāt

original: yathāhuḥ- nahi saṃvittisattayaiva tadvedanā yuktā tasyāḥ sarvatrāviśeṣādaviśeṣaprasaṅgāt,
analyzed: yathā āhuḥ nahi saṃvitti sattayā eva tad vedanā yuktā tasyāḥ sarvatra aviśeṣāt aviśeṣa prasaṅgāt
tām tu sārūpyam āviśat sarūpayitum ghaṭayet iti

original: tasmātsākāre vijñāne siddhamarthasya sattvaṃ grāhyalakṣaṇaṃ ceti sautrāntikāḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt sa ākāre vijñāne siddham arthasya sattvam grāhya lakṣaṇam ca iti sautrāntikāḥ

original: atra vadāmaḥ- syādidaṃ grāhyalakṣaṇaṃ yadyarthasyākārasamarpakatve hetutve vā pramāṇaṃ syāt,
analyzed: atra vadāmaḥ syāt idam grāhya lakṣaṇam yadi arthasya ākāra samarpaka tve hetu tve vā pramāṇam syāt
na tu tat asti
samanantara pratyaya viśeṣāt eva vicitra ākāra udaya saṃbhavāt

original: tathāhi- tvayāpi hi svapnāvasthāyāmasatyapyarthasaṃnidhau jñānavaicitryadarśanādavaśyaṃ samanantarapratyayakṛtatvamaṅgīkartavyam /
analyzed: tathā hi tvayā api hi svapna avasthāyām asati api artha saṃnidhau jñāna vaicitrya darśanāt avaśyam samanantara pratyaya kṛta tvam aṅgīkartavyam
evam ced jāgrat pratyayānām api tathā evā astu kim artha grahaṇena
atas na hetu tvam grāhya lakṣaṇam

original: atha jñāninibandhano yatropādānādivyavahāraḥ sa viṣaya ityucyate,
analyzed: atha jñāni nibandhanaḥ yatra upādāna ādi vyavahāraḥ sa viṣayaḥ iti ucyate

original: tathāsati nīlajñānasya nīlāntargatāḥ paramāṇavo rasādayaśca viṣayabhāvamaśruvīran,
analyzed: tathā asati nīla jñānasya nīla antargatāḥ paramāṇavaḥ rasa ādayaḥ ca viṣaya bhāvam aśruvīran
upādīyaṃmāna tvāt
atha dravyasya eva upādānam na guṇānām rasa ādīnām

original: evaṃ tarhi rūpasyāpi viṣayatvaṃ na syāt /
analyzed: evam tarhi rūpasya api viṣaya tvam na syāt
kiñca sukha arthaḥ

original: vyavahāro 'to 'nubhūte sukhe na kaścitsukhaviṣayo vyavahāro 'sti na ca saṃbhavati,
analyzed: sukhe na kaścid sukha viṣayaḥ vyavahāraḥ sti na ca saṃbhavati
yatas sukha pratibaddha vyavahāraḥ sti iti katham tasya viṣaya tvam
nanu nā upādānam eva vyavahāraḥ śabda prayogasya api vyavahāra tvāt
atas nīla jñāna nibandhana śabda prayoga gocara tvāt nīlimnaḥ viṣaya tvam
evam sukha ādeḥ api
evam api upādānasya api vyavahāra tvāt tagat viṣaya bhūtānām paramāṇūnām viṣaya tva āpattiḥ tad avasthā eva

original: kiñca na śabdaprayogavaśena jñānasya viṣayanirūpaṇaṃ śakyaṃ viparītatvāt /
analyzed: kiñca na śabda prayoga vaśena jñānasya viṣaya nirūpaṇam śakyam viparīta tvāt
artha saṃbaddha śabda prayogaḥ hi lakṣaṇam na śabda mātra prayogaḥ

original: pratyāyyapratyāyakatvameva hi śabdārthayoḥ saṃbandho 'to yadarthaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ yaḥ śabdo janayati sa tasya vācyaḥ,
analyzed: pratyāyya pratyāyaka tvam eva hi śabda arthayoḥ yad artha viṣayam jñānam yaḥ śabdaḥ janayati sa tasya vācyaḥ
atas jñāna viṣaya nirūpaṇa pūrvakam śabda viṣaya nirūpaṇam
tad adhīne tu tasmin duruttaram itaretarāśrayam āpadyeta
jñāna janya atiśaya bhāktvam eva grāhya tvam iti ced
na asau upalabhyate
na ca saṃbhavati bhūta bhaviṣyatoḥ iti uktam

original: atha saṃprayuktendriyajaṃ jñānaṃ yatvyāptaliṅgajaṃ vā sa viṣaya iti matam /
analyzed: atha saṃprayukta indriya jam jñānam yat vyāpta liṅga jam vā sa viṣayaḥ iti matam

original: tato netrajanyasya nīlajñānasya sparśo viṣayaḥ syāt,
analyzed: tatas netra janyasya nīla jñānasya sparśaḥ viṣayaḥ syāt

original: asti ca sparśasyāpi rūpasyaiva saṃyuktasamavāyalakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandho netreṇa /
analyzed: asti ca sparśasya api rūpasya eva saṃyukta samavāya lakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ netreṇa

original: tathā gandhaliṅgasya rasānumānasya rūpamapi viṣayaḥ syāt,
analyzed: tathā gandha liṅgasya rasa anumānasya rūpam api viṣayaḥ syāt
rūpeṇa api rasena iva tasya vyāpta tvāt
tasmāt jñāna ātmaka tvam eva nīla ādeḥ viṣaya lakṣaṇam iti siddham tādātmyam

original: sahopalambhaniyamo 'pi jñānārthayoraniyamavyāptaṃ bhedaṃ vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhyā pratiṣedhanna bhedamupasthāpayati,
analyzed: saha upalambha niyamaḥ pi jñāna arthayoḥ aniyama vyāptam bhedam vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhyā pratiṣedhan na bhedam upasthāpayati
bhinnānām ghaṭa paṭa ādīnām aniyata sahopalambha tvāt

original: na cāsiddhau vedyopalambhasamaye vitterupalambha iti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca asiddhau vedya upalambha samaye vitteḥ upalambhaḥ iti vācyam

original: uttarakālaṃ sahaiva jñānena viṣayasmaraṇadarśanāt- jñāto ghaṭa iti /
analyzed: uttara kālam saha eva jñānena viṣaya smaraṇa darśanāt jñātaḥ ghaṭaḥ iti
na ca anubhūtasya smaraṇam saṃbhavati
tasmāt utpatti velāyām eva jñānasya
prakāśanam aṅgīkartavyam

original: na ca nirākārasyopalabdhirastīti siddhaṃ jñānātmakatvaṃ nīlādeḥ /
analyzed: na ca nirākārasya upalabdhiḥ asti iti siddham jñāna ātmaka tvam nīla ādeḥ
avaśyam ca svapna ādi bodhe bandhyā sutaḥ yāti
aṅguli agre hasti yūtha śatam ityādau ca atyanta asaṃbhavāt bāhyasya jñāna ātmaka tvam eva akāraṇām abhyupagantavyam
tathā anyatra api astu
tasmāt na bāhyam asti iti prāpte
abhidhīyate nīla ādi vitteḥ ātma aṃśa grāhi tvam kena gṛhyate
na ātmanā na anya saṃvittyā sā api hi ātma avasāyinī
ajñāna sthira citra tva bāhya tva ādeḥ anātmanaḥ

original: asato vā sato vāpi kathaṃ vijñānavedyatā //
analyzed: asataḥ vā sataḥ vā api katham vijñāna vedya tā

original: vijñānavādī hi sarvameva vijñānamātmanameva gṛhṇāti nānyat,
analyzed: vijñāna vādī hi sarvam eva vijñānam ātmanam eva gṛhṇāti na anyat
atmanā eva ca gṛhyate na anyena
tasya api anyasya sva ātma paryavasāyi tvāt iti vadati
yathā uktam na anyaḥ nubhāvyaḥ buddhyā asti tasyāḥ paraḥ

original: grāhyagrāhakavaidhuryātsvayaṃ saiva prakāśate iti tamevaṃvādinaṃ pratyucyate- nīlajñānasyātmāvasāyitvaṃ nīlasya ca vijñānakāraṇatvaṃ kena jñānena  #
analyzed: grāhya grāhaka vaidhuryāt svayam sā eva prakāśate iti tam evaṃvādinam pratyucyate nīla jñānasya ātma avasāyi tvam nīlasya ca vijñāna kāraṇa tvam kena jñānena
gṛhyate

original: na tāvadātmanaiva - nahi nīlamidamityatra svātmaparyavasāyitvaṃ nīlākārasya ca jñānātmakatvaṃ prakāśate nīmamātraprakāśanāt /
analyzed: na tāvat ātmanā eva nahi nīlam idam iti atra svātma paryavasāyi tvam nīla ākārasya ca jñāna ātmaka tvam prakāśate nīma mātra prakāśanāt
saṃvedya tva grāhya lakṣaṇa yoga saha upalambha niyama ādi liṅga nimittakena tu anumānena eva tat avagantavyam tat api tu anumānam ātma aṃśa grāhi ced
na jñāna antarasya sva ātma paryavasāyi tām grahītum alam
atha anumānam na sva ātma aṃśa grāhi
tatas nīla ādi vijñānaiḥ kim aparāddham
yena tāni idaṅkāra āspadībhūta bāhya nīla ādi prakāśaka tvena avabhāsamānāni api sva ātmani eva avarudhyante

original: na hi tadaitadvaktuṃ śakyam- nānātmanaḥ saṃvedanaṃ grāhyalakṣaṇaṃ sahopalambhaniyamo vā saṃbhavatīti /
analyzed: na hi tadā etat vaktum śakyam na anātmanaḥ saṃvedanam grāhya lakṣaṇam saha upalambha niyamaḥ vā saṃbhavati iti
teṣām sarveṣām eva a tasmin na eva bhavadīye numāne vyabhicārāt
tat khalu ātmānam atikramya nīla ādi vitteḥ nīla ādi ātma bhūta sva ātma aṃśa avasāyi tām gṛhṇāti iti abhyupagantavyam
tasya api
svātma paryavasāyi tve nīla buddheḥ tad vaśena svātma aṃśa grāhi tā na siddhyet
caitra ādi pratyayānām ca nirālambana tā yadi
dharma bhūtā na gṛhyeta sādhana utthitayā dhiyā
tatas viṣaya nānātvāt pratiyogī anirākṛtā
rūpāt sa ālambana prāptiḥ satī kena nicāryate iti
kiñca ajñānam iti asya jñānasya jñāna abhāvaḥ grāhyaḥ
na ca jñāna abhāvasya jñāna ātma tā saṃbhavati
atyanta viparīta tvāt
tathā tat eva igadam iti jñāne pūrva apara kāla avasthāyi tvam prakāśate
na ca kṣaṇikasya jñānasya sthāyi tvam ātmā saṃbhavati
tathā citra buddhau nānā kāraṇām avabhāsaḥ
na ca ekasya jñānasya nānā ākāra tā saṃbhavati

original: nanvarthasyāpi sthāyitvamekasya ca nānākāraṇatvaṃ na saṃbhavatyeva,
analyzed: nanu arthasya api sthāyi tvam ekasya ca nānā kāraṇa tvam na saṃbhavati eva
saṃbhavatu vā mā vā
jñāna ātma tā tāvat na saṃbhavati
tad asaṃbhave ca artha ākārau vā sthāyi tva citra tve syātām
atyanta asat rūpe vā
dvaidhā api jñāna anātmakayoḥ jñānena grahaṇāt siddham naḥ samīhitam
tathā bāhyam na asti iti niṣedhayatā avaśyam buddhau āropayitavyam
jñāna atiriktam ca bāhyam
na ca jñāna ākāra tā tasya saṃbhavati
tasmāt evamādi siddhi artham avaśyam vijñānānām anātma grāhi tvam balāt abhyupagantavyam
bhavadīya anumāna artham ca

original: tadevaṃ saṃvidbalasiddhasya bāhyasya saṃbhave vedyatvādibhirnāpahnavaḥ saṃbhavati,
analyzed: tat evam saṃvid bala siddhasya bāhyasya saṃbhave vedya tva ādibhiḥ na apahnavaḥ saṃbhavati
bāhyasya eva hi tadā saṃvedya tvam darśana balāt abhyupagamyate

original: pratyutātmana eva saṃvedyatvaṃ na saṃbhavati- nīlādivittīnāmidaṃ nīlamidaṃ pītamityanātmāvabhāsitvāt ātmāvabhāsitvābhāvāt //*//
analyzed: pratyuta ātmanaḥ eva saṃvedya tvam na saṃbhavati nīla ādi vittīnām idam nīlam idam pītam iti anātma avabhāsi tvāt ātma avabhāsi tva abhāvāt
ahaṃpratyayaḥ tarhi jñāna avalambanaḥ bhavatu

original: so 'pi kartravalambano na jñānāvalambana ityātmavāde vakṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ pi kartṛ avalambanaḥ na jñāna avalambanaḥ iti ātma vāde vakṣyāmaḥ
tathā grāhya lakṣaṇam api bāhyasya eva kiñcid eṣṭavyam

original: anyathā nīlādivittīnāṃ svāṃśaparyavasāyitvasādhanārthasya tadīyānumānasya nīlādivittigataṃ svāṃśaviṣayatvaṃ grāhyaṃ na syāt,
analyzed: anyathā nīla ādi vittīnām sva aṃśa paryavasāyi tva sādhana arthasya tadīya anumānasya nīla ādi vitti gatam sva aṃśa viṣaya tvam grāhyam na syāt
sthāyi tva ādayaḥ ca tad buddhīnām
jñāna anumeya tva sthāpanam
tad lakṣaṇam ca itareṣām ukta doṣa tvāt jñāna janya phala bhāgi tvam eva āśriyatavyam

original: jñānakriyā hi sakarmikā karmabhūter'the phalaṃ janayati pākādivat,
analyzed: jñāna kriyā hi sa karmikā karma bhūta īrthe phalam janayati pāka ādi vat
tat ca phalam indriyaka jñāna janyam āparokṣyam
liṅga ādi jñāna janyam tu pārokṣyam iti ucyate

original: asti hi viṣayāviṣayavibhāgaḥ viṣayeṣvapi parokṣāparokṣavibhāgaḥ sārvajanīnaḥ /
analyzed: asti hi viṣaya aviṣaya vibhāgaḥ viṣayeṣu api parokṣa aparokṣa vibhāgaḥ sārvajanīnaḥ

original: na ca phalamantareṇāyaṃ vibhāgaḥ saṃbhavatīti tadāśrīyate /
analyzed: na ca phalam antareṇa ayam vibhāgaḥ saṃbhavati iti tat āśrīyate

original: tadeva ca phalaṃ kāryabhūtaṃ kāraṇabhūtaṃ vijñānamupakalpayatīti siddhyatyapratyakṣamapi jñānam //*//
analyzed: tat eva ca phalam kārya bhūtam kāraṇa bhūtam vijñānam upakalpayati iti siddhi ati apratyakṣam api jñānam

original: athavā jñānakriyādvārako yaḥ kartṛbhūtasyātmanaḥ karmamabhūtasya cārthasya parasparaṃ saṃbandho vyāptṛvyāpyatvalakṣaṇaḥ sa mānasapratyakṣāvagato  #
analyzed: athavā jñāna kriyā dvārakaḥ yaḥ kartṛ bhūtasya ātmanaḥ ca arthasya parasparam saṃbandhaḥ vyāptṛ vyāpya tva lakṣaṇaḥ sa mānasa pratyakṣa avagataḥ
vijñānam klapayati
na hi āgantuka kāraṇam antareṇa ātmanaḥ ṛtham prati vyāptṛ tva tvam utpattum arhati
tat ca kāraṇam loke jñāna śabdena abhidhīyate

original: ye 'pi svaprakāśaṃ saṃvidamātiṣṭhante tairapyayaṃ saṃbandho mānasapratyakṣagamyo 'vaśyamabhyupagamanīyaḥ /
analyzed: ye pi sva prakāśam saṃvidam ātiṣṭhante taiḥ api ayam saṃbandhaḥ mānasa pratyakṣa gamyaḥ vaśyam abhyupagamanīyaḥ

original: anyathā jñāto mayā ghaṭaḥ iti jñānajñeyasaṃbandho vā na vyavahartuṃ śakyate /
analyzed: anyathā jñātaḥ mayā ghaṭaḥ iti jñāna jñeya saṃbandhaḥ vā na vyavahartum śakyate

original: yanmātraṃ hi prakāśitaṃ tanmātrameva vyavahartuṃ śakyate nānyat //*//
analyzed: yanmātram hi prakāśitam tanmātram eva vyavahartum śakyate na anyat
iha ca saṃvid mātram svayam prakāśitam
arthaḥ pi tad vaśāt
jñāna saṃbandhaḥ tu kena prakāśitaḥ

original: so 'pi tayaiva saṃvidā prakāśata iti cet / na /
analyzed: saḥ u pi tayā eva saṃvidā prakāśate iti ced na
tad utpatti avasthāyām saṃbandhasya aniṣpanna tvāt

original: prakāśakatvameva hi saṃvidā viṣayeṇa saṃbandho nānyaḥ,
analyzed: prakāśaka tvam eva hi saṃvidā viṣayeṇa saṃbandhaḥ nā anyaḥ

original: tena jātāyāṃ saṃvidi viṣaye ca prakāśite
analyzed: tena jātāyām saṃvidi viṣaye ca prakāśite

original: niṣpadyamānaḥ saṃbandho na tayā saṃvidā śakyate viṣayīkartum,
analyzed: niṣpadyamānaḥ saṃbandhaḥ na tayā saṃvidā śakyate viṣayīkartum
viramya vyāpāra asaṃbhavāt

original: nahi prathamamarthaṃ prakāśya punaḥsaṃbandhaṃ prakāśayitumarhati kṣaṇikatvāt //*//
analyzed: nahi prathamam artham prakāśya punar saṃbandham prakāśayitum arhati kṣaṇika tvāt
atha saṃbandhaḥ u pi svayam prakāśate iti manyethāḥ
na atra pramāṇam asti
tasmāt mānasa pratyakṣa gamyaḥ ūrthena saha ātmanaḥ saṃbandhaḥ jñānam kalpayati iti
ramaṇīyam

original: asti hi ko 'pi saṃbandhor'thena sahātmano mānasapratyakṣagamyaḥ sarvajanīnaḥ sa jñānasya kalpakaḥ /
analyzed: asti hi kaḥ pi saṃbandha ūrthena saha ātmanaḥ mānasa pratyakṣa gamyaḥ sarvajanīnaḥ sa jñānasya kalpakaḥ
artha gataḥ vā jñāna janya u tiśayaḥ kalpayati jñānam
avaśyam aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ ca ayam atiśayaḥ tritaya pratibhāsa vādibhiḥ api

original: tritayaṃ pratibhāsata iti vadatā jñānajñeyajñātṛṣu triṣvapyanugataṃ prakāśanapadavācyamavaśyamaṅgīkartavyam /
analyzed: tritayam pratibhāsate iti vadatā jñāna jñeya jñātṛṣu triṣu api anugatam prakāśana pada vācyam avaśyam aṅgīkartavyam

original: tatra jñānatvaṃ tāvannānugatam- taddhi jñāne eva na jñātṛjñeyayoḥ /
analyzed: tatra jñāna tvam tāvat na anugatam tat hi jñāne eva na jñātṛ jñeyayoḥ
jñeya tvam api jñeye eva na jñātṛ jñānayoḥ
jñātṛ tvam jñāna jñeyayoḥ
vyavahāra viṣaya tvam prakāśamāna tvam ita ced na
saṃvidi vyavahāra abhāvāt vinaṣṭa tvāt
śabda prayogaḥ vyavahāraḥ iti ced na
ukta doṣa tvāt
tat avaśyam prakāśana bhāsana ādi paryāyaḥ dharma viśeṣaḥ triṣu api anuvṛttaḥ go tvam iva go vyaktiṣu asti

original: saca dharmo jñātari jñeye ca jñānavaśājjñāyate,
analyzed: saca dharmaḥ jñātari jñeye ca jñāna vaśāt jñāyate
jñānasya tu svābhāvikaḥ gneḥ iva auṣṇyaum iti sva prakāśam jñānam
itarau paraprakāśyau iti āśrayaṇīyam
tad nimittam ca viṣayasya viṣaya tvam
vyavahāra ādīnām hi viṣaya lakṣaṇa tvam prāk eva dūṣitam

original: ekadeśināṃ tu- vyavahāranibandhanaviṣayatāṅgīkaraṇe rajatavitteḥ śaktikā viṣayaḥ syāt,
analyzed: eka deśinām tu vyavahāra nibandhana viṣaya tā aṅgīkaraṇe rajata vitteḥ śaktikā viṣayaḥ syāt
na ca evam icchanti

original: tadevavivādasiddher'thagate 'tiśaye tenaiva jñānasyānumānaṃ pūrvoktena vā mānasapratyakṣagamyena saṃbandhena saṃbhavati /
analyzed: tat eva vivāda siddhi ṛtha gate tiśaye tena eva jñānasya anumānam pūrva uktena vā mānasa pratyakṣa gamyena saṃbandhena saṃbhavati
atikrānta divasa gata daśa tva ādi saṃkhyā vat ca asatoḥ bhūta bhaviṣyatoḥ avidyamāna tve pi dharmiṇaḥ prakāśana dharmaḥ jāyate iti pramāṇa balāt abyupagamyate
atas na pratyakṣa tvam saṃvidaḥ bhyupagantavyam
punar vijñāna vāda khaṇḍanam
na ca pratīti balāt api pratyakṣa tvam
a sa samaye saṃvidaḥ pratibhāsaḥ eva na asti
natarām āparokṣyam

original: evaṃ ca sahopalambhasyaivābhāvāttanniyamo ya uktaḥ sa dūrāpāsta iti pratyuktametat- sahopalambhaniyamādabhedo nīlataddhitayoḥ iti /
analyzed: evam ca saha upalambhasya eva abhāvāt tad niyamaḥ yaḥ uktaḥ sa dūra apāstaḥ iti pratyuktam etat saha upalambha niyamāt abhedaḥ nīla tad hitayoḥ iti
yat tu paścāt smaraṇasya darśana jñānam api prāk anubhūtam iti
tat api asiddham
arthaḥ eva hi tadā smaryate
tad tad smaraṇāt ca tadā eva artha vyāptiḥ ātmanaḥ manasā avagamyate
tad haśāt ca tadā arthe tāvat jñānam kalpayati

original: tasya jñānasyendriyādikāraṇābhāvātsmṛtitvaṃ niścitya smṛtikāraṇabhūtaṃ pūrvajñānaṃ tadaiva kalpayatīti nāsya smaraṇam //*//
analyzed: tasya jñānasya indriya ādi kāraṇa abhāvāt smṛti tvam niścitya smṛti kāraṇa bhūtam pūrva jñānam tadā eva kalpayati iti na asya smaraṇam
itas ca na nīla ādeḥ jñāna ātmaka tvam
anumāna ādiṣu viṣaya ākārāṇām parokṣa tvāt
jñānasya ca sarvatra pratyakṣa tva a byupagamāt
nahi parokṣa aparokṣayoḥ eka tvam saṃbhavati
evam atyanta asat rūpa tvena abhimatasya sthāyi tva ādeḥ sat rūpa jñāna ātmaka tvam atyanta aṃsaṃbhāvyam
tathā bhūta anumāneṣu bhūta tvam avabhāsate

original: na ca vartamānasya jñānasya bhūtatvamātmā saṃbhavati //*//
analyzed: na ca vartamānasya jñānasya bhūta tvam ātmā saṃbhavati

original: bhinnatve 'pi grāhakādgrāhyasya jñānamevātītamuttarasya grāhyaṃ nārtha iti cet, na,
analyzed: bhinna tve pi grāhakāt grāhyasya jñānam eva atītam uttarasya grāhyam na arthaḥ iti ced na
pramāṇa abhāvāt

original: atra cātītaṃ tredhā vikalpya atītaṃ yacca vijñānamityādinā dūṣaṇamityuktam /
analyzed: atra ca atītam tredhā vikalpya atītam yat ca vijñānam ityādinā dūṣaṇam iti uktam

original: uttaramapi tredhaiva vikalpya dvyākāraklapanāyāṃ ca ityādinā dūṣaṇamityuktamiti vivecanīyam /
analyzed: uttaram api tredhā eva vikalpya dvi ākāra klapanāyām ca ityādinā dūṣaṇam iti uktam iti vivecanīyam
tasmāt idam api vaibhāṣika matam ayuktam eva
tasmāt bāhya artha ākāraḥ eva nīla ādiḥ na jñāna ākāraḥ
katham tarhi svapne

original: tatrāpi bāhyameva deśakālāntaragatamadṛṣṭodbodhitasaṃskāravaśātsmaryamāṇaṃ nidrā- dūṣitamanaskatayā bhrāntyā saṃnihitadeśakālamiva manyate
analyzed: tatra api bāhyam eva deśa kāla antara gatam adṛṣṭa udbodhita saṃskāra vaśāt smaryamāṇam nidrā dūṣita manaska tayā bhrāntyā saṃnihita deśa kālam iva manyate
vispaṣṭam ca etat anantara divasa anubhūtasya svapne vartamāna avabhāsa darśanāt
anyatra api svapne tathā aṅgīkartum yuktam
śiraḥ chedaḥ pi anyatra avagataḥ sva saṃbandhi tayā doṣa vaśāt avagamyate
sarvatra saṃsarga mātram asat eva avabhāsate
saṃsargiṇaḥ tu santaḥ eva
sā iyam viparīta khyātiḥ ucyate mīmāṃsakaiḥ
asat khyāti vādinasya eva śuktikā śakalasya anātma bhūtā eva ātmatayā avagamyate

original: tathā vandhyāsutādiṣvapi vidyamāna eva sutaśabdārtho vandhyānvitatayā tatpadasaṃnidhidoṣādavagamyate //
analyzed: tathā vandhyā suta ādiṣu api vidyamānaḥ eva suta śabda arthaḥ vandhyā anvita tayā tad pada saṃnidhi doṣāt avagamyate
svīya viparīta khyāti mata upanyāsaḥ
yat tu kaiścid evamādiṣu tad ākāra avabhāsam apahnutya bhrāntiḥ iti uktam
tad saṃvid virodhāt eva upekṣaṇīyam

original: ko hi nāmāṅgulinipīḍitadṛṣṭiścandradvitvaṃ na prakāśata iti brūyāt /
analyzed: kaḥ hi nāma aṅguli nipīḍita dṛṣṭiḥ candra dvi tvam na prakāśate iti brūyāt

original: kiñcaikaṃ evāyaṃ candro na dvāvivekaṃ candrasya vispaṣṭamanusaṃdadhānasya cakṣuṣā dvitvabhramo jāyamānaḥ kathaṃ vivekāgrahaṇanimittaḥ syāt
analyzed: kiñca ekam eva ayam candraḥ na dvi a vivekam candrasya vispaṣṭam anusaṃdadhānasya cakṣuṣā dvi tva bhramaḥ jāyamānaḥ katham viveka agrahaṇa nimittaḥ syāt
evam avagata dikkasya diś bhramaḥ na agraha nimittaḥ saṃbhavati
katham punar dvi tvasya avagamaḥ
na smaraṇam
tad hetu abhāvāt
na grahaṇam
a prāptasya cakṣuṣā grahaṇa saṃbhavāt
ucyate deśa dvayam netreṇa prāptam candraḥ ca
tayoḥ ca saṃsargaḥ doṣa vaśāt avagamyate
deśa dvaye candram pratītya deśa gatam dvi tvam doṣa vaśāt candre dhī avasyati

original: tathā pittavartipītatvaṃ śaṅkhasvarūpaṃ ca cakṣuṣā gṛhṇandoṣavaśātsaṃbandhaṃ budhyata ityavagantavyam //*//
analyzed: tathā pitta varti pīta tvam śaṅkha svarūpam ca cakṣuṣā gṛhṇan doṣa vaśāt saṃbandham budhyate iti avagantavyam

original: kiñca yadi samyagrajatabodhe tādātmyavabhāsate na śuktirajatavedane tato 'vabhāsyabhedādavabhāsasya vailakṣaṇyaṃ prāgeva bādhakādanusaṃdhātuṃ  #
analyzed: kiñca yadi samyak rajata bodhe tādātmyam avabhāsate na śukti rajata vedane tatas vabhāsya bhedāt avabhāsasya vailakṣaṇyam prāk eva bādhakāt anusaṃdhātum
śaknuyāt
vailakṣaṇya avagamāt ca na pravarteta
kiñca yadi rajata arthī śukteḥ upādānam kāryatayā avagacchet
kāryasya kārya tayā bhā nāga dviparīta khyāti āpattiḥ
atha na avagacchet
na pravarteta tad kārya avagama adhīna tvāt pravṛtteḥ
atha kārya tva anavagame pi tad kārya avagati sādṛśyāt pravṛttiḥ
tatas tad kārya avagati sādṛśyam api asti iti nivṛttiḥ api syāt sādṛśyayoḥ aviśeṣāt

original: nacāsati kāraṇe kāraṇasadṛśaṃ tatkāryaṃ sādhayitumarhati- māsīṣadhacchuktikārajatakāryamābharaṇam //*//
analyzed: na ca asati kāraṇe kāraṇa sadṛśam tat kāryam sādhayitum arhati
nanu vrīhi kāryam apūrvam nīvāraḥ sādhayanti
na evam
vrīhi aṃśāḥ eva tatra kāryam kurvanti

original: teca vikalāḥ santo 'pyaśaktyavasthāyāṃ tatsādhanatvena yathāśaktiprayogavidhānādavagatā iti nākāraṇāttatsadṛśātkāryotpattiḥ //*//
analyzed: te ca vikalāḥ santaḥ pi aśakti avasthāyām tad sādhana tvena yathāśakti prayoga vidhānāt avagatāḥ iti na akāraṇāt tad sadṛśāt kārya utpattiḥ
atha tu akārya anavagatiḥ eva pravṛtteḥ kāraṇam

original: tato bāhyā api vedārthe pravarteran akāryatvānavagamāt /
analyzed: tatas bāhyāḥ api veda arthe pravarteran akārya tva anavagamāt
atha tu akāryam eva te vagaccheyuḥ
tatas kāryasya akārya tayā avagamāt viparīta khyātiḥ iti āstām tāvat
tasmāt svapna ādiṣu api bāhyasya eva anyathā bhūtasya eva anyathā avabhāsāt siddham sarvatra bāhya ālambana tvam
atha svapna pratyaya tvāt stambha ādi vijñānam anyathā bhūtam iti anumīyate
tat asat
tathā asati pratyaya tva aviśeṣāt tvadīyam api anumānam mithyā syāt
mithyātva grāhiṇaḥ numānasya amithyātve vā tatra eva hetoḥ vyabhicāraḥ

original: tasmātsūktaṃ yasya ca duṣṭaṃ karaṇaṃ yatra ca mithyeti pratyayaḥ sa evāsamīcīnaḥ pratyayo nānyaḥ śābhā iti /
analyzed: tasmāt sūktam yasya ca duṣṭam karaṇam yatra ca mithyā iti pratyayaḥ saḥ eva asamīcīnaḥ pratyayaḥ na anyaḥ śābhāḥ iti

iti śūnya vādaḥ
