original: idānīmanumānāderavyabhicārārthe lokasiddhameva lakṣaṇamāha- anumānaṃ jñātasaṃbandhasyaikadeśadarśanīdekadeśāntare 'saṃnikṛṣṭerthe buddhiḥ śā  #
analyzed: idānīm anumāna ādeḥ avyabhicāra arthe loka siddham eva lakṣaṇam āha anumānam jñāta saṃbandhasya eka deśa darśanīt eka deśa antare saṃnikṛṣṭa ṛthe buddhiḥ śā
bhā

original: yasya yādṛśasya yena yādṛśena saha sākṣādvā praṇāḍyā vā yādṛśaḥ saṃbandhaḥ saṃyogaḥ
analyzed: yasya yādṛśasya yena yādṛśena saha sākṣāt vā praṇāḍyā vā yādṛśaḥ saṃbandhaḥ saṃyogaḥ

original: samavāya ekārthasamavāyaḥ kāryakāraṇatvamanyo vā dṛṣṭāntadharmiṣu niyato jñātastaṃ
analyzed: samavāyaḥ eka artha samavāyaḥ kārya kāraṇa tvam anyaḥ vā dṛṣṭānta dharmiṣu niyataḥ jñātaḥ tam

original: tādṛśaṃ sādhyadharmiṣu dṛṣṭavatastasmiṃstādṛśe tādṛśasaṃbandhasaṃbana adhini prabalena
analyzed: tādṛśam sādhya dharmiṣu dṛṣṭavataḥ tasmin tādṛśe tādṛśa saṃbandha saṃbana prabalena
pramāṇena tādrūpya tad viparyayābhyām aparicchinne yā buddhiḥ sā anumānam

original: yathā dhūmasyānuparatordhvagamanasyāgnisāhityaṃ mahānasādiṣu niyatamupalabdhavataḥ parvate taddarśanādagnijñānam //*//
analyzed: yathā dhūmasya anuparata ūrdhva gamanasya agni sāhityam mahānasa ādiṣu niyatam upalabdhavataḥ parvate tad darśanāt agni jñānam
anumāne prābhākara matam
nanu niyama avadhāraṇa adhīna tve katham tādrūpyeṇa aparicchinne pravṛttiḥ

original: īdṛśo hi niyamaḥ- yatra yatra dhāmastatratatrāgniḥ,
analyzed: īdṛśaḥ hi niyamaḥ yatra yatra dhāmaḥ tatra tatra agniḥ
yat yat rasavat tat tat rūpavat iti
evam ced yāvaddhūmam agni sadbhāvaḥ vagataḥ eva iti na aparicchinna viṣaya tvam anumānasya saṃbhavati iti

original: ata eva codyādbibhyataḥ kecidasaṃnikṛṣṭagrahaṇaṃ smaraṇābhimānanirāsārthaṃ vyācakṣate gṛhītagrāhitvamevānumānasya svīkurvāṇaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva codyāt bibhyataḥ kecid asaṃnikṛṣṭa grahaṇam smaraṇa abhimāna nirāsa artham vyācakṣate gṛhīta grāhi tvam eva anumānasya svīkurvāṇaḥ
tathā api na aprāmāṇyam
na hi a grahīta grahaṇam pramāṇa lakṣaṇam
anubhūtiḥ hi tad lakṣaṇam

original: anumānaṃ ca gṛhītagrāhitve 'pi pratyutpannaliṅgakāraṇajanyatvena saṃskāramātrajanyatvābhāvādanubhūtireveti yuktamasya prāmāṇyam //*//
analyzed: anumānam ca gṛhīta grāhi tve pi pratyutpanna liṅga kāraṇa janya tvena saṃskāra mātra janya tva abhāvāt anubhūtiḥ eva iti yuktam asya prāmāṇyam
atha smṛti pramoṣaḥ kasmāt na āśrīyate
pratyutpanna kāraṇa sadbhāvāt
saṃskāra atirikta kāraṇa sadbhāvena hi idam rajatam
iti atra anubhava rūpasya api rajata jñānasya balāt smṛti tvam āśritya pramoṣaḥ ṅgīkṛtaḥ
atra tu liṅgasya anubhava kāraṇasya sat bhālāt ayuktam pratīti siddhasya anubhava rūpasya apahnavena smṛti pramoṣa aṅgīkaraṇam iti
saḥ yam eṣām akāraṇakaḥ trāsaḥ
tathā hi yadi yāvat vyāpya vyāpaka sadbhāvaḥ vagataḥ syāt tatas gṛhīta grāhi tvam āśaṅkyeta api
na tu evam asti

original: mahānasādiṣveva hi dṛṣṭāntadharmiṣu prāganumānāddhūmasyāgnisāhityamavagataṃ na sarvatra,
analyzed: mahānasa ādiṣu eva hi dṛṣṭānta dharmiṣu prāk anumānāt dhūmasya agni sāhityam avagatam na sarvatra
pramāṇa saṃbhavāt
yathā ca asaṃbhavaḥ tathā nyāyaratnamālāyām eva prapañcitam

original: dṛṣṭāntadharmiṣveva bahuśo 'gnisāhityamupalabdhavato 'nagnau ca kvacidapi prayatnenānviṣyamāṇe dhūmadṛṣṭavataḥ sādhyadharmiṣvagnimattājñānamutpadyate
analyzed: dṛṣṭānta dharmiṣu eva bahuśas gni sāhityam upalabdhavataḥ na gnau ca kvacid api prayatnena anviṣyamāṇe dhūma dṛṣṭavataḥ sādhya dharmiṣu agnimat tā jñānam utpadyate
āha ca sāhitye mita deśa tvāt prasiddhe vahni dhūmayoḥ
vyatirekasya ca adṛṣṭeḥ gamaka tvam prakalpyate iti
mamatva dṛṣṭi mātreṇa gamakaḥ sahācāriṇaḥ ca
tatas ca anumitsatā na sarveṣām dhūmavatām agnimat tā avagantavyā
na api sarvatra anagnau dhūmasya abhāvaḥ
bhūyaḥ gni sāhityam vyabhicāra adarśanam iti etāvat eva anumāna arthibhiḥ abhyarthanīyam na adhikam kiñcid

original: yattvidaṃ yatra yatra dhūmastatratatrāgniriti jñānaṃ tadanumānameveti tatraivoktam //
analyzed: yat tu idam yatra yatra dhūmaḥ tatra tatra agniḥ iti jñānam tat anumānam eva iti tatra eva uktam

original: nanvevamapyanenaiva sāmānyānumānena sarvadhūmavatāmagnimattāvagateti yatpunaḥ parvatādideśaviśeṣeṣu dhūmadarśanādagnyanumānaṃ tasya gṛhītagrāhitvaṃ  #
analyzed: nanu evam api anena eva sāmānya anumānena sarva dhūmavatām agnimat tā avagatā iti yat punar parvata ādi deśa viśeṣeṣu dhūma darśanāt agni anumānam tasya gṛhīta grāhi tvam
tat avastham eva syāt
mā evam
sāmānya viśeṣa bhedāt
sāmānyena hi dhūmavatām agnimat tā avagatā
parvata ādeḥ tu deśa viśeṣasya svarūpam api prāk am avagatam
natarām agnimat tvam
yaḥ tu avagatam eva iti manyate

original: tena parvatasvarūpameva tāvadaprāptaṃ parvatasamīpasthaiḥ kena pramāṇenāvagatamiti vaktavyam,
analyzed: tena parvata sva rūpam eva tāvat aprāptam parvata samīpa sthaiḥ kena pramāṇena avagatam iti vaktavyam
na pratyakṣeṇa
na anyena pramāṇena
na ca anavagata parvataḥ tasya agnimat tām avadhārayitum alam

original: yadi cedānīntanaṃ parvatasyāgnimattvaṃ prāgevāvagataṃ syāt tato 'gnyarthī vinaiva dhūmadarśanenāgnaye parvatamārohet /
analyzed: yadi ca idānīntanam parvatasya agnimat tvam prāk eva avagatam syāt tatas gni arthī vinā eva dhūma darśanena agnaye parvatam ārohet
na hi agni arthinaḥ vagata ignau dhūma darśanena arthaḥ kaścid

original: kiñca dhūnopalakṣitasya parvatādideśaviśeṣasyāgnisaṃbandho 'vagata iti vadatā dhūmasaṃbandho 'pyavagata iti vaktavyam /
analyzed: kiñca dhūna upalakṣitasya parvata ādi deśa viśeṣasya agni saṃbandhaḥ vagataḥ iti vadatā dhūma saṃbandhaḥ u pi avagataḥ iti vaktavyam
na hi ajñāta saṃbandham upalakṣyam upalakṣayitum kṣaṇam
atha deśa mātrasya dhūmena upalakṣaṇam na deśa viśeṣasya
tatas gnimat tvam api tanmātrasya avagatam na deśa viśeṣasya

original: ato liṅgaliṅginoraviśeṣāt liṅgasyaiva deśakālātireko na liṅginaḥ iti pralāpamātram /
analyzed: atas liṅga liṅginoḥ aviśeṣāt liṅgasya eva deśa kāla atirekaḥ na liṅginaḥ iti pralāpa mātram

original: api ca yatrāgnīndhanasaṃyogastatra dhūma ityanena dhūmo 'pyavagata eveti na kiñcidapyavagantavyamavaśiṣyate dhūmajñānenetyalaṃ bālajalpitena
analyzed: api ca yatra agni indhana saṃyogaḥ tatra dhūmaḥ iti anena dhūmaḥ u pi avagataḥ eva iti na kiñcid api avagantavyam avaśiṣyate dhūma jñānena iti alam bāla jalpitena

original: yadi cāvagatamevānumānenāvagamyate tataḥ smaraṇameva pramuṣitatadbhāvamanumānajñānaṃ syāt /
analyzed: yadi ca avagatam eva anumānena avagamyate tatas smaraṇam eva pramuṣita tad bhāvam anumāna jñānam syāt
na ca pratyutpanna kāraṇa ja tvāt asmṛti tvam
saṃskāraḥ ca udbodhitaḥ smṛtim janayati iti avivādam
smṛteḥ ca pramoṣaḥ śuktikā rajata ādi vedaneṣu kḷptaḥ eva
tat evam kṛptena eva

original: mārgeṇa dhūmādagnijñānotpattau konāmākḷptam liṅgasya liṅgajñānahetutvaṃ kalpayet /
analyzed: mārgeṇa dhūmāt agni jñāna utpattau kaḥ nāma akḷptam liṅgasya liṅga jñāna hetu tvam kalpayet
klapanāyām vā śuktau api rajata vedanasya anubhava rūpa tvāt tad upapattaye doṣasya eva anubhava hetu tvam kalpanīyam
nanu agni viśeṣasya agṛhīta saṃbandhasya ema ananumeya tvāt sāmānyam eva anumeyam tat ca prāk avagatam eva iti katham agṛhīta grāhi tvam
yathā āhuḥ viśeṣe nugama abhāvaḥ sāmānye siddha sādhya tā
an umā bhaṅga paṅke smin nimagnāḥ vādi dantinaḥ iti
na eṣa doṣaḥ
avagatasya api sāmānyasya deśa antara kāla antara saṃbandhasya agṛhītasya grahaṇāt upapannam prameya tvam

original: idañcāparamekadeśinā vaktavyaṃ- kena pramāṇena dhūmadarśanasyāgnijñānahetutvamavagamyata iti /
analyzed: idam ca aparam eka deśinā vaktavyam kena pramāṇena dhūma darśanasya agni jñāna hetu tvam avagamyate iti
tad ānantaryāt iti ced na
tasya saṃskāra dvāreṇa api upapatteḥ
anubhava rūpa tvam anupapannam iti ced na
smaraṇasya api tad parāmarśa pramoṣeṇa anubhava abhimāna upapatteḥ
vastutas nubhava tvam tu asiddham eva pramāṇa abhāvāt
nahi agni jñānasya anubhava tve pratyakṣam anyat vā pramāṇam asti
asti tu smṛti pramoṣa tve
atha smṛti pramoṣasya api abādha darśanāt
maṇiprabhā darśinaḥ maṇi buddhiḥ tāvat at smṛti pramoṣaḥ eva
anyathā viparīta khyāti prasaṅgāt
atha ca pravṛttasya maṇi lābhāt na bādhakam asti
tasmāt smṛtiḥ eva anumānam iti apramāṇya āpattiḥ
katham ca gṛhīta grāhi tvam anumāsya

original: atyantāparidṛṣṭe deśe kāle cāgniranumīyate sa kena pramāṇena prāgavagataḥ /
analyzed: atyanta a paridṛṣṭe deśe kāle ca agniḥ anumīyate sa kena pramāṇena prāk avagataḥ
na pratyakṣeṇa
tasya vidyamāna upalambhana tvāt
na ca anyena kenacid

original: kiñcāgnidhūmayormithaḥ saṃbandho deśakālānavacchinnaḥ pratyakṣeṇāvagata ityetāvadeva bhavānbravīti,
analyzed: kiñca agni dhūmayoḥ mithas saṃbandhaḥ deśa kāla anavacchinnaḥ pratyakṣeṇa avagataḥ iti etāvat eva bhavān bravīti
na ca etāvatā deśa antara kāla antara saṃbandhaḥ gneḥ avagataḥ bhavati
tasmāt agṛhīta grāhī eva anumānam
kim atra a gṛhītam
agni sāmānyam tāvat gṛhītam eva
parvataḥ pi pratyakṣeṇa avagataḥ

original: agniviśiṣṭastu parvato na kenāpyavagata iti so 'numeyo bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: agni viśiṣṭaḥ tu parvataḥ na kena api avagataḥ iti saḥ numeyaḥ bhaviṣyati
tatra ca prāpta aprāpta vivekena saṃbandha mātram prameyam avaśiṣyate

original: yathā dadhnā juhotīti viśiṣṭaviṣayo 'pi vidhirviśeṣaṇaparo bhavati tathehāpi,
analyzed: yathā dadhnā juhoti iti viśiṣṭa viṣayaḥ api vidhiḥ viśeṣaṇa paraḥ bhavati tathā iha api
viśiṣṭa viṣayam eva anumānam

original: viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayostu prāptatvāt yajuryuktaṃ rathamadhvaryave dadātītivatsaṃbandhaviṣayaṃ bhavatīti /
analyzed: viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyayoḥ tu prāpta tvāt yajuḥ yuktam ratham adhvaryave dadāti itivat saṃbandha viṣayam bhavati iti
anumāna avayava nirūpaṇam

original: yastu pratipannamarthaṃ paramanumānena pratipādayiṣati tena sādhanaṃ prayoktavyam /
analyzed: yaḥ tu pratipannam artham param anumānena pratipādayiṣati tena sādhanam prayoktavyam
yena vākyena yasya anumāna buddhiḥ utpadyate
tat ca kecid dvayam anye vayam trayam
udāharaṇa paryantam yat vā udāharaṇa ādikam
akṣapādīyaḥ tāvat pratijñā hetu udāharaṇa upanayana nigamanaiḥ pañca avayavam sādhanam manyante
anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pratijñā

original: kṛtakatvāditi hetuḥ yatkṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭādītyujāharaṇam,
analyzed: kṛtaka tvāt iti hetuḥ yat kṛtakam tat anityam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭa ādi iti ujā haraṇam
kṛtakaḥ ca śabdaḥ iti upanayaḥ
tasmāt anityaḥ iti nigamanam

original: ayaṃ tvativistaro gatārthakha iti manvānaḥ saugatā dvyāyavamudāharaṇopanayātmakaṃ manyante /
analyzed: ayam tu ati vistaraḥ gatārtha khaḥ iti manvānaḥ saugatāḥ dvyāyavam udāharaṇa upanaya ātmakam manyante

original: smaryamāṇaniyamaṃ hi liṅgaṃ sādhyadharmiṇyanusaṃdhānasya svayameva liṅgabuddhirutpadyate /
analyzed: smaryamāṇa niyamam hi liṅgam sādhya dharmiṇī anusaṃdhānasya svayam eva liṅga buddhiḥ utpadyate

original: tena yatkṛtakaṃ tadanityamiti kṛtakatvasyānityatvena vyāptiniyamaṃ smārayitvā kṛtakaśca śabda ityupanayamātre kṛte śabdasyānityatvamavagamyata  #
analyzed: tena yat kṛtakam tat anityam iti kṛtaka tvasya anitya tvena vyāpti niyamam smārayitvā kṛtakaḥ ca śabdaḥ iti upanaya mātre kṛte śabdasya anitya tvam avagamyata
eva iti kṛtam avayava antaraiḥ

original: evaṃ tvatyantasākāṅkṣameva vākyaṃ kleśagamyārthaṃ bhavatīti tryavayavameva yuktam-
analyzed: evam tu atyanta sākāṅkṣam eva vākyam kleśa gamya artham bhavati iti tri avayavam eva yuktam

original: anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāt yatkṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ yathā ghaṭādītyevamudāharaṇāntaṃ
analyzed: anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt yat kṛtakam tat anityam yathā ghaṭa ādi iti evam udāharaṇa antam
sādhanam sarvatra vārtikakāraḥ prayuṅkte
athavā yat kṛtakam tat anityam yathā ghaṭa ādi
kṛtakaḥ ca śabdaḥ tasmāt inityaḥ iti udāharaṇa prabhṛti prayoktavyam
evam api anyūna adhikam eva sādhanam

original: tathā ca yatkarma tatphalavat homo 'pi karma tenāpi tatphalavatā bhavitavyamityeva sarvatra
analyzed: tathā ca yat karma tat phalavat karma tena api tad phalavatā bhavitavyam iti eva sarvatra
bhāṣyakāraḥ prayuṅkte

asiddhiḥ anaikāntika tvam
bādhaka tvam

original: ceti trayo hetudoṣāḥ pañcadhā- buddho dharmādharmavedī sarvajñatvāditi svarūpāsiddhiḥ,
analyzed: ca iti trayaḥ hetu doṣāḥ pañcadhā buddhaḥ dharma adharma vedī sarvajña tvāt iti svarūpa asiddhiḥ

original: nanvevaṃ samudravṛddhau candrodayasya hetutvaṃ na syāt,
analyzed: nanu evam samudra vṛddhau candra udayasya hetu tvam na syāt
udayasya samudra saṃbandha abhāvāt
eka kāla saṃbandhāt ubhayoḥ adoṣaḥ

original: yadā tarhi candrasya nabhomadhye sthitiṃ dṛṣṭvā pañcadaśanāḍikātikrāntā samudravṛddhiranumīyate tadā kathaṃ,
analyzed: yadā tarhi candrasya nabhaḥ madhye sthitim dṛṣṭvā pañcadaśa nāḍikā atikrāntā samudravṛddhiḥ anumīyate tadā katham
tatra api paramparā saṃbandhāt ubhayoḥ adoṣaḥ
nahi sākṣāt saṃbandhaḥ eva sarvatra āśrīyate

original: yaddhi yena sākṣātpraṇāḍyā vā kenāpi saṃbandhena niyataṃ tattasya tathaivānumāpakaṃ bhavatīti darśitamevaitat /
analyzed: yat hi yena sākṣāt praṇāḍyā vā kena api saṃbandhena niyatam tat tasya tathā eva anumāpakam bhavati iti darśitam eva etat

original: tena yādṛśaḥ saṃbandho hetorvādinā darśitastadasiddhau doṣo bhavati nānyathā /
analyzed: tena yādṛśaḥ saṃbandhaḥ hetoḥ vādinā darśitaḥ tad asiddhau doṣaḥ bhavati na anyathā
go śabdaḥ sāsnādimat vacanaḥ go śabda tvāt iti vyatireka asiddhiḥ
nahi dharmi vyatirekeṇa go śabda tvam nāma kiñcid asti
nityam ākāśam anavayava dravyāt iti vyapti asiddhiḥ mūrta tvasya ākāśe vyapti abhāvāt iti
anaikantika tvam dvividham sa vyabhicāram sa pratisādhanam ca
nityaḥ śabdaḥ mūrta tvāt iti karma ādiṣu anityeṣu api amūrta tvasya saṃbhavāt vyabhicāri amūrta tvam

original: apratyakṣo vāyurdravyatve satyarūpatvāt pratyakṣo vāyurmahattve sati sparśavattvāditi saṃpratisādhanatvādubhayamapyanirṇāyakaṃ saṃdhayahetuḥ,
analyzed: apratyakṣaḥ vāyuḥ dravya tve sati arūpa tvāt pratyakṣaḥ vāyuḥ mahat tve sati sparśavat tvāt iti saṃpratisādhana tvāt ubhayam api anirṇāyakam saṃdhaya hetuḥ
a gṛhyamāṇa bala abala tvāt ubhayoḥ

original: kaścittvāha- na viruddhārthaṃ hetudvayaṃ tulyabalamekatra saṃbhavati,
analyzed: kaścid tu āha na viruddha artham hetu dvayam tulya balam ekatra saṃbhavati
tad bhāve vastuni nityam saśaya āpatteḥ
dravya tve sati arūpa tvasya aparokṣa avabhāsī virodhāt apratyakṣa tvam anumāpayitum asāmathryāt daurbalyam
spārśana anumānam tu aviruddham balavat iti na dvayoḥ tulya balavat tvam
atas na asti sa pratisādhanaḥ hetuḥ iti

original: sa vaktavyaḥ- savyabhācāro 'pi tarhi na saṃśayahetuḥ syānnityasaṃśayāpattiprasaṅgādeva //*//
analyzed: sa vaktavyaḥ tarhi na saṃśaya hetuḥ syāt nitya saṃśaya āpatti prasaṅgāt eva

original: satyapi tasya saṃśayahetutve pramāṇāntareṇa nirṇayasaṃbhavānna nityasaṃśayāpattiriti cet,
analyzed: sati api tasya saṃśaya hetu tve pramāṇa antareṇa nirṇaya saṃbhavāt na nitya saṃśaya āpattiḥ iti ced
tarhi iha api pramāṇa antareṇa nirṇaya saṃbhavāt adoṣaḥ
tathā asati yat pramāṇa antara viruddham tasya durbala tvāt itarasya balīyaḥ tvāt atulya bala tvam ita ced
kena ca uktam ubhayam tulya balam iti
kintu agṛhyamāṇa balābalatva mātram

original: tathāhi- yaḥ sthāṇutvaṃ puruṣatvaṃ vā nāvadhārayati tasyordhvatvaṃ saṃśayaheturbhavati,
analyzed: tathā hi yaḥ sthāṇu tvam puruṣa tvam vā na avadhārayati tasya ūrdhva tvam saṃśaya hetuḥ bhavati

original: tathā yo vāyoraparokṣāvabhāsaṃ nāvadhāritavān tasya pṛthivyādiṣu pratyakṣatvavyāptaṃ
analyzed: tathā yaḥ vāyoḥ aparokṣa avabhāsam na avadhāritavān tasya pṛthivī ādiṣu pratyakṣa tva vyāptam

original: sparśavattvaṃ vyomādiṣu cāpratyakṣatvavyāptamarupatvaṃ vāyāvupalabhamānasya bhavatyeva saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: sparśavat tvam vyoma ādiṣu ca apratyakṣa tva vyāpta marupa tvam vāyau upalabhamānasya bhavati eva saṃśayaḥ

original: satu pramāṇāntareṇa nirṇaye sati nivartata ityāstāṃ tāvat /
analyzed: satu pramāṇa antareṇa nirṇaye sati nivartate iti āstām tāvat
tasmāt sa pratisādhanam api savyabhicāra vat saṃśaya hetuḥ

original: tathā ca bhāṣyakāraḥ yatkarma tatphalavat homo 'pi karma tenāpi phalavatā bhavitavyamityasya-
analyzed: tathā ca bhāṣyakāraḥ yat karma tat phalavat karma tena api phalavatā bhavitavyam iti asya

original: uparate karmaṇi dravyāṇāṃ tatsaṃyogānāṃ ca dravyāntaraṃ phalaṃ dṛṣṭamiti dravyamapi
analyzed: uparate karmaṇi dravyāṇām tad saṃyogānām ca dravya antaram phalam dṛṣṭam iti dravyam api

original: phalavatsyāt iti pratisādhanaṃ bruvansapratisādhanatvamapi dūṣaṇamiti darśayati,
analyzed: phalavat syāt iti pratisādhanam bruvan sa pratisādhana tvam api dūṣaṇam iti darśayati
tasmāt saḥ u pi saṃśaya hetuḥ

original: asādharaṇaṃ tu gandhavatvaṃ pṛthivyāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ na kvacidapi buddhimādadhātīti na saṃśayahetuḥ /
analyzed: asādharaṇam tu gandhava tvam pṛthivyām dṛṣṭam na kvacid api buddhim ādadhāti iti na saṃśaya hetuḥ
sādhāraṇam hi dvayoḥ sādhya tad abhāvayoḥ dṛṣṭa tvāt ubhayatra api anavasthayā buddhim ādadhat saṃśaya hetuḥ iti yuktam
tathā viruddha artha vyāptam api hetu dvayam ekatra dṛśyamānam sva vyāpakam ekasmin dharmiṇi upasaṃharat ekasya viruddha ubhaya rūpa dharma tva asaṃbhavāt saṃśayam
janayati
na ca evam sādhāraṇasya saṃbhavati iti na ayam saṃśaya hetuḥ

original: tathā bādhako nāma hetvābhāso yo viruddha iti tārkikairabhidhīyate /
analyzed: tathā bādhakaḥ nāma hetvābhāsaḥ yaḥ viruddhaḥ iti tārkikaiḥ abhidhīyate
saca ṣaḍvidhi iti kecid
dharma dharmi ubhayeṣām svarūpasya viśeṣasya ca bādhāt

ubhaya bādhasya dharma dharmi bādhā antargata tvāt
ekadhā iti apare sarvadhā samīhita dharma viparyaya sādhana tvāt
idam eva ca yuktam
avāntarabhedasya anupayogāt

original: yadyavaśyamavāntarabhedo vaktavyastarhi dvaividhyameva vaktavyam- dharmasvarūpabādhanaṃ ceti /
analyzed: yadi avaśyam avāntarabhedaḥ vaktavyaḥ tarhi dvaividhyam eva vaktavyam dharma svarūpa bādhanam ca iti

original: nahi dharmitadviśeṣabādhakatvaṃ nāma hetordūṣaṇaṃ saṃbhavatīti svayameva vārtikakāreṇa- dharmisvarūpabādhena viruddho yo 'bhidhīyata ityādinā  #
analyzed: nahi dharmi tad viśeṣa bādhaka tvam nāma hetoḥ dūṣaṇam saṃbhavati iti svayam eva vārtikakāreṇa dharmi svarūpa bādhena viruddhaḥ yaḥ bhidhīyate ityādinā
darśitam

original: tathā hi dravyātiriktaḥ samāvāya iha pratyayahetutvātsaṃyogavaditi atreha pratyayahetutvasamavāyatvena bhedena ca vyāptaṃ saṃyoge dṛṣṭam,
analyzed: tathā hi dravya atiriktaḥ samāvāyaḥ iha pratyaya hetu tvāt saṃyoga vat iti atra iha pratyaya hetu tva samavāya tvena bhedena ca vyāptam saṃyoge dṛṣṭam

original: samavāyasyāsamavāyatvaṃ bhedaṃ cāpādayat samavāyadharmisvarūpaṃ tadviśeṣaṇaṃ caikatvaṃ bādhata ityudāhṛtam /
analyzed: samavāyasya asamavāya tvam bhedam ca āpādayat samavāya dharmi svarūpam tad viśeṣaṇam ca ekatvam bādhate iti udāhṛtam
tat ayuktam

original: iha pratyayahetutvaṃ hi samavāye dharmiṇi dṛṣṭaṃ na vā,
analyzed: iha pratyaya hetu tvam hi samavāye dharmiṇi dṛṣṭam na vā

original: yadyadṛṣṭaṃ tato 'siddhatvānna kasyacidapi sādhakaṃ bādhakaṃ vā bhavati,
analyzed: yadi adṛṣṭam siddha tvāt na kasyacid api sādhakam bādhakam vā bhavati

original: yadi dṛṣṭaṃ tatkathaṃ tatraiva dṛśyamānaṃ tasyaiva bādhanaṃ kuryāt,
analyzed: yadi dṛṣṭam tat katham tatra eva dṛśyamānam tasya eva bādhanam kuryāt
virodhe hi sati bādheta

original: nacataddharmatayā dṛśyamānasya kathañcidapi tena virodhaḥ saṃbhavati //
analyzed: na ca tad dharma tayā dṛśyamānasya kathañcid api tena virodhaḥ saṃbhavati
samavāya tva bādhe praśnaḥ
nanu samavāya tvam bādhate iti uktam

original: yadi samavāyatvaṃ nāma samavāyadharmiṇo 'tiriktaṃ tadbādhe 'pi na dharmisvarūpaṃ bādhitaṃ syāt /
analyzed: yadi samavāya tvam nāma samavāya dharmiṇaḥ tiriktam tad bādhe na dharmi svarūpam bādhitam syāt

original: atha dharmyeva tanna tasya bādhakaṃ saṃbhavatītyuktam /
analyzed: atha dharmyā iva tat na tasya bādhakam saṃbhavati iti uktam

original: tasmānna dharmisvarūpabādhanaṃ nāma hetudoṣaḥ kvacitsaṃbhavati bādho natvetaddūṣaṇam /
analyzed: tasmāt na dharmi svarūpa bādhanam nāma hetu doṣaḥ kvacid saṃbhavati bādhaḥ na tu etat dūṣaṇam

original: yadi khalviha pratyayahetutvaṃ samavāyasyaikatvaṃ virundhyāt tato dravyātirekaṃ sādhayataḥ kiṃ hīyate /

na hi dravya atireka sādhana kṛtam ekatva sādhanam
yatas tasya dūṣaṇa tvena saṃbhāvyeta
tasmāt dharma svarūpasya tad viśeṣasya ca bādhanāt dvividham eva bādhakam

original: tatra nityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāditi kṛtakatvamanityatvena vyāptatvānnityasvarūpameva bādhate //*//
analyzed: tatra nityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti kṛtaka tvam anitya tvena vyāpta tvāt nitya svarūpam eva bādhate
yaḥ tu svarūpam eva śabdānām abhidheyam na artha antaram iti etam artham pratipipādayiṣuḥ tad siddhi artham evam

original: prayuṅkte- agṛhītasaṃbandhāvastho 'pi śabdaḥ svābhidheyamarthaṃ pratipādayati vibhaktimattvāt
analyzed: prayuṅkte agṛhīta saṃbandha avasthā u pi śabdaḥ sva abhidheyam artham pratipādayati vibhaktimat tvāt
gṛhīta saṃbandha vat iti
tasya dharma viśeṣa viparyaya sādhanaḥ hetuḥ
paścāt hi saṃbandha grahaṇāt asvarūpa pratipādanam

original: dṛṣṭamiti tadvadeva prāgasvarūpārthatvaṃ tenāva hetunā prasajyeta,
analyzed: dṛṣṭam iti tadvat eva prāk asvarūpa artha tvam hetunā prasajyeta
svarūpa pratipādane ca bādhita īrtha pratipādanam api tad dharma svarūpam bādhitam eva

original: nahi prāk saṃbandhagrahādarthāntarapratipattiḥ śakyate vaktuṃ pratītivirodhādeva //*//
analyzed: nahi prāk saṃbandha grahāt artha antara pratipattiḥ śakyate vaktum pratīti virodhāt eva

original: sarvatra yo heturyādṛgviśeṣaviśeṣṭena sādhyena dṛṣṭāntadharmiṣu niyataḥ sa tādṛgviśeṣaviśiṣṭasya
analyzed: sarvatra yaḥ hetuḥ yādṛś viśeṣa viśeṣṭena sādhyena dṛṣṭānta dharmiṣu niyataḥ sa tādṛś viśeṣa viśiṣṭasya

original: sādhyasya dharmiṇi pramāṇāntaravirodhātsādhanāsamabhavena viparītaṃ viśeṣaṃ niyamabalātsvayameva
analyzed: sādhyasya dharmiṇi pramāṇa antara virodhāt sādhana asama bhavena viparītam viśeṣam niyama balāt svayam eva

original: bādhamāno nirviśeṣasya ca sādhyasyāsaṃbhavātsādhyameva na sādhayati /
analyzed: bādhamānaḥ nirviśeṣasya ca sādhyasya asaṃbhavāt sādhyam eva na sādhayati

original: yathā śarīricetanakartṛkatvena ghaṭādiṣu vyāptamutpattimattvaṃ dehāṅkurādīnāṃ cetanakartṛkatvasādhanāyocyamānaṃ
analyzed: yathā śarīri cetana kartṛka tvena ghaṭa ādiṣu vyāptam utpattimat tvam deha aṅkura ādīnām cetana kartṛka tva sādhanāya ucyamānam
śarīriṇaḥ cetanasya anupalabdhi virodhena sādhayitum aśakya tvāt aśarīrasya tena eva hetunā
ghaṭa ādi vat nivāraṇāt vidhā advaya śūnyasya cetanasya asaṃbhavāt cetana kartṛkatvam eva aṅkura ādīnām na sādhayati

original: tena dharmaviśeṣavirodho hetoḥ sādhyasiddhimeva niruṇaddhīti bhavati dūṣaṇam /
analyzed: tena dharma viśeṣa virodhaḥ hetoḥ sādhya siddhim eva niruṇaddhi iti bhavati dūṣaṇam
dharmi viśeṣa virodhaḥ tu sādhya avirodhi tvāt na dūṣaṇam

original: pratyuta siddhāntāntaradūṣaṇatvātprativādina eva nigrahasthānatvāddūṣaṇaṃ tadbhavati na vādinaḥ //*//
analyzed: pratyuta siddhānta antara dūṣaṇa tvāt prativādinaḥ eva nigrahasthāna tvāt dūṣaṇam tat bhavati na vādinaḥ
yaḥ tu dṛṣṭānta paridṛṣṭa sādhya viśeṣa virodha saṃbhave tad rahitam sādhya mātram hetuḥ sādhayati eva
tat ca viśeṣa antaram ākṣipya siddhi ati iti vadati

original: tasya- uṣṇāgniniyatastṛṇādivikāro hime dṛśyamānaḥ śaityapratyakṣavirodhādauṣṇyasaṃbhave 'pyanuṣṇamevāgniṃ sādhayet,
analyzed: tasya uṣṇa agni niyataḥ tṛṇa ādi vikāraḥ hime dṛśyamānaḥ śaitya pratyakṣa virodhāt auṣṇya saṃbhave pi anuṣṇam eva agnim sādhayet
tasmāt dharmi viśeṣa viparyaya sādhana tvam hetoḥ adūṣaṇam eva
anumāne dṛṣṭānta nirūpaṇam
udāharaṇam dvividham sādharmya udāharaṇam

original: sādharmyaṃ- liṅgamuddiśya liṅgena upādānam- yo yo dhīmavān mahānasādiḥ sa sarvo 'gnimān dṛṣṭa iti,

original: samyagukte ca sādharmyena na vaidharmyaṃ vaktavyaṃ gatārthatvāt /

original: yadā vaktavyamāpatati tadā liṅgyabhāvamuddiśya liṅgābhāvopādānam- yatrāgnirnāsti tatra dhūmo 'pi nāsti yathā toyādiṣviti /

original: yata bhāvena bhāvaḥ sādhyate tatraiva vidhirūpaṃ sādharmyaṃ tatpratiṣedharūpaṃ ca vaidharmyam /
analyzed: yata bhāvena bhāvaḥ sādhyate tatra eva vidhi rūpam sādharmyam tad pratiṣedha rūpam ca vaidharmyam

original: yatra tu medhābhāvādinā vṛṣṭyādyabhāvaḥ sādhyate tatra sādharmyameva pratiṣedharūpaṃ yathā- yadā yatra meghotpattirnāsti tadā tatra vṛṣṭirnāstīti
analyzed: yatra tu medhā bhāva ādinā vṛṣṭi ādi abhāvaḥ sādhyate tatra sādharmyam eva pratiṣedha rūpam yathā yadā yatra megha utpattiḥ na asti tadā tatra vṛṣṭiḥ na asti iti

original: vaidharmye tu vidhirūpam- yatra vṛṣṭirasti tatra meghotpattirastīti /
analyzed: vaidharmye tu vidhi rūpam yatra vṛṣṭiḥ asti tatra megha utpattiḥ asti iti
tena yat bhikṣuṇā uktam prasajya pratiṣedha ātmakam eva iti tat anādaraṇīyam
sādharmya ābhāsāḥ ca sādhya vikala tva ādayaḥ

original: vaidharmyābhāsāśca sādhyābhāvavaikalyādayo vārtika eva draṣyavyā iti //
analyzed: vaidharmya ābhāsāḥ ca sādhya abhāva vaikalya ādayaḥ vārtike eva draṣyavyāḥ iti
anumāne prābhākara anuvādaḥ
tat tu dvividham iti dṛṣṭa sva lakṣaṇa viṣayam eva anumānam iti manvānān nirākartum adṛṣṭa sva lakṣaṇa viṣayam api anumānam kriyā ādi viṣayam asti iti darśayitum
dvaividhya abhidhānam

original: nahi kriyā svalakṣaṇaṃ pratyakṣeṇa kadācidgṛhyate pūrvottaradeśasaṃyogavibhāgamātrasya pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇam,
analyzed: nahi kriyā sva lakṣaṇam pratyakṣeṇa kadācid gṛhyate pūrva uttara deśa saṃyoga vibhāga mātrasya pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇam
yābhyām eva āgantukābhyām āgantukam kāraṇam anumīyate
tat ca kriyā iti ucyate
nanu dravyam eva kāraṇam syāt na
tasya prāk api sadbhāvāt
nanu kṣaṇa antare nyat dravyam sarva saṃskārāṇām kṣaṇika tvāt
sādṛśyāt tu pratyabhijñānam

original: tadyadā samānadeśe pūrvapūrvamuttarottaramārabhate tadā tiṣṭhatīti lakṣyate /
analyzed: tat yadā samāna deśe pūrva pūrvam uttarottaram ārabhate tadā tiṣṭhati iti lakṣyate

original: yadā tvanantaradeśe pūrvapūrvamuttarottaramarabhate tadā gacchatīti lakṣyate /
analyzed: yadā tu anantara deśe pūrva pūrvam uttarottaram arabhate tadā gacchati iti lakṣyate
dīpa gamana vat chāyā gamana vat ca sadṛśa apara apara kṣaṇānām uttara uttara deśa prārabdhānām gamana ābhāsa nimitta tvāt kṛtam kriyayā
kiñca anutpannasya kṣaṇasya kriyā āśraya tva ayogāt
utpannasya ca vināśa grasta tvāt katham kriyā ārambhaka tvam

original: yathāhuḥ- kṣaṇikāḥ sarvasaṃskārā asthirāṇāṃ kutaḥ kriyā iti /
analyzed: yathā āhuḥ kṣaṇikāḥ sarva saṃskārāḥ asthirāṇām kutas kriyā iti
tat idam śabda adhikaraṇe nirākariṣyāmaḥ

original: tataḥ sthiratve sati tanmātreṇānupapatteḥ kriyānumānaṃ yuktamiti /
analyzed: tatas sthira tve sati tanmātreṇa anupapatteḥ kriyā anumānam yuktam iti
na yuktam
kāryam hi kāraṇa mātram apekṣate tat ca iha dṛṣṭam eva asti

original: prayatnaviśeṣānantaraṃ hi śarīre deśasaṃyogavibhāgākhyaṃ phalamutpadyamānamupalabhyate tataḥ sa eva nimittam /
analyzed: prayatna viśeṣa anantaram hi śarīre deśa saṃyoga vibhāga ākhyam phalam utpadyamānam upalabhyate tatas saḥ eva nimittam
tadvat ātma śarīra saṃyogaḥ ca asamavāyi śarīram ca samavāyi iti kim atra adṛṣṭa kāraṇa anumānena
para mukhena prābhākara khaṇḍanam

original: nanvasamavāyikāraṇabhūtasya saṃyogasya svāśraye svāśrayasamavete vā kāryaṃ nānyatra,
analyzed: nanu asamavāyi kāraṇa bhūtasya saṃyogasya sva āśraye sva āśraya samavete vā kāryam na anyatra
tantu saṃyogānām iva sva āśrayeṣu tantuṣu paṭaḥ
tantu turī saṃyogasya vā paṭa turīya saṃyogaḥ
prayatna vat ātma saṃyogaḥ tu anevaṃvidhe vyomni katham saṃyogam ārabhate
atas kāraṇa antaram kalpanīyam iti ced na
tantu saṃyogāt nodana ākhyāt yugapad eva paṭasya bahu tantu vyāpita tvāt
saṃyogānām ca dvayoḥ dvayoḥ eva vṛtteḥ

original: kiñca śarajyāsaṃyogānnodanākhyādyugapadeva śare śarāvayaveṣu ca sarveṣvantarbahirvirtiṣu bahūnikarmāṇyutpadyate,
analyzed: kiñca śara jyā saṃyogāt nodana ākhyāt yugapad eva śare śara avayaveṣu ca sarveṣu antar bahis virtiṣu bahūni karmāṇi utpadyate

original: tatra yeṣāmavayavānāṃ jyosaṃyogo nāsti teṣvāśrayeṣu svāśrayāsamaveteṣu ca jyāsaṃyogaḥ karmārabhata iti vyabhicāraḥ /
analyzed: tatra yeṣām avayavānām na asti teṣu āśrayeṣu sva āśraya asamaveteṣu ca jyā saṃyogaḥ karma ārabhate iti vyabhicāraḥ

original: nahi te saṃyogāśrayībhūte śare samavetāḥ śarasyaiva teṣu samavāyāt //*//
analyzed: nahi te saṃyoga āśrayībhūte śare samavetāḥ śarasya eva teṣu samavāyāt

original: kiṃ ca prayatnavagātmasaṃyogānantaraṃ yugapadeva haste prayatnavadātmasaṃyukte tatsaṃyuktecāṅgade 'aṅgulīyake ca tallagne maṇau ca karmotpadyate,
analyzed: kim ca prayatna vat ātma saṃyoga anantaram yugapad eva haste prayatna vat ātma saṃyukte tad saṃyukte ca aṅgade aṅgulīyake ca tad lagne maṇau ca karma utpadyate

original: athaivamādiṣu na codanāt na prayatnavadātmasaṃyogācca tadanantare /
analyzed: atha evamādiṣu na codanāt na prayatnavat ātma saṃyogāt ca tad anantare
tathā ātma saṃyogāt haste
tad saṃyogāt aṅgade
tad saṃyogāt maṇau api iti
evam tarhi atra api śakyate vaktum
prayatnavat ātma saṃyukta śarīra ākāśa saṃyogāt śarīra ākāśa deśa vibhāgaḥ tad saṃyogāt ca tad anantara deśa saṃyogaḥ iti dṛṣṭena eva saṃyogena saṃyoga vibhāga siddheḥ na
karma kalpanā avakalpate
kiñca na saṃyogasya eva ayam dharmaḥ

original: sarvāṇyevāsamavāyikāraṇāni svāśraye svāśrayamavete vā kāryamārabhate nānyatra /
analyzed: sarvāṇi eva asamavāyi kāraṇāni sva āśraye sva āśraya mavete vā kāryam ārabhate na anyatra
tatas ca karma api asamavāyi kāraṇa tvena anumīyamānam viyati vihaṅgame ca ubhayatra anumīyeta

original: na hi vihagakarmaṇā viyati kāryaṃ saṃbhavati,
analyzed: na hi vihaga karmaṇā viyati kāryam saṃbhavati
tatas ca viyati api calati iti buddhiḥ syāt
atas na anumeyam karma
kim idānīm na asti eva
asti pratyakṣa avagamāt
nanu saṃyoga vibhāga āgi riktam na kiñcid atra

original: dṛśyate hi sarpati sarpe bhūmeḥ sarpasya ca dvayormithaḥ saṃyogavibhāgāviśeṣe 'pi sarpameva calatīti buddhirālambatela na bhūmim /
analyzed: dṛśyate hi sarpati sarpe bhūmeḥ sarpasya ca dvayoḥ mithas saṃyoga vibhāga aviśeṣe sarpam eva calati iti buddhiḥ ālambate ila na bhūmim

original: ato 'syā buddherālambanamasti sarpe calanaṃ nāma tatvam /
analyzed: atas syāḥ buddheḥ ālambanam asti sarpe calanam nāma
tad bhāva abhāvābhyām sarpa bhūmyoḥ calati iti buddheḥ bhāvau iti aṅgīkāryam
na ca iyam ānumānikī saṃbhavati iti uktam
tasmāt na evam abhiprāyam idam bhāṣyam
kintu viśeṣa viṣayam sāmānya viṣayam siddha sādhya tā iti
te nena nirākriyante
ubhayoḥ api viśeṣa tva upapatteḥ
yatra viśeṣasya eva anugamaḥ tatra viśeṣa viṣaya tvam
sāmānya anugame tu sāmānya viṣaya tvam

original: na ca siddhasādhyatvaṃ deśāntarakālāntarasebandhasyāgṛhītasya grahaṇāditi prāgeva varṇitam ityanumānavādaḥ /
analyzed: na ca siddha sādhya tvam deśa antara kāla antara sebandhasya agṛhītasya grahaṇāt iti prāk eva varṇitam iti anumāna vādaḥ
śāstram śabda vijñānāt asaṃnikṛṣṭa ṛthe tat śābdam nāma pramāṇam
tat loka siddha tvāt na parīkṣitavyam
tat ca dvavidham pauruṣeyam apauruṣeyam ca iti
tatra pauruṣeyam āpta vākyam
apauruṣeyam ca veda vākyam
ubhayam api anāpta praṇīta tva doṣa virahāt svatas ca śabdasya aduṣṭa tvāt pramāṇam

original: tacca punardvividham- siddhārthe vidhāyakañceti dvividham- upadeśakamatideśakaṃ ca /
analyzed: tat ca punar dvividam siddhārthe vidhāyakam ca iti dvividham upadeśakam atideśakam ca
ittham idam kartavyam iti upadeśaḥ
yathā loke dadhi ghṛta sūpa śāli ādibhiḥ devadattaḥ bhojayitavyaḥ iti

original: vedepi- prayājāvaghātādiprakāreṇa darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargaṃ kuryāditi tadvadidaṃ kartavyamityatideśaḥ /
analyzed: vede api prayāja avaghāta ādi prakāreṇa darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām svargam kuryāt iti tadvat idam kartavyam iti atideśaḥ
yathā loke devadatta vadya yajñadattaḥ bhojayitavyāḥ iti
vede api sauryeṇa kuryāt yathā āgneyena iti
śabda antara ādibhiḥ śruti liṅga ādibhiḥ śruti artha ādibhiḥ ca vicitraḥ yam upadeśaḥ bheda viniyoga kramān avabodhayati
vacana anāmadheya codanā liṅgaiḥ ca atideśaḥ uṣanyatra prakārasya

original: tatpratipādakasya vā śāstrasya vidhyantāparanāmadheyasyāntena saṃbandhaṃ vikāraṃ
analyzed: tad pratipādakasya vā śāstrasya vidhi anta apara nāmadheyasya antena saṃbandham vikāram
bādham vā bodhayati iti ūhanīyam
asaṃnikṛṣṭa grahaṇam ca pūrvavat tāddrūpya paryaya pariccheda nirāsa artham ā
etad deśinām tu tat anarthakam eva syāt
viparīta paricchinne tāvat na asti eva śabdāt jñānam

original: yadi syāt puruṣadoṣāṇāṃ śabde saṃkrāntyanabhyupagamāt svābhāvikameva śabdasyāprāmāṇyaṃ syāditi vedāprāmāṇyaṃ syāt /
analyzed: yadi syāt puruṣa doṣāṇām śabde saṃkrānti anabhyupagamāt svābhāvikam eva śabdasya aprāmāṇyam syāt iti veda aprāmāṇyam syāt
yadi param tad rūpa paricchinna viṣayasya anuvādasya nirāsaḥ syāt
tat ca ayuktam
tasya api śāstra tvāt
nahi tasya api aprāmāṇyam
anubhūti tvāt
pratyakṣa ādi antarbhāva abhāvāt ca śāstra tvam eva iti āstām tāvat
aulukya mata anuvādaḥ

original: idaṃ ca asyedaṃ kāraṇaṃ saṃbadhyekārthasamavāyivirodhi ceti laiṅgikamityunumānalakṣaṇamabhidhāya
analyzed: idam ca asya idam kāraṇam saṃbadhi eka artha samavāyi virodhi ca iti laiṅgikam iti unumāna lakṣaṇam abhidhāya

original: etenaiva śābdaṃ vyākhyātam iti kāśyapīyāḥ pratyakṣānumānaṃ ca dve eva pramāṇe iti
analyzed: etena eva śābdam vyākhyātam iti kāśyapīyāḥ pratyakṣa anumānam ca dve eva pramāṇe iti
bruvāṇaḥ saugatāḥ ca anumānāt abhinnam iti manyante

original: tatra yattāvatpadārthajñānaṃ tadavagatārthaviṣayatvātpramāṇameva na bhavatīti kiṃ tasya bhedābhedaparīkṣayā /
analyzed: tatra yat tāvat padārtha jñānam tat avagata artha viṣaya tvāt pramāṇam eva na bhavati iti kim tasya bheda abheda parīkṣayā
yat tu vākya artha jñānam tat agṛhīta saṃbandhaiḥ eva padārthaiḥ upajāyamānam na anumāna śaṅkām arhati
nahi sarvaiḥ vākya artha viśeṣaiḥ saṃbandha grahaṇam asti
na ca saṃbhavati anantaiḥ saṃbandha grahaṇam
vākya artha viśeṣaḥ padārthaiḥ avagamyate dūra deśa vārtāsu iti sarvajanīnam etat
yat tu āpta vākya tvāt avisaṃvāda anumānam tad vākya artha avagama uttara kāla tvāt na tasya anumāna tvam āpādayati
vākya śravaṇa anantaram eva hi āpta anāprajñāna anapekṣaiḥ eva padārthaiḥ vākya arthaḥ vagamyate

original: atyāntādṛṣṭapuruṣapraṇīte 'pi vākye 'vagate tu vākyārthe satyāsatyatvasaṃśaye praṇeturāptatvāvagame
analyzed: vākye vagate tu vākya arthe satya asatya tva saṃśaye praṇetuḥ āpta tva avagame
sati satya tvam anumīyamānam na vākya artha avagateḥ āpta tva avadhāraṇa anapekṣa janmanaḥ numāna tvam āpādayati

original: tasmātpramāṇāntarameva loke śābdamityapauruṣeyasyāpi vedasya siddhaṃ prāmāṇyam /
analyzed: tasmāt pramāṇa antaram eva loke śābdam iti apauruṣeyasya api vedasya siddham prāmāṇyam

original: ekadeśināṃ tu lokavacasāmanumānatvamaṅgīkurvatāṃ yathā vedaprāmāṇyaṃ na siddhyatitathoktam /
analyzed: eka deśinām tu loka vacasām anumāna tvam aṅgīkurvatām yathā veda prāmāṇyam na siddhi ati tathā uktam
iti śabda pramāṇa vādaḥ
atha upamāna paricchedaḥ
upamānam api sādṛśyam asaṃnikṛṣṭa ṛthe buddhim utpādayati

original: yathā gavayadarśanaṃ gosmaraṇasya pūrvadṛṣṭe smaryamāṇer'the dṛśyamānārthasādṛśyajñānamupamānam /
analyzed: yathā gavaya darśanam go smaraṇasya pūrva dṛṣṭe smaryamāṇa irthe dṛśyamāna artha sādṛśya jñānam upamānam

original: yā sāvasmābhirnagare dṛṣṭvā gauḥ sānena gamayena sadṛśīti /
analyzed: yā sā au asmābhiḥ nagare dṛṣṭvā gauḥ sā anena sadṛśī iti
kim punar sādṛśyam
artha antara yogibhiḥ saṃbandhi sāmānyaiḥ artha antarasya tādṛśa yogaḥ sādṛśyam

original: yathā gojātiyogibhiḥ karmādyavayavasāmānyairgavayajāteryogo gavayasya gosādṛśyaṃ gavayasaṃyogibhiśca goryogastatsādṛśyam /
analyzed: yathā go jāti yogibhiḥ karma ādi avayava sāmānyaiḥ gavaya jāteḥ yogaḥ gavayasya go sādṛśyam gavaya saṃyogibhiḥ ca goḥ yogaḥ tad sādṛśyam

original: ata eva ca sāmānyayogātiriktamanyadeva tatvaṃ sādṛśyaṃ teṣāṃ prakarṣāprakarṣabhedaḥ kiṃnimitta iti cintanīyam /
analyzed: atas eva ca sāmānya yoga atiriktam anyat eva tatvam sādṛśyam teṣām prakarṣa aprakarṣa bhedaḥ kiṃnimittaḥ iti cintanīyam

original: na ca tattvāntaratve pramāṇamapi kiñcidastītyāstāṃ tāvat /
analyzed: na ca tattva antara tve pramāṇam api kiñcid asti iti āstām tāvat
na ca idam upamānam pratyakṣa antargatam
an indriya saṃnikṛṣṭa tvāt nagara sthasya goḥ
na ca anumānam agṛhīta saṃbandhasya api upajāyamāna tvāt
evam kila anumīyeta

original: gaurgavayasadṛśo gavayasādṛśyapratiyogi tattatsadṛśaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yugapanna dṛṣṭavānekameva
analyzed: gauḥ gavaya sadṛśaḥ gavaya sādṛśya pratiyogi tat tat sadṛśam dṛṣṭam yugapad na dṛṣṭavān ekam eva

original: tu gāmupalabhya nagare vane gavayaṃ paśyati so 'pi gāṃ gavayasādṛśyaviśiṣṭāmupaminotyeva tasmānnānumānam /
analyzed: tu gām upalabhya nagare vane gavayam paśyati saḥ u pi gām gavaya sādṛśya viśiṣṭām upaminoti eva tasmāt na anumānam
śābda tvam tu na śaṅkyam eva
atas pramāṇa antaram
prasiddha tvāt ca na parīkṣitavyam
iti upamāna vādaḥ
arthāpattiḥ iti dṛṣṭaḥ vā arthaḥ nyathā na upapadyate iti artha kalpanā

original: yathā jīvato devadattasya gṛhābhāvadarśanena bahirbhāvasyādṛṣṭasya parikalpanā /
analyzed: yathā jīvataḥ devadattasya gṛha abhāva darśanena bahirbhāvasya adṛṣṭasya parikalpanā
pramitasya artha antareṇa vinā anupapannāt upapāda kalpanā sā arthāpattiḥ
anumānam eva tarhi
tatra api vahnim antareṇa anupapannāt dhūma ahniḥ kalpyate
syāt evam
yadi anupapannam gamakam syāt
iha tu yat na upapadyate tat eva gamyam
gṛha abhāvena hi vinā abahirbhāvaḥ na upapadyate
kim idānīm upapādakāt anupapanne buddhiḥ arthāpattiḥ
kaḥ doṣaḥ
na khalu kaścid doṣaḥ
kim tu asau na eva asti
na hi upapādaka darśanāt anupapanna arthe buddhiḥ bhavati
yadi syāt vṛkṣa tva darśanāt śiṃśapā tvam kalpyeta
vṛkṣa tvena vinā śiṃśapā tvasya anupapatteḥ
tasmāt anupapannam eva gamakam na upapādakam
atha ucyate
na avinābhāvena anupapattiḥ iti ucyate kim tu saṃśaya āpattiḥ

original: yasya hi jīvanaṃ gṛhasaṃbandhyeva prāyaśo 'vagataṃ tasya gṛhābhāve dṛṣṭe jīvanaṃ sāṃśayikaṃ bhavadbahirbhāvakalpanayā samādhīyate /
analyzed: yasya hi jīvanam gṛha saṃbandhi eva prāyaśas vagatam tasya gṛha abhāve dṛṣṭe jīvanam sāṃśayikam bhavat bahirbhāva kalpanayā samādhīyate
tatas ca prāc bahirbhāva kalpanāyāḥ jīvanasya saṃdigdha tvāt na liṅga tvam
na hi sandigdham liṅgam bhavati

original: jīvanarahitañca gṛhābhāvamātraṃ mṛte 'pi sadbhāvādanaikāntikaṃ na bahirbhāvamanumāpayitumalam /
analyzed: jīvana rahitam ca gṛha abhāva mātram mṛte sadbhāvāt anaikāntikam na bahirbhāvam anumāpayitum alam
atas numāna asaṃbhavāt pramāṇa antaram eva idam
yathā ca anumāne niścitam gamakam
evam artha āpattau sandigdham gamakam iti darśana halāt abhyupagamyate
saṃśayaḥ ca atra pūrva dṛṣṭa rūpa visaṃvādāt
tat idam asaṃbaddham

original: na hi saṃdigdhe jīvane bahirbhāvaḥ śakyate kalpayitum /
analyzed: na hi saṃdigdhe jīvane bahirbhāvaḥ śakyate kalpayitum

original: kathaṃ hi jīvati vā mṛto devadattaḥ iti saṃdihānastasya bahirbhāvaṃ kalpayet /
analyzed: katham hi jīvati vā mṛtaḥ devadattaḥ iti saṃdihānaḥ tasya bahis bhāvam kalpayet
na hi bhāva abhāva saṃśayasya
bahirbhāva kalpanayā apanodaḥ saṃbhavati
sarvatra hi saṃśayasya nidāna ucchedāt ucchedaḥ bhavati
anyatara pakṣa avadhāraṇāt vā
na ca bahirbhāva kalpanayā tāvat nidāna ucchedaḥ
jīvanasya prāyeṇa gṛha saṃbandhi tvāt tad viparyayaḥ tra saṃśaya hetu tvena upanyastaḥ
na ca asau bahirbhāve kalpite samucchidyate
pratyuta viparyayaḥ eva dṛḍham avasthāpyate
na ca anyatara pakṣa avadhāraṇam api vidyate jīvana bhāva abhāvau hi atra saṃdihyate
na ca anayoḥ anyatarasya api bahirbhāva kalpanayā nirṇayaḥ bhavati
anyat hi jīvanam anyaḥ ca bahis deśa saṃbandhaḥ
na ca gṛha abhāva nibandhana arthāpattiḥ jīvana nirṇayāya alam bhavati

original: nahyevaṃ saṃbhavati yasmāddevadatto gṛhe nāsti tasmājjīvatīti,
analyzed: na hi evam saṃbhavati yasmāt devadattaḥ gṛhe na asti tasmāt jīvati iti

original: pratyuta pūrvaniścitameva jīvanaṃ gṛhābhāvādeva saṃdigdhaṃ kathaṃ tata eva nirṇīyate /
analyzed: pratyuta pūrva niścitam eva jīvanam gṛha abhāvāt eva saṃdigdham katham tatas eva nirṇīyate
na hi saṃśaya hetuḥ eva nirṇaya hetuḥ bhavati

original: tasmājjīvanaṃ saṃdigdhaṃ tattāvadanyato niścitya paścādbahiḥsaṃbandhaḥ kalpayitavyaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt jīvanam saṃdigdham tat tāvat anyatas niścitya paścāt bahis saṃbandhaḥ kalpayitavyaḥ

original: yasmāddevadatto jīvati gṛhe ca nāsti tasmānnūnaṃ bahiravasthita iti /
analyzed: yasmāt devadattaḥ jīvati gṛhe ca na asti tasmāt nūnam bahis avasthitaḥ iti

original: na tu saṃdihyamāne jīvane tatkalpanaṃ saṃbhavati /
analyzed: na tu saṃdihyamāne jīvane tad kalpanam saṃbhavati

original: yasmādavidyamāno gṛhe jīvati vā navā tasmādbahiḥ sthita ityasaṃbaddhameva syāt /
analyzed: yasmāt a vidyamānaḥ gṛhe jīvati vā na vā tasmāt bahis sthitaḥ iti asaṃbaddham eva syāt

original: tasmādbahirbhāvaniyataṃ gṛhābhāvasahitaṃ jīvanaṃ niścitya bahirbhāvaḥ kalpyata ityanumānamevedaṃ na pramāṇāntaramiti //
analyzed: tasmāt bahirbhāva niyatam gṛha abhāva sahitam jīvanam niścitya bahirbhāvaḥ kalpyate iti anumānam eva idam na pramāṇa antaram iti

original: atrābhidhīyate- na tāvadgṛhābhāvamātraṃ liṅgaṃ mṛte 'pi saṃbhavāt /
analyzed: atra abhidhīyate na tāvat gṛha abhāva mātram liṅgam mṛte saṃbhavāt
na jīvana mātram gṛhe sadbhāvāt
atas jīvana saṃsṛṣṭaḥ gṛha abhāvaḥ liṅgam iti vaktavyam
prathamam ca liṅgam avagamya paścāt liṅgi anumānena bhavitavyam
na tu liṅga avagama samayaḥ eva liṅgi avagamaḥ

original: atra ca na bahirbhāvāvagamamantareṇa gṛhābhāvo jīvanaṃ ca saṃsṛṣṭaṃ pratyetuṃ śakyate virodhāt /
analyzed: atra ca na bahirbhāva avagamam antareṇa gṛha abhāvaḥ jīvanam ca saṃsṛṣṭam pratyetum śakyate virodhāt

original: jīvatā hyavaśyaṃ gṛhe vā bahirvā sthātavyamityasaṃdigdham /
analyzed: jīvatā hi avaśyam gṛhe vā bahis vā sthātavyam iti asaṃdigdham

original: ataśca bahirbhāvamanantarbhāvya jīvanagṛhābhāvau samuccitya pratipadyamānasyedṛśī pratipattirāpadyate devadatto gṛhe 'navasthito gṛhe vā bahirvāvasthita  #
analyzed: atas ca bahirbhāvam an antar bhāvya jīvana gṛha abhāvau samuccitya pratipadyamānasya īdṛśī pratipattiḥ āpadyate devadattaḥ gṛhe gṛhe vā bahis vā avasthita
iti
na ca evam saṃbhavati bhāva abhāvayoḥ ekatra deśe samuccetam aśakya tvāt
atas vaśyam deśa bhedena eva devadattasya bhāva abhāvau samuccetavyau
tena bhāva abhāva saṃsarga buddhyā eva bahuḥ bhāvasya buddha tvāt na paścāt kiñcid prameyam asti
āha ca vidyamāna tva saṃsṛṣṭa geha abhāva dhiyā anayā
gehāt utkālitā sattā bahis eva avatiṣṭhate iti

original: nanu pramāṇāntaratvepi jīvanamātrasya gṛhābhāvamātrasya vāvagamakatvābhāvātsaṃsṛṣṭamubhayaṃ gamakamityaṅgīkartavyam /
analyzed: nanu pramāṇa antara tve pi jīvana mātrasya gṛha abhāva mātrasya vā avagamaka tva abhāvāt saṃsṛṣṭam ubhayam gamakam iti aṅgīkartavyam

original: saṃsṛṣṭadhiyaiva ca bahirbhāvasya buddhatvānna paścāt kiñcutprameyamavaśiṣyata iti tulyo 'yaṃ doṣaḥ /
analyzed: saṃsṛṣṭa dhiyā eva ca bahirbhāvasya buddha tvāt na paścāt kiñcud prameyam avaśiṣyate iti tulyaḥ yam doṣaḥ

original: ucyate- iyameva saṃsṛṣṭadhīrarthāpattirityavagamya śāmyatu bhavān kiṃ punastasyāḥ kāraṇam /
analyzed: ucyate iyam eva saṃsṛṣṭa dhīḥ arthāpattiḥ iti avagamya śāmyatu bhavān kim punar tasyāḥ kāraṇam
dvayoḥ gṛha abhāva da jīvanayoḥ paraspara pratighātaḥ iti brūmaḥ

original: yathā khalvekena nadyāstīre phalāni santītyukte pareṇa ca na santītyukte pareṇa na santītyukte balābalaviśeṣamajānānaḥ śrotā mithaḥ pratihatamubhayaṃ  #
analyzed: yathā khalu ekena nadyāḥ tīre phalāni santi iti ukte pareṇa ca na santi iti ukte pareṇa na santi iti ukte bala abala viśeṣam a jānānaḥ śrotā mithas pratihatam ubhayam
buddhyate
na ca anyatarat api tyuktum gṛhītum vā śaknoti
tathā api tu na
satva asatve samuccinoti virodhāt

original: evamihāpi gṛhe vā bahirvāvasthito devadatta iti kenacitpramāṇena pratītam /
analyzed: evam iha api gṛhe vā bahis vā avasthitaḥ devadattaḥ iti kenacid pramāṇena pratītam

original: anyena ca gṛhe nāstīti tadubhayaṃ samuccitam parasparapratighāti pratīyate so 'yaṃ
analyzed: anyena ca gṛhe na asti iti tat ubhayam samuccitam paraspara pratighāti pratīyate saḥ yam

original: pratighāto na phalasadbhāvavadasamādheyaḥ kintu bahirbhāvakalpanayā samādhātuṃ śakyata ityetāvānviśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: pratighātaḥ na phala sadbhāva vat asamādheyaḥ kintu bahirbhāva kalpanayā samādhātum śakyate iti etāvān viśeṣaḥ

original: tena pramāṇasiddhayordvayorarthayoḥ parasparaṃ pratighātor'thāntarakalpanayā samādheyatvenālocyamānor'thāpatteḥ kāraṇam /
analyzed: tena pramāṇa siddhayoḥ dvayoḥ arthayoḥ parasparam pratighāta ūrtha antara kalpanayā samādheya tvena ālocyamāna ūrtha āpatteḥ kāraṇam
tad samādhānāya ca artha antara kalpanā arthāpattiḥ pramāṇa antaram anumānāt

original: yaścāyaṃ pratītasya pramāṇāntareṇa pratighātaḥ sa evārthānupapattirityucyate //
analyzed: yaḥ ca ayam pratītasya pramāṇa antareṇa pratighātaḥ saḥ eva artha anupapattiḥ iti ucyate
arthāpattau anumānasya antarbhāva śaṅkā
bhavatu arthāpattiḥ pramāṇam anumānam tu arthāpattau eva antarbhavati
tathā hi yatra yatra dhūmaḥ tatra tatra agniḥ iti avagatam
parvatasya ca dhūmavat tā avagatā

original: yadi parvate 'gnirna syāttadī dhūmavattā vā mithyā syāt /
analyzed: yadi parvate gniḥ na syāt tadī dhūmavat tā vā mithyā syāt

original: sarvadhūmavatāṃ vāgimattvaṃ mithyā syāt kathaṃ tadubhayamapyamithyā syādityagnimatvaṃ kalpyata ityarthāpattireṣā /
analyzed: sarva dhūmavatām vāgimattvam mithyā syāt katham tat ubhayam api amithyā syāt iti agnimatvam kalpyate iti arthāpattiḥ eṣā
syāt evam yadi sarva dhūmavatām agnimat tvam anumānāt anyena avagatam syāt
na tu evam asti
dṛṣṭānta dharmiṣu eva hi dhūmasya agni niyamaḥ vagataḥ na sarvatra
anumānaḥ tu sarva dhūmavatām agnimat tā avagatiḥ iti uktam

original: na ca dṛṣṭāntadharmiṣvevāvagatasyāgniniyamasya sarvadhūmavadagnimattāṃ vinā kaścidvirodho yenārthāpattiḥ syāt /
analyzed: na ca dṛṣṭānta dharmiṣu eva avagatasya agni niyamasya sarva dhūma vat agnimat tām vinā kaścid virodhaḥ yena arthāpattiḥ syāt

original: tasmādasaṃkīrṇaviṣayatvādanumānenāvagataṃ tasya parvatādiṣu dhūmadarśanādyadāgnivijñānaṃ tadaddvedhāpi saṃbhavati dṛṣṭāntaparidṛṣṭaniyamasmaraṇādvānumānam
analyzed: tasmāt asaṃkīrṇa viṣaya tvāt anumānena avagatam tasya parvata ādiṣu dhūma darśanāt yadā agni vijñānam tadat dvedhā api saṃbhavati dṛṣṭānta paridṛṣṭa niyama smaraṇāt vā anumānam
tasmāt arthāpattiḥ pramāṇa antaram
yā api kvacid avasthitasya devadattasya anyatra sarvatra abhāva pratipattiḥ sā api arthāpattiḥ

original: tathāhi mūrtasyārthasya yugapatkārsnyenānekadeśasaṃbandho na ghaṭata iti svaśarīre 'vagatam /
analyzed: tathā hi mūrtasya arthasya yugapad kārsnyena aneka deśa saṃbandhaḥ na ghaṭate iti sva śarīre vagatam

original: svaśarīrasya hi kvacidavasthitasya tato 'nyatra sarvatrābhāvo dṛśyādarśanenāvagataḥ,
analyzed: sva śarīrasya hi kvacid avasthitasya tatas nyatra sarvatra abhāvaḥ dṛśya adarśanena avagataḥ
atas nyasya api devadatta ādeḥ yugupad aneka deśa saṃbandhaḥ na asti iti anumīyate

original: tato devadattaṃ kvacitpratyakṣeṇāvagacchanyugapadanekadeśāsaṃbandhaṃ cānumānenāvadhārayannubhayopapattaye deśāntareṣu sarveṣvabhāvaṃ kalpayati
analyzed: tatas devadattam kvacid pratyakṣeṇa avagacchan yugapad aneka deśa asaṃbandham ca anumānena avadhārayan ubhaya upapattaye deśa antareṣu sarveṣu abhāvam kalpayati

original: nanvanumānamevedaṃ saṃbhavati devadatto 'dhunā sarvatra nāsti gṛhe 'vasthitatvānmadvaditi /
analyzed: nanu anumānam eva idam saṃbhavati devadattaḥ dhunā sarvatra na asti gṛhe vasthita tvāt madvat iti
satyam
devadattena saha eka deśa avasthitasya saṃbhavati

original: yastu kvacidgṛhe 'vasthitastadanantaraṃ gṛhamapyatītya tṛtīye gṛhe devadattaṃ kenacitpramāṇenāvagatavān
analyzed: yaḥ tu kvacid gṛhe vasthitaḥ tad anantaram gṛham api atītya tṛtīye gṛhe devadattam kenacid pramāṇena avagatavān

original: sa tadgṛhātirikte madhyagṛhe deśāntareṣu ca sarveṣvabhāvaṃ devadattasya kena liṅgena pratīyāt /
analyzed: sa tad gṛha atirikte madhya gṛhe deśa antareṣu ca sarveṣu abhāvam devadattasya kena liṅgena pratīyāt

original: atha kvaciddevadattaṃ paśyan taddeśavyatirikte ca pratyāsanne deśe tadabhāvamavagacchannanyeṣāmapi sarvadeśānāṃ pratyāsannadevadattaddeśavyatiriktatvāttacchūnyatāmanumimīte
analyzed: atha kvacid devadattam paśyan tad deśa vyatirikte ca pratyāsanne deśe tad abhāvam avagacchan anyeṣām api sarva deśānām pratyāsanna devadatta deśa vyatirikta tvāt tad śūnyatām anumimīte
tatra api viruddha avyabhicāri tvam tadvat eva hi gamyate
samīpa deśa bhinna tvāt caitra adhiṣṭhita deśa vat
iti vārtike eva dūṣaṇam uktam tasmāt arthāpattiḥ evā iyam
etena bīja ādiṣu aṅkura janana śakti kalpanā vyākhyātā

original: kiṃ punaḥ śaktikalpanāṃ vinā nopapadyate bījādiṣu satsvaṅgurādyupapattidarśanāt asatsu cādarśanāt /
analyzed: kim punar śakti kalpanām vinā nā upapadyate bīja ādiṣu satsu aṅgurā ādi upapatti darśanāt asatsu ca adarśanāt
bīja ādīnām aṅkura ādi kāraṇa tvam avagamyate
satsu api bījeṣu mūṣika āghrāteṣu aṅkura anutpatteḥ akāraṇa tvam pratibhāsate
saḥ yam kāraṇa tva akāraṇa tvayoḥ virodhaḥ śakti kalpanayā samādhīyate nūnam asti atīndriyam api

original: rūpaṃ yadbhāvāt kadācidaṅkurotpattiḥ yasya ca mūṣikā'ghrāṇena nāśātkadācidanutpattiriti
analyzed: rūpam yad bhāvāt kadācid aṅkura utpattiḥ yasya ca mūṣika āghrāṇena nāśāt kadācid anutpattiḥ iti
kalpyate ghrāṇa abhāvaḥ pi aṅkurasya kāraṇam

original: ghrāṇo ca sati tadabhāvādevānutpattyupapatteralaṃ śaktikalpanayeti cet / na /
analyzed: ca sati tad abhāvāt eva anutpatti upapatteḥ alam śakti kalpanayā iti ced na
ghrāṇa kriyāyāḥ kṣaṇika tvāt uttarakālam tad abhāve sati api aṅkura anutpatteḥ

original: prāgabhāvaḥ kāraṇaṃ na pradhvaṃsābhāva iti cet / na /
analyzed: prāgabhāvaḥ kāraṇam na pradhvaṃsa abhāvaḥ iti ced na
abhāva tva aviśeṣāt

original: na hi prāgabhāvapradhvaṃsābhāvayoḥ prāgūrdhvakālabhedaṃ muktvā kiñcidapi rūpavailakṣaṇyamasti,
analyzed: na hi prāgabhāva pradhvaṃsa abhāvayoḥ prāc ūrdhva kāla bhedam muktvā kiñcid api rūpa vailakṣaṇyam asti
na ca avilakṣaṇe kāraṇe kārya vailakṣaṇyam saṃbhavati

original: prāgabhāvasya pradhvaṃsābhāvādvilakṣaṇamasti rūpamiti cet kalpyamevaṃ sati kiñcit /
analyzed: prāgabhāvasya pradhvaṃsa abhāvāt vilakṣaṇam asti rūpam iti ced kalpyam evam sati kiñcid

original: taccābhāve kalpyatāṃ bījasvarūpe veti bījasya sākṣādaṅkukāraṇatvāttatraiva kalpayituṃ yuktam /
analyzed: tat ca abhāve kalpyatām bīja svarūpe vā iti bījasya sākṣāt aṅku kāraṇa tvāt tatra eva kalpayitum yuktam
evam yāga ādeḥ apūrva svarga ādi sādhana śakti kalpanam ūhanīyam

original: kathaṃ punaḥ śaktimati yāge vinaṣṭe nirādhārā śaktiravatiṣṭhate,
analyzed: katham punar śaktimati yāge vinaṣṭe nirādhārā śaktiḥ avatiṣṭhate
na nirādhārā bhaviṣyati
ātma ādhāra tvāt
katham anya śaktiḥ anyatra syāt tathā avagamāt
na avaśyam sva āśrayā eva śaktiḥ iti

original: sā hi kāryataḥ kalpyamānā yatraiva kāryāya
analyzed: sā hi kāryataḥ kalpyamānā yatra eva kāryāya
kalpate tad gatā eva kalpyā

original: sāceyaṃpūrvākhyātiryāgāśrayā satī yāgavināśānna svarganiṣpattaye paryāptayādityātmāśrayā kalpyate /
analyzed: sā ca iyam pūrvā khyātiḥ yāga āśrayā satī yāga vināśāt na svarga niṣpattaye paryāptayāt iti ātma āśrayā kalpyate
yathā āha śaktiḥ kārya anumeya tvāt yad gatā eva upayujyate
tatra eva sā abhyupetavyā sva āśrayā anya āśrayā api vā iti
katham ātma āśrayā satī yāga śaktiḥ iti vyapadiśyate

original: tasya hi phalasādhanatvamupapāpādayituṃ sā kalpyate tāvatā tacchaktitvam /
analyzed: tasya hi phala sādhana tvam upapāpādayitum sā kalpyate tāvatā tad śakti tvam

original: loke 'pi prasiddhametat tailapānasāmarthyācciravṛtte 'pi tasminbalapuṣṭyādikamadya me jātamiti laukikā vyavaharanti tasmādanavadyam //
analyzed: loke pi prasiddham etat taila pāna sāmarthyāt cira vṛtte pi tasmin bala puṣṭi ādikam adya me jātam iti laukikāḥ vyavaharanti tasmāt anavadyam

original: dṛṣcagrahaṇenaiva pratītimātragrahācchautasyāpi grahaṇe siddhe śrutārthāpatteḥ pramāṇagrāhiṇītvena dṛṣṭārthāpattito vailakṣaṇyamupapādayituṃ  #
analyzed: dṛṣca grahaṇena eva pratīti mātra grahāt śautasya api grahaṇe siddhe śruta arthāpatteḥ pramāṇa grāhiṇī tvena dṛṣṭārtha āpattitaḥ vailakṣaṇyam upapādayitum
śruta grahaṇaṇ

original: tathāhi loke tāvat dvāraṃ dvāramityādiṣu saṃpūrṇārthapratipādanāya saṃvriyatāmityādiśabdāntaraṃ śrutaśabdaikavākthatvena
analyzed: tathā hi loke tāvat dvāram dvāram ityādiṣu saṃpūrṇa artha pratipādanāya saṃvriyatām iti ādi śabda antaram śruta śabda eka vāktha tvena
kalpyate

original: tathā vede 'pi viśvajitā yājetetyatra svargakāma iti vā svargārthamiti vā yenaiva
analyzed: tathā vede viśvajitā yājeta iti atra svarga kāmaḥ iti vā svarga artham iti vā yena eva

original: śabdena śrutiśabdaikavākyabhūtena paripūrṇārthābhidhānaṃ saṃpadyate tadeva hṛdayamānīya
analyzed: śabdena śruti śabda eka vākya bhūtena paripūrṇa artha abhidhānam saṃpadyate tat eva hṛdayam ānīya
śrutena saha melayitvā paripūraṇāt vākyāt vākya arthaḥ pratīyate
yathā sauryam carum nirvapet brahmavarcasa kāmaḥ ityādiṣu vidhiṣu itikartavyatā pratipādaka śabda aśravaṇāt apūrṇeṣu
tad pratipādaka śabda anapekṣayā codanā liṅga upasthāpitasya āgneya vidhekhi aṃśasya sādhya sādhana aṃśa pratipādaka bhāgau anapekṣita tvāt an ādṛtya
yaḥ tṛtīyaḥ oṃśaḥ itthaṃbhāvaḥ gni atva ādhāna ādiḥ vidhi anta tvena parikalpitaḥ tasya divat śabdena kalpitena

original: kintu ya evāyamāgneyavidhyantastasyaiva vyavahitasyāpi codanāliṅgabalopasthāpitasya vikṛtividhinā sahaikavākyatāmātramarthāpattyā kalpyate
analyzed: kintu yaḥ eva ayam āgneya vidhi antaḥ tasya eva vyavahitasya api codanā liṅga bala upasthāpitasya vikṛti vidhinā saha eka vākya tā mātram arthāpattyā kalpyate
na hi ayam anuṣaṅgaḥ yena vyavahitasya na syāt iti
atideśaḥ tu ayam vyavahitasya api kathañcid upasthānāt upapannaḥ eva

original: tathā ca vakṣyati- vidhyaṃnto vā prakṛtivaccodanāyāṃ pravarteti vidhyanta iti pradhānavidhivarjitaṃ samastameva pauroḍāśikaṃ kāṇḍamabhidhīyata  #
analyzed: tathā ca vakṣyati vidhyantaḥ vā prakṛti vat codanāyām pravarta iti vidhyantaḥ iti pradhāna vidhi varjitam samastam eva pauroḍāśikam kāṇḍam abhidhīyata  /
iti bhāṣyakāraḥ
nanu evam śāstra atideśa aṅgīkaraṇe daśama ādi avirodhaḥ syāt
ūha bādhayoḥ ca asiddhiḥ

original: bhavedevaṃ yadi yathāśrutarūpameva vrīhinavahantīti vākyaṃ vikṛtiṃ nītvā tasya yathāsaṃbhavaṃ vikṛtividhinā sahaikavākyatā parikalpyeta /
analyzed: bhavet evam yadi yathāśruta rūpam eva vrīhinavahanti iti vākyam vikṛtim nītvā tasya yathāsaṃbhavam vikṛti vidhinā saha eka vākya tā parikalpyeta

original: yadi tathā kriyate tatra kṛṣṇalacarau vrīhiśabdasya havirlaṇārthatvāyogādavadhātasya bādhaḥ syāt /
analyzed: yadi tathā kriyate tatra kṛṣṇala carau vrīhi śabdasya haviḥ laṇa artha tva ayogāt avadhātasya bādhaḥ syāt

original: evaṃ nīvārādiṣvapi vrīhaya evāvahantavyāḥ iti na nīvārādiṣvavahantirūhyeta /
analyzed: evam nīvāra ādiṣu api vrīhayaḥ eva avahantavyāḥ iti na nīvāra ādiṣu avahantiḥ ūhyeta

original: natvevamasmābhirucyate kintu prakṛtau pradhānena sahaikavākyatayāvagatasyāsya yāvanparikaro tādṛgatidiśyate prakṛtau haviṣṭvāt,
analyzed: na tu evam asmābhiḥ ucyate kintu prakṛtau pradhānena saha eka vākya tayā avagatasya asya yāvān parikaro tādṛś atidiśyate prakṛtau haviḥ tvāt
tad lakṣaṇa arthaḥ

original: avaghātasya ca teṣu dṛṣṭaṃ prayojanaṃ tuṣavimocanaṃ saṃbhavatīti taddvāreṇāsya pradhānaikavākyatā /
analyzed: avaghātasya ca teṣu dṛṣṭam prayojanam tuṣa vimocanam saṃbhavati iti tad dvāreṇa asya pradhāna eka vākya tā

original: tataśca- avaghātavituṣīkṛtairvrīhibhiḥ puroḍāśaṃ kṛtvā tena yajetetīdṛśaḥ prakṛtividhiḥ,
analyzed: tatas ca avaghāta vituṣīkṛtaiḥ vrīhibhiḥ puroḍāśam kṛtvā tena yajeta iti īdṛśaḥ prakṛti vidhiḥ
tasya sākṣāt avaghātaḥ viśeṣaṇam
avaghāta viśeṣita vituṣīkaraṇa viśiṣṭam hi haviḥ yāgasya viśeṣaṇam prakṛtau
atas tat eva vikṛtau ākṛṣyate

original: kṛṣṇalayāge ca kṛṣṇalaśabdasya havirvācinaḥ pratyakṣaśravaṇāttadvirodhātpuroḍāśaśabdo nivartate,
analyzed: kṛṣṇala yāge ca kṛṣṇala śabdasya haviḥ vācinaḥ pratyakṣa śravaṇāt tad virodhāt puroḍāśa śabdaḥ nivartate
tad nivṛttyā ca vrīhīṇām api nivṛttiḥ

original: na hi te kṛṣṇalānāṃ prakṛtitvena saṃbhavanti /
analyzed: na hi te kṛṣṇalānām prakṛti tvena saṃbhavanti

original: vituṣīkaraṇaśabdo 'pi yo dvārapratipādakaḥ so 'pi kṛṣṇaleṣu tadasaṃbhavādanivṛtto 'vaghāta ityūhasyāpi siddhiḥ /
analyzed: vituṣīkaraṇa śabdaḥ api yaḥ dvāra pratipādakaḥ saḥ api kṛṣṇaleṣu tad asaṃbhavāt anivṛttaḥ vaghātaḥ iti ūhasya api siddhiḥ
daśama ādye ca yāvat śrutānām aṅga śāstrāṇām atideśam āśaṅkyā prakṛti anvitānām tena rūpeṇa atideśaḥ
na artha mātreṇa iti alam atiprasaṅgena
nanu artham eva adhyāhṛtya vākyam pūryatām kim śabda kalpanayā
na artha mātreṇa pūraṇam saṃbhavati

original: ekavākyabhūtapadadvayapratipāditā hi padārthā vākyārthaṃ pratipādayanti nānyathā /
analyzed: eka vākya bhūta pada dvaya pratipāditāḥ hi padārthāḥ vākya artham pratipādayanti na anyathā

original: na hi ānaya ityetāvatyukte gāmityanukte pratyakṣapratipanne 'pi gavi gavā sahānayanamanvīyate /
analyzed: na hi ānaya iti etāvati ukte gām iti anukte pratyakṣa pratipanne gavi gavā saha ānayanam anvīyate
evam ca vikṛtiṣu
saurya ādiṣu asamaveta artha agrya ādi pada nivṛtteḥ nyūna sākāṅkṣa mantra vākya pūraṇāya sūrya ādi pada aprakṣepāt ūha siddhiḥ

original: arthādhyāhāravādināṃ tu sūryārthenādhyāhṛtena viśiṣṭaṃ nirvapāmipadameva prakāśayatīti nohaḥ sidhyet /
analyzed: artha adhyāhāra vādinām tu sūrya arthena adhyāhṛtena viśiṣṭam nirvapāmi padam eva prakāśayati iti na ūhaḥ sidhyet

original: tathā yatrādhikāravākyer'thavādamātraṃ śrutaṃ pratitiṣṭhanti ha vā ya etā rātrīrupayantīti tatrāpi bhavanmate vidhyarthaṃ evādhyāhāryo na vidhiśabdaḥ,
analyzed: tathā yatra adhikāra vākye ṛthavāda mātram śrutam pratitiṣṭhanti ha vā ye etāḥ rātrīḥ upayanti iti tatra api bhavat mate vidhi artham eva adhyāhāryaḥ na vidhi śabdaḥ

original: tataśca prākṛtasyopakārasya padārthānāṃ ca nāpūrvaidamarthyaṃ sidhyet /
analyzed: tatas ca prākṛtasya upakārasya padārthānām ca na apūrvā aidamarthyam sidhyet
satsu api hi arthānām ākāṅkṣā saṃnidhi yogya tveṣu na abhidhānam antareṇa anvaya siddhiḥ

original: nacehāpūrvābhidhāyī śabdo 'sti yo 'pūrvaṃ prākṛtairanvitasteṣāmanvayaḥ nāpyutpattyapūrveṇānvaya eva syāt //*//
analyzed: na ca iha apūrva abhidhāyī śabdaḥ sti yaḥ pūrvam prākṛtaiḥ anvitaḥ teṣām anvayaḥ na api utpatti apūrveṇa anvayaḥ eva syāt

original: evaṃ prakṛtāvapi sarvebhyaḥ kāmebhyo darśapūrṇamāsau ityatra vidhiśabdasyānāmnānādanadhyāhārācca
analyzed: evam prakṛtau api sarvebhyaḥ kāmebhyaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsau iti atra vidhi śabdasya anāmnānāt anadhyāhārāt ca
vidhi arthasya eva svarga kāma adhikāra apūrvāt āgneya ādi utpatti apūrvebhyaḥ ca pṛthak bhūtasya adhyāhārāt na
samidh ādīnām aidamarthyam sidhyet
na hi samidh ādi yajatayaḥ vaghāta ādi vat adhikāra apūrva anvitam sva arthām abhidhātum alam sva apūrva viṣaya tva vyāghātāt
tasmāt īdṛdṛśeṣu adhikāra vidhiṣu vidhi śabdaḥ eva adhyāhāryaḥ na arthaḥ

original: kathaṃ ca vidhyarthasyātyantālaukikatayā pramāṇena tadābhāsena vā buddhāvāropayitumaśakyatvenābhimatasya
analyzed: katham ca vidhi arthasya atyanta alaukika tayā pramāṇena tad ābhāsena vā buddhau āropayitum aśakya tvena abhimatasya
buddhi saṃnidhāna tmakaḥ śruta vidhi śabdakeṣu adhikāra vākyeṣu vā utpatti vākyeṣu
yat āgneyaḥ kapālaḥ māvāsyāyām ityādiṣu vā śakyate
iti akāmena api śabda adhyāhāraḥ ṅgīkartavyaḥ iti āstām tāvat
iti arthāpattivādaḥ
abhāva anupalabdhi
paricchedaḥ
pramāṇa abhāvaḥ na asti iti asya arthasya asaṃnikṛṣṭasya iti
katham punar pramāṇa abhāvaḥ pramāṇa lakṣaṇam viparīta tvāt
tad abhāvaḥ ca ṣaṣṭhasya lakṣaṇam iti na anupapattiḥ
kim asya prameyam

original: prameyābhāvātṣaṣṭhaṃ pramāṇaṃ nāstītyāha tasya dṛśyādarśanānantaraṃ nāstīha bhūtale ghaṭa ityevamupajāyamānasya jñānasya kimālambanam /

original: tathāhi yo 'ṅgulīyakabubhutsayā sasantamasāvapavarakadeśaṃ hastābhyāṃ sarvataḥ parāmṛṣṭavān tasya tāvat sarvadeśaparāmarśāt vastuto yogyānupalabdhirjātaiva,

original: kadācittu sarvato 'parāmṛśyāpi sarvataḥ parāmṛṣṭamiti bhrāntyā yogyānupalabdhiṃ niścityāsatyāmeva tasyāṃ bhrāntyāṅgulīyakasyābhāvamavadhārayati

original: nanu cābhāvalaṅgīkāre tanmātradhīrapi na kadācinnirūpayituṃ śakyate,

original: ato ghaṭādivedanābhāve sati yā bhūtaladhīḥ sā tanmātradhīḥ /

original: yogyapramāṇānudayaśca tasya sattāmātreṇaiva netrādivadbodhako na jñātatayā,

original: yattu satyāpi yogyānupalambho hi kāraṇaṃ tatra yogyatvaṃ jñātatayaiva kāraṇaṃ na sattāmātreṇa,
analyzed: yat tu satyā api yogya anupalambhaḥ hi kāraṇam tatra yogya tvam jñāta tayā eva kāraṇam na sattā mātreṇa

original: tataḥ yogyatvaṃ kadācidajñātaṃ nābhāvamavadhārayati kadācittvavidyamānameva yogyatvaṃ bhrāntyā niścityābhāvamavadhārayati /

upalabdhi abhāvaḥ tu sat mātra tayā kāraṇam na jñāta tayā

original: yo 'hani prātaḥkāle gṛhe 'vasthito madhyandinasamaye pṛcchyate kimasmingṛhe prātaḥkāle
analyzed: yaḥ hani prātaḥkāle gṛhe vasthitaḥ madhyandina samaye pṛcchyate kim asmin gṛhe prātaḥkāle

original: māthuraḥ kiścitpuruṣaḥ śuklavāsā dīrghatamo lohitavarṇaḥ samāgataḥ iti sa tadānīmeva
analyzed: māthuraḥ kiścid puruṣaḥ śukla vāsāḥ dīrghatamaḥ lohita varṇaḥ samāgataḥ iti sa tadānīm eva

analyzed: vyāpaka nivṛttyā vyāpya nivṛttim anumimānena avaśyam dṛṣṭānta dharmiṣu nivṛtti dvayam avagamya tatas dṛśya nivṛttiḥ anumātavyā
nivṛtteḥ ca abhāva ātmikayai na pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇam saṃbhavati

original: nivṛttyantareṇa tadanumāne tadapi nivṛttirūpatvānnivṛttyantareṇānumātavyam tadapi tathetyanavasthāpattiḥ /
analyzed: nivṛtti antareṇa tad anumāne tat api nivṛtti rūpa tvāt nivṛtti antareṇa anumātavyam tat api tathā iti anavasthā āpattiḥ
atas vaśyam kvacid pramāṇa antara bhūtayā anupalabdhyā abhāvaḥ pratyetavyaḥ
pramite ca tasmin paścāt bhavatu anumānam

original: siddhaṃ tāvadabhāvasya pramāṇāntaratvaṃ śabdopamānārthāpattayastu nāśaṅganīyā eva /
analyzed: siddham tāvat abhāvasya pramāṇa antara tvam śabda upamāna artha āpattayaḥ tu na āśaṅganīyāḥ eva
atas siddham ṣaṣṭham pramāṇam
etāvanti eva ca pramāṇāni
yat tu adhikam saṃbhava ākhyam pramāṇam sahasra ādi saṃkhyayā avayava bhūta śata ādi saṃkhyā avagatiḥ āḍhaka pramāṇena avayava kuḍava parimāṇa avagatiḥ kaiścid iṣyate
tad avinābhāva nimitta tvāt anumānam eva

original: vaṭevaṭe vaiśravaṇaḥ ityādikaṃ caitihyaṃ pramāṇameva na bhavati nirṇayābhāvāt /
analyzed: vaṭevaṭe vaiśravaṇaḥ iti ādikam caitihyam pramāṇam eva na bhavati nirṇaya abhāvāt
prāmāṇye api vā āgame ntargata tvāt na pramāṇa antaram
prātibhākhyam api pramāṇam kaiścid iṣṭam śvas te bhrātā āgantā iti ādikam
tat tu liṅga ādi ābhāsa jam
aniścāyaka tvāt eva apramāṇam
atas yat kāśyapīyaiḥ pratibhā agamyam ṛṣīṇām dharma adharma tvam āśritam tat asāram
loka prasiddhiḥ api pratyakṣa antargatā eva iti na pramāṇa antaram
atas ṣaḍ eva pramāṇāni

original: tathā ca bhagavadrāmāyaṇe rāma ṣaḍyuktayo loke yābhiḥ sarvo 'nudṛśyate iti /
analyzed: tathā ca bhagavat rāmāyaṇe rāma ṣaḍ yuktayaḥ loke yābhiḥ sarvaḥ nu dṛśyate iti
iti ābhāva vādaḥ
citra ādi aihika phala codanāsu ākṣepaḥ

original: lokaprasiddhasvataḥprāmāṇyadarśanena pratyakṣādīnāṃ tadantargatasyāpi ca śāstrasya svataḥprāmāṇyāt codanālakṣaṇor'tho dharmaḥ
analyzed: loka prasiddha svatas prāmāṇya darśanena pratyakṣa ādīnām tad antargatasya api ca śāstrasya svatas prāmāṇyāt codanā lakṣaṇa ūrthaḥ dharmaḥ

original: iti pratijñāter'the sādhite saṃprati animittaṃ vidyamānopalambhanatvāt ityanena citrādicodanānāmaihikaphalānāṃ pratyakṣādibhirasaṃvādena visaṃvādena  #
analyzed: iti pratijñāta irthe sādhite saṃprati animittam vidyamāna upalambhana tvāt iti anena citra ādi codanānām aihika phalānām pratyakṣa ādibhiḥ asaṃvādena visaṃvādena
ca prāmāṇyam ākṣipyate

original: pūrvoktastu nanvatathābhūtaṃ ityākṣepaḥ paralokaphalasvargakāmādicodanāviṣaya iti viṣayabhedādapaunaruktyam //*//
analyzed: pūrva uktaḥ tu nanu atathābhūtam iti ākṣepaḥ para loka phala svarga kāma ādi codanā viṣayaḥ iti viṣaya bhedāt apaunaruktyam

original: nanu ca nanvatathābhūtamapyarthaṃ brūyāccodaneti codanāmātraparigrahādaviśeṣeṇaivāsāvākṣepaḥ tathehāpi yadā tāvadasau vidyamānāsīt tadā phalaṃ  #
analyzed: nanu ca nanu atathābhūtam api artham brūyāt codanā iti codanā mātra parigrahāt aviśeṣeṇa eva asau ākṣepaḥ tathā iha api yadā tāvat asau vidyamānā āsīt tadā phalam
na dattavatī

original: yadā phalamutpadyate tadāsau nāsti kathamasatī phalaṃ dāsyatītyākṣepasya svargakāmacodanāsvapi tulyatvādaviśeṣatvamiti nāsti viṣayabhedaḥ /
analyzed: yadā phalam utpadyate tadā asau na asti katham asatī phalam dāsyati iti ākṣepasya svarga kāma codanāsu api tulya tvāt aviśeṣa tvam iti na asti viṣaya bhedaḥ
ucyate pūrva ākṣepaḥ tāvat paraloka phala viṣayaḥ eva

original: tatra hi pramāṇāntarāpekṣaḥ śabdo na svātantryeṇa pramāṇam /
analyzed: tatra hi pramāṇa antara apekṣaḥ śabdaḥ na svātantryeṇa pramāṇam

original: na ca codanārthe pramāṇāntaramasti ato 'pramāṇaṃ codanetyayamākṣepaḥ,
analyzed: na ca codanā arthe pramāṇa antaram asti pramāṇam codanā iti ayam ākṣepaḥ
sa ca ayam para loka phala viṣayaḥ eva bhavati

original: paśukāmacodanāsu hi yadi tāvatkarmānantarameva paśvādīnyupalabhyante tato 'pekṣitamūlapramāṇalābhātsiddhyati codanāyāḥ prāmāṇyam /
analyzed: paśu kāma codanāsu hi yadi tāvat karma anantaram eva paśu ādīni upalabhyante tatas u pekṣita mūlapramāṇa lābhāt siddhi ati codanāyāḥ prāmāṇyam

original: atha nopalabhyate tataḥ pramāṇāntarabādhenaiva sukhaprāmāṇyamabhidhātuṃ śakyata iti kimākṣepasārūpyapratipādanavyasanena /
analyzed: atha nā upalabhyate tatas pramāṇa antara bādhena eva sukha prāmāṇyam abhidhātum śakyate iti kim ākṣepa sārūpya pratipādana vyasanena
tasmāt sa tāvat para loka phala viṣayaḥ eva
ayam tu aihika phala viṣaya

original: na hi pāralaukikasya phalasyānantarakālānupalabdhyā nirāsaḥ saṃbhavati /
analyzed: na hi pāralaukikasya phalasya anantara kāla anupalabdhyā nirāsaḥ saṃbhavati
na hi tena anantaram bhavitavyam
janma antara bhāvita tvāt

original: nanu asatī kathaṃ phalaṃ dāsyatītīdaṃ tulyam /
analyzed: nanu asatī katham phalam dāsyati iti idam tulyam
na iti brūmaḥ apūrva dvāreṇa saṃbhavāt

original: svargo hi svabhāvāddehāntarānubhavanīyatvādanantarāsaṃbhavitvena śāstrārthāvadhāraṇavelāyāmeva kālāntare niścīyata ityapūrvamantarbhāvyaiva  #
analyzed: svargaḥ hi svabhāvāt deha antara anubhavanīya tvāt anantara asaṃbhavi tvena śāstra artha avadhāraṇa velāyām eva kāla antare niścīyate iti apūrvam antar bhāvyā eva
tatra śāstra arthaḥ vadhāryate
tat ca cira sthāyi iti kāraṇasya avināśāt saṃbhavati kāla antare svargasya utpattiḥ

original: paścādayastvanantaramapi saṃbhavantīti tatsādhanatvena codyamānānāṃ citrādīnāṃ śāstrārthāvadhāraṇasamaye
analyzed: paścādayaḥ tu anantaram api saṃbhavanti iti tad sādhana tvena codyamānānām citra ādīnām śāstra artha avadhāraṇa samaye

original: 'pūrvapraṇāḍīsamāśrayaṇe kāraṇaṃ na kiñcidastīti svarūpeṇaiva phalasādhanatvaṃ śāstrārtho 'vadhāryate /
analyzed: pūrva praṇāḍī samāśrayaṇe kāraṇam na kiñcid asti iti svarūpeṇa eva phala sādhanatvam śāstra arthaḥ vadhāryate
tathā ca anantaram eva palena
kāla antare karma svarūpasya vinaṣṭa tvāt kāraṇa tva abhāvāt
anantaram ca phalam anupalabdhyā eva nirastam iti aprāmāṇyam citra ādi codanānām
citra ādi codanāsu ākṣepa parihārau

original: nacānuṣṭhānānantaraṃ phalānupalabdhyaiva śāstrārthe 'pūrvamantarbhāvayituṃ śakyate śāstrārthāvadhāraṇapūrvakaṃ hyanuṣṭhānaṃ nānuṣṭhānapūrvakaṃ
analyzed: na ca anuṣṭhāna anantaram phala anupalabdhyā eva śāstra arthe pūrvam antarbhāvayitum śakyate śāstra artha avadhāraṇa pūrvakam hi anuṣṭhānam na anuṣṭhāna pūrvakam
tasmāt aihikānām atra ākṣepaḥ iti yuktaḥ viṣaya bhedaḥ
viṣaya bhedāt ca nyāyaḥ api bhidyate
para loka phalāsu pramāṇa apekṣita tvām ākṣepa nyāyaḥ
atra tu pramāṇa antara virodhaḥ iti nyāya bhedāt apaunaruktyam

original: athavā pūrvoktaṃ svamate sūtrāṇi vyācakṣaṇo sūtritamevākṣepaṃ darśitavān /
analyzed: athavā pūrvoktam sva mate sūtrāṇi sūtritam eva ākṣepam darśitavān
idānīm tu vṛtti kāra matena sūtreṇa eva ākṣepaḥ kriyate
tat iha
citra ādi vākyāni pramāṇāni apramāṇāni vā iti vicāryate

original: tadarthaṃ ca kiṃ teṣāṃ pramāṇāntaravirodho 'sti na veti /
analyzed: tad artham ca kim teṣām pramāṇa antara virodhaḥ sti na vā iti
tatra phalānām anantaram upalabdhavyānām anupalambhāt atatsādhanatvam citra ādīnām avagamyate
tat idam pratyakṣa avisaṃvāde vaśyaṃbhāvini sati tad abhāvāt aprāmāṇyam

original: kvacittu pratyakṣavirodhādapramāṇyaṃ sa eṣa yajñāyudhī yajamāno 'ñjasā svargaṃ yātīti yajñāyudhīti hi yajñāyudhasaṃyogāccharīramucyate,
analyzed: kvacid tu pratyakṣa virodhāt apramāṇyam saḥ eṣa yajñāyudhī yajamānaḥ ñjasā svargam yāti iti yajñāyudhī iti hi yajñāyudha saṃyogāt śarīram ucyate
yajamāna śabdaḥ api hi kartṛ vacanaḥ tasya eva vācakaḥ na ātmanaḥ
tasya sarvagata tvena abhimatasya kriyaḥ virahiṇaḥ kartṛ tva ayogāt yajñāyudha saṃyoga abhāvāt ca
saṃyoga abhiprāyaḥ ca ayam yajñāyudhi iti śabdaḥ pātra cayana stuti artha tvāt
na sva svāmi saṃbandha abhiprāyaḥ

original: prāgapi pātracayanāttatsaṃbhavāt śarīrasya ca pratyakṣaviruddhaṃ svargamanam /
analyzed: prāk api pātra cayanāt tad saṃbhavāt śarīrasya ca pratyakṣa viruddham svar gamanam
na ca kāla antare pi saṃbhavati
yāti iti vartamāna apadeśāt
bhasmībhūtasya ca kāla antare pi tad asaṃbhavāt
na ca śarīra vyatiriktaḥ kaścid ātmā asti tasmāt apramāṇam
evam apauruṣeyasya api aprāmāṇye svarga kāma codanāyām api nā āśvasitum yuktam iti apramāṇyam eva āyātam

original: evaṃ pratyakṣānupalabdhivirodhena pratyakṣavirodhena cākṣipte prāmāṇye virodhaparihāramupekṣyaiva
analyzed: evam pratyakṣa anupalabdhi virodhena pratyakṣa virodhena ca ākṣipte prāmāṇye virodha parihāram upekṣya eva
kāraṇa doṣa nirākaraṇena pūrvoktam eva svatas prāmāṇyam sva pakṣa sādhana tvena siddhāntavādī

original: darśayati- autpattikastu śabdasyārthena saṃbandhastasya jñānamupadeśa iti /
analyzed: darśayati autpattikaḥ tu śabdasya arthena saṃbandhaḥ tasya jñānam upadeśaḥ iti

original: pūrvaṃ hi pratyakṣādīnāṃ svataḥprāmāṇyasya lokasiddhātvāttadantargatatvācca śāstramapi puruṣānupraveśābhāvātpuruṣāśrayatvācca śabdadoṣasyāduṣṭemeva  #
analyzed: pūrvam hi pratyakṣa ādīnām svatas prāmāṇyasya loka siddhātvāt tad antargata tvāt ca śāstram api puruṣa anupraveśa abhāvāt puruṣa āśraya tvāt ca śabda doṣasya
śāstram atas pramāṇam iti uktam
iti citra ākṣepa vādaḥ
śabda arthayoḥ saṃbandha ākṣepaḥ
evam saṃbandha nitya tayā aprāmāṇyam nirākṛtya svatas prāmāṇye sthāpite

original: paraḥ punarāha- syādetat naiva śabdasyārthenāsti saṃbandhaḥ kuto 'sya pauruṣeyatāpauruṣeyatāveti /
analyzed: paraḥ punar āha syāt etat na eva śabdasya arthena asti saṃbandhaḥ

original: tathāhi na tāvatsaṃyogo 'sti tadbhāve hi kṣurādiśabdoccāraṇe mukhyasya pāṭanāpi syāt /
analyzed: tathā hi na tāvat saṃyogaḥ sti tad bhāve hi kṣura ādi śabda uccāraṇe mukhyasya pāṭanā api syāt
na ca kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ
dvayoḥ api nitya tvāt

original: nanu varṇasphoṭajātyādivikalpena vyaktyākṛtisaṃbandhādivikalpena ca bāhyayoḥ śabdārthayordurnirūpatvādgakārādyākāraṃ vijñānameva śabdaḥ,
analyzed: nanu varṇa sphoṭa jāti ādi vikalpena vyakti ākṛti saṃbandha ādi vikalpena ca bāhyayoḥ śabda arthayoḥ durnirūpa tvāt gakāra ādi ākāram vijñānam eva śabdaḥ

original: tajjanitaṃ ca gavādyākāravijñānamevārthaṃ iti kāryakāraṇatvameva śabdārthayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ /
analyzed: tad janitam ca gavādi ākāra vijñānam eva artham iti kārya kāraṇa tvam eva śabda arthayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ
na evam
nirālambana jñāna anutpatteḥ

pratyāyya pratyāyaka tvam saṃbandhaḥ iti
ced na
asati saṃbandhe pratyāyaka tva asaṃbhavāt

original: kena saṃbandhena śabdor'thaṃ pratyāyayatītyetadeva hi nirūpyate /
analyzed: kena saṃbandhena śabdaḥ ṛtham pratyāyayati iti etat eva hi nirūpyate
tatra pratyāyaka tvāt eva pratyāyaka tvam iti ātma āśraya doṣa āpattiḥ
tasmāt na asti saṃbandhaḥ

original: asati ca saṃbandhe vastvantarasya vastvantarabodhakatvāsaṃbhavādanirūpitahetuviśeṣaṃ svapnajñānavadyādṛcchikaṃ śabdārthajñānaṃ na pramāṇaṃ
analyzed: asati ca saṃbandhe vastu antarasya vastu antara bodhaka tva asaṃbhavāt anirūpita hetu viśeṣam svapna jñānavat yādṛcchikam śabda artha jñānam na pramāṇam
laukikaḥ tu sati api śabda prāmāṇye
pramāṇa antara vaśāt kathañcid saṃgaccheta api
vaidikaḥ tu vyavahāraḥ śabda eka śaraṇa tvāt an ādartavyaḥ syāt nirmūla tvāt
syāt evam yadi asaṃbandhaḥ śabda arthayoḥ

original: asti tu saṃbandhaḥ pratyāyya ityayameva saṃbandho bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: asti tu saṃbandhaḥ pratyāyyaḥ iti ayam eva saṃbandhaḥ bhaviṣyati
yat ca indriya liṅga ādi vat saṃnikarṣa vyāpti ādi saṃbandha anapekṣam artha pratipādanam idam eva abhidhānam iti ucyate
tat eva ca saṃjñā saṃjñi tvam
tena ucyate saṃjñā saṃjñi lakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ iti
kim punar śabdasya artha pratipādane pramāṇam
śabda anantaram artha pratipattiḥ eva
nanu iyam abhiprāya anumāna dvāreṇa eva upapannā
na iti brūmaḥ
artha abhiprāya śūnyena api svāpa ādi avasthāyām para vaśa prayuktaiḥ api śabdaiḥ artha pratipatti darśanāt

original: tathā puruṣāntarakṛtamapauruṣeyaṃ vā vedavākyamanarthajñairapi prayujyamānaṃ vyutpannānāmarthabuddhiṃ janayatyeva,
analyzed: tathā puruṣa antara kṛtam apauruṣeyam vā veda vākyam anartha jñaiḥ api prayujyamānam vyutpannānām artha buddhim janayati eva
tasmāt pratyāyakaḥ śabdaḥ
kim iti tarhi prathama śravaṇe na pratyāyayati
sahakāri virahāt saṃjñā tva grahaṇam api śabdasya arthe pratyayataḥ ṅgam netrasya iva ālokaḥ

original: tena yaḥ puruṣāntarebhyo ayaṃ puruṣāntarebhyo ayaṃ śabdo 'sya saṃjñeti jñātavān tasyaiva pratyāyayati nānyasyeti na doṣaḥ //
analyzed: tena yaḥ puruṣa antarebhyaḥ ayam puruṣa antarebhyaḥ ayam śabdaḥ sya saṃjñā iti jñātavān tasya eva pratyāyayati na anyasya iti na doṣaḥ
śabda artha saṃbandha anitya tve ākṣepaḥ
nanu emaḥ tu nāma saṃbandhaḥ
sa tu pauruṣeyaḥ iti tvad uktyā eva āpannam

original: tathāhi na hi śabdasyārthena saṃyogagādātmyādisaṃbandhaḥ kintu pratyāyakatvam /
analyzed: tathā hi na hi śabdasya arthena saṃyoga gādātmya ādi saṃbandhaḥ kintu pratyāyaka tvam
tat ca puruṣa adhīnam iti uktam

original: ato devadattādiśabdasyeva asyārthasyeyaṃ saṃjñetyevaṃ saṃbandhe kṛte paścācchabdasyārthapratipādanamiti siddhaṃ pauruṣeyatvam //*//
analyzed: atas devadatta ādi śabdasya iva asya arthasya iyam saṃjñā iti evam saṃbandhe kṛte paścāt śabdasya artha pratipādanam iti siddham pauruṣeya tvam

original: iti saṃbandhākṣepaḥ pūrvākṣiptaṃ saṃbandhanityatvamasamādhāyedānīṃ atha gaurityatra kaḥ śabdaḥ iti kayā saṃgatyā kena vā prayojanena śabdasvarūpaṃ
analyzed: iti saṃbandha ākṣepaḥ pūrva ākṣiptam saṃbandha nitya tvam a samādhāya idānīm atha gauḥ iti atra kaḥ śabdaḥ iti kayā saṃgatyā kena vā prayojanena śabda svarūpam

original: saṃgatistāvatprāsaṅgīkā saṃbandhaprastāvāt saṃbandhinorapi śabdārthayoḥ prastutatvātsvarūpaṃ nirūpyate /
analyzed: saṃgatiḥ tāvat prāsaṅgīkā saṃbandha prastāvāt saṃbandhinoḥ api śabda arthayoḥ prastuta tvāt svarūpam nirūpyate
prayojanam api tad avayava āśritānām ūha ādīnām satya tvam

original: niravayave hi vākye pade vā vācake 'vayavānāṃ mṛṣātvāt tadāśritānyapi kāryāṇi mṛṣā bhaveyuḥ //*//
analyzed: niravayave hi vākye pade vā vācake vayavānām mṛṣātvāt tad āśritāni api kāryāṇi mṛṣā bhaveyuḥ
kiñca saṃbangha siddhi artham avaśyam varṇānām vācaka tvam samarthanīyam

original: anyathā hi teṣāṃ saṃgatyābhāvādvācakabhāvo nirādhāratvānna syānnatarāṃ nityatvamiti tatsiddhyarthaṃ vācakatvaṃ samarthayituṃ śabdasvarūpaṃ
analyzed: anyathā hi teṣām saṃgatyā abhāvāt vācaka bhāvaḥ nirādhāra tvāt na syāt natarām nitya tvam iti tad siddhi artham vācaka tvam samarthayitum śabda svarūpam
ki gauḥ iti atra varṇāḥ eva śabdaḥ
uta tebhyaḥ ṛtha antaram iti etat prādhānyena nirūpyate
varṇa avayava ga tva go śabda avayavi jāti nirākaraṇam tu prāsaṅgikam
varṇāḥ eva śabdaḥ iti avadhāraṇa samarthana artham
tatra varṇānām api pudgala ākhyāna avayava anārhatāḥ saṃgirante tattva vayava anupalambhāt ayuktam
pratyakṣeṇa tāvat avayavāḥ na upalabhyante
varṇeṣu sākalya vaikalya grahaṇa abhāvāt
na anumānena
taiḥ saha kasyacid liṅgasya saṃbandha agrahaṇāt

original: ucyate- yo 'pi deśāntarādāgatyānena deśena saṃyujyate so 'pi prāgasmindeśe 'vidyamāna eva kathamanena deśena saṃyogamanubhavati kāraṇavaśāditi

analyzed: iyāḥ tu viśeṣaḥ saṃyujyamānaḥ pūrvatra avasthitaḥ nantara deśena prathamam saṃyujyate tatas tad anantara deśena iti krameṇa deśa antara la saṃyogam gacchati

original: na hi saṃyogasya svabhāvaḥ sa eva tādātmyasya samavāyasya vāṅgīkartavyaḥ /

original: tena ca saṃnikarṣo vyaktideśe eva saṃbhavati nānyatreti na sarvatropalabdhiḥ /

vṛkṣam ārabhate tathā sarva vyāpinī prakṛtiḥ tad saṃparka vaśāt mahat ahaṅkāra tanmātra ādi krameṇa

sā iyam prakṛti upādānā sṛṣṭiḥ
īśvaraḥ tu nimitta mātram
kṣetrajñāḥ tu bhoktāraḥ

original: sā ca sarvatraikā bhoktṝṇāṃ ca bhedādbaddhamuktavyavasthopapattiḥ /

original: tathā ca- ajāmekāṃ lohitaśuklakṛṣṇāṃ bahvīḥ prajā janayantīṃ sarūpāḥ /

original: ajo hyeko juṣamāṇo 'nuśete jahātyenāṃ bhuktabhogamajo 'nyaḥ iti vyaktameva bhogyāyāḥ dāstarhyaipaniṣadāḥ kathaṃ,
analyzed: ajaḥ hi ekaḥ juṣamāṇaḥ nuśete jahāti enām bhukta bhogam ajaḥ nyaḥ iti vyaktam eva bhogyāyāḥ dāḥ tarhi aipaniṣadāḥ katham

original: availakṣaṇyeneti brūmaḥ- bhedaśabdo hi vailakṣaṇyavacano loke prasiddhaḥ /

na asya asya ca kaścid bhedaḥ sti iti
tathā ātmanām api nara paśu tiryak bheda bhinna śarīra vartinām śarīra saṃbandham apohya kevalam
naija rūpeṇa nirūpyamāṇānām padma rajaḥ paramāṇu dvaya vat na kiñcid api vailakṣaṇyam asti iti anena abhiprāyeṇa ekatva vādāḥ
nānātva niṣedha vādāḥ ca

original: etadabhiprāyameva caitadapi bhadavadvāsudevavacanam- vidyāvinayasaṃpanne brāhmaṇe gavi hastini /
analyzed: etad abhiprāyam eva ca etat api bhadavat vāsudeva vacanam vidyā vinaya saṃpanne brāhmaṇe gavi hastini

original: śuni caiva śvapāke ca paṇḍitāḥ samadarśinaḥ iti /
analyzed: śuni ca eva śvapāke ca paṇḍitāḥ sama darśinaḥ iti

original: tathaiva indro māyābhiḥ pururūpa īryate iti svayamavilakṣaṇo 'pyātmā narapaśvādivicitraśarīrasaṃparkavaśādbhrāntyā svayamapi vilakṣaṇarūpaḥ  #
analyzed: tathā eva indraḥ māyābhiḥ puru rūpaḥ īryate iti svayam avilakṣaṇaḥ pi ātmā nara paśu ādi vicitra śarīra saṃparka vaśāt bhrāntyā svayam api vilakṣaṇa rūpaḥ  /

ye ca bhuktānām kṣetrajñānām īśvareṇa saha ekatvāt āste pi atyanta sāmyāt vailakṣaṇya abhāvāt ca

original: yadā paśyaḥ paśyate rukmavarṇaṃ kartāramīśaṃ puruṣaṃ brahmayonim //

original: tadā vidvānpuṇyapāpe vidhūya nirañcanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyamupaiti itīśvarasādṛśyāpattimeva muktasya darśayati /

original: tathā bhagavatā vāsudevenāpyuktam- idaṃ jñānamupāśritya mama sādharmyamāgatāḥ //

original: sarge 'pi nopajāyante pralaye na vyathanti ca iti //*//

iti ucyate

original: vispaṣṭaṃ hi parāparapuruṣayorbhede gītādipūpadarśitaḥ- uttamaḥ puruṣastvanyaḥ paramātmetyudāhṛtaḥ /

original: atrābhidhīyate- kathaṃ khalvekarūpā prakṛtirnarapaśutiryagbhedabhinnaṃ prapañcamārabhate nahyavilakṣaṇaṃ
analyzed: atra abhidhīyate katham khalu eka rūpā prakṛtiḥ nara paśu tiryak bheda bhinnam prapañcam ārabhate na hi avilakṣaṇam

kṣetrajña gata dharma adharma sahāya vaicitryāt vaicitryam ita ced  na
antaḥkaraṇa vṛtti tvāt dharma adarmayoḥ

original: antakaraṇasya ca kāryavargāntaḥpātitvāt sarvasya mahadādeḥ kāryasya prākṛtapratisaṃcāre
analyzed: anta karaṇasya ca kārya varga antaḥpāti tvāt sarvasya mahat ādeḥ kāryasya prākṛta pratisaṃcāre

original: prakṛtau vilīnatvāddharmādharmāvapi tasyāmavasthāyāmavidyamānāveveti na tadbalena vaicitryam /
analyzed: prakṛtau vilīna tvāt dharma adharmau api tasyām avasthāyām avidyamānau eva iti na tad balena vaicitryam
mahat ādi vikāra ārambhe ca asyāḥ kim kāraṇam
svarūpam evā iti ced sarvadā ārambha prasaṅgaḥ tatas pralaya anupapattiḥ
īśvara icchayā vikriyate na
īśvarasya samasta kleśa rahitasya apāsta samasta kāmasya icchā asaṃbhāvāt

antaḥkaraṇa vṛtti tvāt tasya ca tadānīm abhāvāt iti uktam

original: evaṃ ca dharmādharmarahiteṣu nirviśeśeṣu puruṣeṣvavasthiteṣu sargakāle prakṛtiḥ śarīrārambheṇātmano badhnātīti cet,

ye pūrva sṛṣṭau sthitāḥ

original: ye ca brahmahatyākāriṇasteṣāṃ sarveṣāmaikavidhyameva syāt pūrvakṛtayordharmādharmayornaṣṭatvat //*//

original: nanu nāśo nāma nātyantābhāvaḥ kintu kāraṇe kāryāṇāṃ tirobhāvamātraṃ vināśaḥ,
analyzed: nanu nāśaḥ nāma na atyanta abhāvaḥ kintu kāraṇe kāryāṇām tirobhāva mātram vināśaḥ

original: utpattirapi vidyamānānameva kāraṇe kāryāṇāmāvirbhavamātraṃ sarvaṃ kāryāṇāṃ na syāt,
analyzed: utpattiḥ api kāraṇe kāryāṇām āvirbhava mātram sarvam kāryāṇām na syāt

yathā āhuḥ asat akaraṇāt upādāna grahaṇāt sarva saṃbhava abhāvāt

original: tathā- nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ iti bhagavadvāsudevavacanam /

original: naitadevam- na hi mṛtpiṇḍāvasthāyāṃ vā kapālāvasthāyāṃ vā ghaṭarūpamasti dṛśyādarśanavirodhāt //*//
analyzed: na etat evam na hi mṛd piṇḍa avasthāyām vā kapāla avasthāyām vā ghaṭa rūpam asti dṛśya adarśana virodhāt

original: yattu nāsato vidyate bhāvaḥ iti vacanaṃ tadātmābhiprāyaṃ,
analyzed: yat tu na asataḥ vidyate bhāvaḥ iti vacanam tat ātma abhiprāyam

original: pūrvatra hi natvevāhaṃ jātu nāsaṃ na tvaṃ neme janādhipāḥ //

na ca eva na bhaviṣyāmaḥ sarve vayam atas param
iti ātma nitya tvam

original: pratipādayitumupakrāntamevānenocyate- nāvidyamānasyātmana utpattirna vidyamānasya vināśaḥ sarve evātmano 'nutpattivināśadharmāṇo nityā iti,

na punar kārya jātasya sarvasya nitya tva abhiprāyam

original: yadi paramupādānopādeyayorabhedamāśritya mṛdātmanādau ghaṭo vyavasthita ityucyate,

nahi mṛd avasthena ghaṭe na udaka āharaṇam kriyate

original: tathā dharmādharmāvapi svarūpeṇāvidyamānau prakṛtyātmanā sthitāvapi na svakāryāya paryāpyāviti na tadvaśena vaicitryasaṃbhavaḥ /

original: pramāṇamapi mahadādikrameṇa prakṛtipariṇāme kiñcinnāsti- puruṣavacasāṃ pramāṇāntaragocarārthe pramāṇatvāsaṃbhavāt,
