vedānām api poruṣeya tvāt itara puruṣa vacana vat apramāṇyāt

original: yadi cu sṛṣṭipralayaparamparāmanādimaṅgīkṛtya pratisṛṣṭi sarveṣāṃ caiva nāmāni karmāṇi ca pṛthakpṛthak /

original: vedaśabdebhya evādau pṛthaksaṃsthāśca nirmame ityādivacanaiḥ ṛtuliṅganyāyena nāmaprabhāvavyavahāravastūtpattyā
analyzed: veda śabdebhyaḥ eva ādau pṛthak saṃsthāḥ ca nirmame ityādi vacanaiḥ ṛtu liṅga nyāyena nāma prabhāva vyavahāra vastu utpattyā
śabdānām anādi artha saṃbaddhānām vedānām ca nitya tvam āśritya prāmāṇyam aṅgīkriyate
tathā api ekasya prajāpateḥ saṃpradāya pravartaka tve kṛtaka āśaṅkā syāt eva

original: atha punaḥ aṣṭāśītisahasrāṇi saṃpradāyapravartakāḥ ityādivacanānurodhena bahūnāṃ
analyzed: atha punar aṣṭāśīti sahasrāṇi saṃpradāya pravartakāḥ ityādi vacana anurodhena bahūnām

original: maharṣīṇāṃ sṛṣṭyantarādhītaṃ vedaṃ smaratāṃ suptapratibuddhanyāyena saṃpradāyapravartakatvamāśritya
analyzed: mahā ṛṣīṇām sṛṣṭi antara adhītam vedam smaratām supta pratibuddha nyāyena saṃpradāya pravartaka tvam āśritya

vaiśeṣikāḥ tu pauruṣeya tvam eva śabda artha saṃbandhānām vedānām ca aṅgīkurvantaḥ numānena

original: sṛṣṭipralayāvīśvaraṃ ca siṣādhayiṣantaḥ prayogamāracayanti- trividhaṃ hi vastujātaṃ
analyzed: sṛṣṭi pralayau īśvaram ca siṣādhayiṣantaḥ prayogam āracayanti trividham hi vastu jātam

kim punar pṛthivī ādeḥ samavāyi kāraṇam

original: na hi pralaye paramāṇūnāṃ pralayo 'smākamasti sāṃkhyādivat /
analyzed: na hi pralaye paramāṇūnām pralayaḥ smākam asti sāṃkhya ādi vat

original: kāryadravyāṇi tu dvyaṇukādīni sarvāṇyeveśvarecchayā viśliṣṭāvayavāni pralīyante,
analyzed: kārya dravyāṇi tu dvyaṇuka ādīni sarvāṇi eva īśvara icchayā viśliṣṭa avayavāni pralīyante
paramāṇavaḥ tu mithas saṃyuktāḥ tiṣṭhanti vyoma ādayaḥ ca kṣetrajñāḥ ca ātmīya dharma adharma yuktāḥ eva avatiṣṭhante

original: sargakāle punarīśvarecchāṃ kṣetrajñādṛṣṭaṃ ca nimittamāsādya paramāṇuṣu karmāṇyutpadyante
analyzed: sarga kāle punar īśvara icchām kṣetrajña adṛṣṭam ca nimittam āsādya paramāṇuṣu karmāṇi utpadyante

original: tadvaśācca mithaḥ saṃyuktāścatuṣṭayepi paramāṇalo dvyaṇukādikrameṇa yathāsvaṃ pṛthivyādikaṃ
analyzed: tad vaśāt ca mithas saṃyuktāḥ catuṣṭaye api paramāṇalaḥ dvi aṇuka ādi krameṇa yathāsvam pṛthivī ādikam
bhūta catuṣṭayam ārabhante
nimita bhūta kṣetrajña adṛṣṭa vaicitryāt ca jarāyu ja aṇḍa ja udbhid ja sveda ja bhinnam śarīra bhedam īśvara icchā kārita saṃyoga viśeṣa vaśāt paramāṇavaḥ ārabhante
vaiśeṣika mata khaṇḍanam

original: nanvedapi yuktam- nahīcchāmātreṇa prayatnamantareṇa paramāṇuṣu spandotpattiḥ saṃbhavati,
analyzed: nanu etat api yuktam nahi icchā mātreṇa prayatnam antareṇa paramāṇuṣu spanda utpattiḥ saṃbhavati
icchā kārita prayatna vaśena śarīra spanda utpattiḥ adya tve pi dṛśyate
īśvaraḥ api prayatate iti ced na
aśarīrasya prayatna asaṃbhavāt

original: sarvagatā api hyātmānaḥ śarīrapradeśa eva prayatnamārabhante na bahiḥ,
analyzed: sarva gatāḥ api hi ātmānaḥ śarīra pradeśe eva prayatnam ārabhante na bahis
atas śarīra apekṣaḥ prayatnaḥ

original: pralayakāle ca sarvakāryāṇāṃ pralayādīśvaraśarīramapi pralīnamiti kathamaśarīraḥ prayateta /
analyzed: pralaya kāle ca sarva kāryāṇām pralayāt īśvara śarīram api pralīnam iti katham aśarīraḥ prayateta
na ca aśarīrasya icchā api saṃbhavati mukta ātmanām iva
na api jñānam saṃbhavati indriya ādeḥ abhāvāt

original: nityamasya jñānaṃ nityā cecchā nityaśca prayatna iti cet, na,
analyzed: nityam asya jñānam nityā ca icchā nityaḥ ca prayatnaḥ iti ced na
sarva jñāna icchā prayatnānām anitya tva vyāpteḥ

original: śakyate hi prayoktum- kṣityādikaṃ nāśarīricetanakartṛkaṃ na nityaprayatnanityecchānityajñānakartṛkaṃ kāryatvāt ghaṭavaditi //*//
analyzed: śakyate hi prayoktum kṣiti ādikam na aśarīri cetana kartṛkam na nitya prayatna nitya icchā nitya jñāna kartṛkam kārya tvāt ghaṭa vat iti
nanu ghaṭasya api īśvara kartṛkatvam asti eva iti sādhya hīnaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ
tathā api kulālasya api kartṛ tvāt na kevala īśvara kartṛka tvam ghaṭasya

original: tataścaivaṃ prayoktavyaṃ- kṣityādikaṃ na kevalāśarīryātmādikartṛkaṃ ghaṭāvaditi,
analyzed: tatas ca evam prayoktavyam kṣiti ādikam na kevala aśarīrya ātma ādi kartṛkam ghaṭa āvat iti
vastu tvāt vyoma ādi vat iti hetu dṛśa ṣṭāntau sarvathā api

original: tathā kṣityādikaṃ na buddhimatkartṛkaṃ śarīrikartṛkatvavirahāt vyomavaditi sākṣādeva pratisādhanaṃ kartavyam /
analyzed: tathā kṣiti ādikam na buddhimat kartṛkam śarīri kartṛkatva virahāt vyoma vat iti sākṣāt eva pratisādhanam kartavyam
atha īśvara śarīram nityam aṅgīkṛtya pralaye sa śarīram eva īśvaram abhyupagacchet

original: tataḥ sāvayavatvamīśvaraśarīre naikāntikaṃ na kṣityādeḥ kāryatvaṃ sādhayet,
analyzed: tatas sāvayavatvam īśvara śarīre na aikāntikam na kṣiti ādeḥ kāryatvam sādhayet
sa śarīra kartṛka tvam ca dūrvā aṅkura ādīnām anupapannam anupalabdhi virodhāt
kiñca prati kāryam prayatna bhedena bhavitavyam

original: anyo hi pādasaṃcaraṇe prayatnaḥ anyaśca bāhūddharaṇe,
analyzed: anyaḥ hi pāda saṃcaraṇe prayatnaḥ anyaḥ ca bāhu uddharaṇe

original: tathā sati yadyapīśvare prayatno nityaḥ syāttathāpi tasyaikatvānna vicitrakāryodayahetutvaṃ saṃbhavatīti vyartha evāsau /
analyzed: tathā sati yadi api īśvare prayatnaḥ nityaḥ syāt tathā api tasya eka tvāt na vicitra kārya udaya hetu tvam saṃbhavati iti vyarthaḥ eva asau
yadi tu ananta kārya anurūpā anantā sarga kāle pi avasthānāt

original: saṃyojakasya ca sargahetoḥ pralayakālepyavasthānāt ubhayoḥ parasparavidhātānna sṛṣṭiḥ syāt na pralayaḥ /
analyzed: saṃyojakasya ca sarga hetoḥ pralaya kāle ipi avasthānāt ubhayoḥ sṛṣṭiḥ syāt na pralayaḥ
yat ca kṣetrajña adṛṣṭa vaicitrya upapattiḥ iti
tat api ayuktam nahi dṛṣṭa kāraṇa vailakṣaṇī antareṇa adṛṣṭa vailakṣaṇya mātrāt kārya vailakṣaṇyam siddhi ati
na hi adṛṣṭa śatena api tāla bījam antareṇa
tālavṛkṣaḥ niṣpadyate

original: vināpi bījamīśvaramahimnā sarvaṃ siddhyatīti cet / na /
analyzed: vinā api bījam īśvara mahimnā sarvam siddhi ati iti ced na
tatra eva pramāṇa abhāvāt
nitya tve hi vedānām avasite tad prāmāṇya balena īśvarasya aparicchedyaḥ mahimā
sṛṣṭi pralayau
ṛtu liṅga nyāyam āśritya sidhyeyuḥ na vā
vedān tu an ādṛtya dṛṣṭa anusāreṇa parvate iva anumānam atyanta alaukika irthe pravartayatām upekṣā eva uttaram iti uparamyate
tasmāt na sarga ādi kāle pi saṃbandha kāraṇam
śabda artha saṃbandhasya nitya tvam

original: aśakyaṃ ca kartuṃ sarvaśabdānāṃ saṃbandhakaraṇam- yadā na kaścidapi śabdaḥ kenāpyarthena
analyzed: aśakyam ca kartum sarva śabdānām saṃbandha karaṇam yadā na kaścid api śabdaḥ kena api arthena

original: saṃbaddhaṃ āsīt tadā kathaṃ saṃbandhaḥ kriyeta- saṃbandhaṃ hi kurvatāvaśyaṃ kenacidvākyena
analyzed: saṃbaddham āsīt tadā katham saṃbandhaḥ kriyeta saṃbandham hi kurvatā avaśyam kenacid vākyena
sa kartavyaḥ gauḥ sāsnādimān ityādinā
na ca aprasiddham artha pratipādaka tvena sāsnā ādi śabdam artha pratipādanāya śaknoti kartā uccārayitum
tathā hasta saṃjñā ādayaḥ api
pratipādaka tva asiddheḥ

original: nanvevamaprasiddhasaṃbandhasya kathamanapyanupapannam- yadyapi hi tadā vaktuḥ prasiddhasaṃbandhatvātsaṃbandhakathanāya
analyzed: nanu evam aprasiddha saṃbandhasya katham an apyanupapannam yadi api hi tadā vaktuḥ prasiddha saṃbandha tvāt saṃbandha kathanāya

original: vākyoccāraṇaṃ saṃbhavati tathāpi śrotāro 'prasiddhasamastapadārthā bālāḥ kathaṃ vākyena
analyzed: vākya uccāraṇam saṃbhavati tathā api prasiddha samasta padārthāḥ bālāḥ katham vākyena
pratipadyeran
tasmāt karaṇavat kathanam api anupapannam
na eṣa doṣaḥ
kathayituḥ tāvat na kartuḥ iva aśaktiḥ upāya saṃbhavāt
pratipattāraḥ tu upāya abhāvāt na pratipadyante iti dṛṣṭa viruddham

original: dṛśyante hyaprasiddhasamastaśabdārthā bālā vṛddhebhyaḥ saṃbandhaṃ pratipadyamānāḥ //*//
analyzed: dṛśyante hi aprasiddha samasta śabda arthāḥ bālāḥ vṛddhebhyaḥ saṃbandham pratipadyamānāḥ

original: kiñcāstyupāyo bālānāṃ- nāvaśyaṃ saṃbandhakathanāvākyenaiva vṛddhebhyo bālāḥ saṃbandhaṃ pratipadyante,
analyzed: kiñca asti upāyaḥ bālānām na avaśyam saṃbandha kathanā vākyena eva vṛddhebhyaḥ bālāḥ saṃbandham pratipadyante

original: kintu yadā vṛddhāḥ prasiddhasaṃbandhāḥ svakāryārthena vyavaharanti tadā teṣāmupaśṛṇvanto bālāḥ saṃbandhaṃ pratipadyante /
analyzed: kintu yadā vṛddhāḥ prasiddha saṃbandhāḥ sva kārya arthena vyavaharanti tadā teṣām upaśṛṇvantaḥ bālāḥ saṃbandham pratipadyante

original: yadā hi kenacidgāmānayetyuktaḥ kaścitsāsnādimantamānayati tadā samīpastho bālo 'vagacchati
analyzed: yadā hi kenacid gām ānaya iti uktaḥ kaścid sāsnādimantam ānayati tadā samīpa sthaḥ bālaḥ vagacchati
yasmāt ayam etad vākya śravaṇa anantaram asmin arthe pravartate tasmāt asmāt vākyāt ayam arthaḥ

original: pratyāyita ityevaṃ saṃmugdharūpeṇāvagataṃ pratyāyakatvaṃ paścādbahuṣu prayogeṣvanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ
analyzed: pratyāyitaḥ iti evam saṃmugdha rūpeṇa avagatam pratyāyaka tvam paścāt bahuṣu prayogeṣu anvaya vyatirekābhyām

original: vākyabhāgānāṃ padānāṃ padabhāgānāṃ ca prakṛtipratyayānāṃ vākyārthabhāgeṣu pādartheṣu vivacyate,
analyzed: vākya bhāgānām padānām pada bhāgānām ca prakṛti pratyayānām vākya artha bhāgeṣu pādartheṣu vivacyate

original: tasmānna pauruṣeyaḥ saṃbandha iti na tadvaśena puruṣāpekṣāstīti siddhamanapekṣaṃ vedānāṃ prāmāṇyam //
analyzed: tasmāt na pauruṣeyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ iti na tad vaśena puruṣa apekṣā asti iti siddham anapekṣam vedānām prāmāṇyam
iti saṃbandha ākṣepa parihāraḥ
yat ca anna antara phala anupalabdhyā citra ādīnām na paścādi phala tvam iti syāt evam

original: yadi pratyakṣādipañcakameva pramāṇaṃ syāttadā hyanantaraphalopalambhādeva tatsādhanatvaṃ syāt nānyathā,
analyzed: yadi pratyakṣa ādi pañcakam eva pramāṇam syāt tadā hi anantara phala upalambhāt eva tad sādhanatvam syāt na anyathā

original: śabdasyāpi tu pramitijanakatayā pratyakṣādivatpramāṇatvāt tenaca citrādīnāṃ paśusādhanatvāvagamādasatyapyanantaropalambhe siddhyati tatsādhanatvam
analyzed: śabdasya api tu pramiti janaka tayā pratyakṣa ādi vat pramāṇa tvāt tena ca citra ādīnām paśu sādhanatva avagamāt asati api anantara upalambhe siddhi ati tad sādhanatvam
citra ādi viṣayaka ākṣepa parihārāḥ
nanu pramāṇa antara virodhāt apramāṇyam iti uktam na
tad abhāvāt

original: nahi śabdo 'nantarameva citrāphalasādhanamiti brūte yena virodhaḥ syāt,
analyzed: nahi śabdaḥ nantaram eva citrā phala sādhanam iti brūte yena virodhaḥ syāt
sādhana tvam eva pratipannam tanmātra vacanāt
tasya ca apūrva dvāreṇa kāla antare pi taila pāna ādi vat phala sādhanatva upapatteḥ
yat tu prāk anuṣṭhānāt śāstra artha avadhāraṇa velāyām na apūrvam antar bhāvitām iti uktam

original: yadyapyevaṃ tathāpi paścādevamavagacchati- sādhanatvamātre 'pi śabdenokte bhrāntyā mayā sākṣātsādhanatvameva pratipannaṃ taccedānīmanyathā
analyzed: yadi api evam tathā api paścāt evam avagacchati sādhanatva mātre śabdena ukte bhrāntyā mayā sākṣāt sādhanatvam eva pratipannam tat ca idānīm anyathā

original: ato nūnamasya kenāpi dvāreṇa kālāntare phalamiti //*//
analyzed: atas nūnam asya kena api dvāreṇa kāla antare phalam iti

original: prāgapi ca śakyamevāpūrvamavagantum anekeṣāmaṅgapradhānakarmaṇāṃ kṣaṇikānāmapūrvamantareṇa yaugapadyāsaṃbhavāt,
analyzed: prāk api ca śakyam eva apūrvam avagantum anekeṣām aṅga pradhāna karmaṇām kṣaṇikānām apūrvam antareṇa yaugapadya asaṃbhavāt
paśu ādīnām ca dṛṣṭa kāraṇa apekṣa tvāt na kṣaṇa mātreṇa utpattiḥ saṃbhavati iti avaśyaṃbhāvya pūrvam

original: na ca paścādyutpattimātraṃ phalam upabhogasya tu cirakālatvāt yāvadupabhogamavasthāsyamānena kenacidbhavitavyam /
analyzed: na ca paścādi utpatti mātram phalam upabhogasya tu cira kāla tvāt yāvat upabhogam avasthāsyamānena kenacid bhavitavyam
na ca kriyāyāḥ tāvankālam avasthānam saṃbhavati iti apūrvam aṅgīkartavyam iti tad dvāreṇa

original: yuktaṃ karma kālāntare phaladamiti nānantarānupalabdhyā śāstrasya bādhaḥ //
analyzed: yuktam karma kāla antare phala dam iti na anantara anupalabdhyā śāstrasya bādhaḥ
iti citra ākṣepa parihāraḥ
ātmavāda ārambhaḥ

original: yattu pratyakṣaviruddhaṃ vacanamupanyastaṃ sa eṣa yajñāyudhī yajamāno 'ñjasā svargaṃ lokaṃ yātītyetacchabdena pratyakṣaṃ śarīraṃ yajñāyudhasaṃyuktamupadiśatīti
analyzed: yat tu pratyakṣa viruddham vacanam upanyastam saḥ eṣa yajñāyudhī yajamānaḥ ñjasā svargam lokam yāti iti etad śabdena pratyakṣam śarīram yajñāyudha saṃyuktam upadiśati iti
tat abhidhīyate artha vāda tvāt asya anya para tvāt na svārthe pramāṇa antara virodhaḥ doṣaḥ
na ca virodhaḥ vidyate
na hi anena śarīrasya svarga gamanam ucyate kin tarhi ātmanaḥ yasya etat śarīram

original: so 'pi hi śarīraśarīriṇorabhedopacāreṇa śarīrasthena yajñāyudhitvena pratyakṣatvena ca vyapidiśyate /
analyzed: saḥ u pi hi śarīra śarīriṇoḥ abheda upacāreṇa śarīra sthena yajñāyudhi tvena pratyakṣa tvena ca vyapidiśyate

original: ātmano vā svargagamanaṃ śarīre upacaryata iti nāsti virodhaḥ //*//
analyzed: ātmanaḥ vā svarga gamanam śarīre upacaryate iti na asti virodhaḥ
yajamāna śabdaḥ api tasya eva yāga svāmi tvāt kartṛ tvāt ca vācakaḥ

original: na ca śakyate tasya kāpilavadakartṛtvaṃ vaktuṃ- śrutivirodhāt,
analyzed: na ca śakyate tasya kāpila vat akartṛ tvam vaktum śruti virodhāt
sarvatra hi kartṛ bhoktṛ śabdayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam dṛśyate
yathā atra eva yajamānaḥ svargam lokam yāti iti

original: tathā ya evaṃ vidvānagniṃ cinute ṛdhnotyeva ya evaṃ vidvāndvirātreṇa yajate svargakāmeva saṃkalpaṃ prati kartṛtvamuktam //*//
analyzed: tathā yaḥ evam vidvān agnim cinute ṛdhnoti eva yaḥ evam vidvān dvirātreṇa yajate svarga kāmā iva saṃkalpam prati kartṛ tvam uktam

original: saṃbhavati ca svargagatasyāpyātmano yāgajñānaprayatnasaṃkalpādiṣu sākṣādeva kartṛtvaṃ,
analyzed: saṃbhavati ca svarga gatasya api ātmanaḥ yāga jñāna prayatna saṃkalpa ādiṣu sākṣāt eva kartṛ tvam

original: na hi vayaṃ spandameva kriyāmupagacchāmo vaiśeṣikavat,
analyzed: na hi vayam spandam eva kriyām upagacchāmaḥ vaiśeṣika vat
yena ātmanaḥ kartṛ tvam na syāt
dhātvartha mātrasya kriyā tvāt
spandeṣu api prayojaka tvena asya eṣa kartṛ tvam saṃbhavati
prayatnena hi asau śarīram spande prayojayati
sākṣāt tu na saṃbhavati
sarvagate spandasya asaṃbhavāt iti anena abhiprāyeṇa purāṇeṣu upaniṣatsu ca akartṛ tva vādāḥ
śarīra a kirikta ātma sādhanam

original: kiṃpunaḥ śarīravyatiriktātmasadbhāve pramāṇaṃ prāṇanādiliṅgaṃ sukhādayaśca prāṇanādiśabdena
analyzed: kim punar śarīra vyatirikta ātma sadbhāve pramāṇam prāṇana ādi liṅgam sukha ādayaḥ ca prāṇana ādi śabdena
koṣṭhyasya vāyoḥ ūrdhva adhas gamana vṛtti viśeṣasya prāṇana ādi śabda vācyasya hetu bhūtaḥ prayatna

original: ucyate saca sukhādayaśca na śarīradharmāḥ saṃbhavanti,
analyzed: ucyate sa ca sukha ādayaḥ ca na śarīra dharmāḥ saṃbhavanti
a yāvat śarīra bhāvi tvāt

original: ye hi kāryadravyavartino viśeṣaguṇā rūpādayaste virodhiguṇāntarādvā dravyavināśādvā vinaśyanti,
analyzed: ye hi kārya dravya vartinaḥ viśeṣa guṇāḥ rūpa ādayaḥ te virodhi guṇa antarāt vā dravya vināśāt vā vinaśyanti

original: prāṇanādayastu tadbhāvepi naśyanti mṛtāvasthāyāmiti na śarīraguṇāḥ /
analyzed: prāṇana ādayaḥ tu tad bhāve pi naśyanti mṛta avasthāyām iti na śarīra guṇāḥ
tathā jñānam api ayāvat śarīra bhāvi tvāt eva na śarīra dharmaḥ

original: tathā ye pratyakṣiviṣayāḥ na śarīraguṇaste svayamiva parairapi yathā gṛhyante yatha rūpādayaḥ,
analyzed: tathā ye pratyakṣi viṣayāḥ na śarīra guṇaḥ te svayam iva paraiḥ api yathā gṛhyante rūpa ādayaḥ

original: sukhādayastu pratyakṣā api santo na parapratyakṣagrāhyāḥ tasmānna śarīraguṇāḥ,
analyzed: sukha ādayaḥ tu pratyakṣāḥ api santaḥ na para pratyakṣa grāhyāḥ tasmāt na śarīra guṇāḥ

original: tadidamapi dvayaṃ sukhādīnāṃ śarīraguṇatvaṃ nivārayadanyaguṇatāṃ sūcayati /
analyzed: tat idam api dvayam sukha ādīnām śarīra guṇa tvam nivārayat anya guṇatām sūcayati
yaḥ saḥ anyaḥ saḥ ātmā

original: kiñca sarvaṃ eva viśeṣaguṇāḥ karaṇe 'pi vartamānā eva kāryadravyaguṇatāṃ bhajante,
analyzed: kiñca sarvam eva viśeṣa guṇāḥ karaṇe vartamānāḥ eva kārya dravya guṇa tām bhajante

original: na ca śarīrakāraṇabhūteṣu pārthivaparamāṇuṣu caitanyamastīti kathaṃ śarīraguṇatā caitanyasya syāt /
analyzed: na ca śarīra kāraṇa bhūteṣu pārthiva paramāṇuṣu caitanyam asti iti katham śarīra guṇa tā caitanyasya syāt
tasmāt anyaḥ cetanaḥ

original: kaścitpunarāha- sarvathā vittiṣu tāvadvettāvabhāsate anyathā svaparavedyayoranatiśayaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: kaścid punar āha sarvathā vittiṣu tāvat vettā avabhāsate anyathā sva para vedyayoḥ anatiśaya prasaṅgāt
na ca śarīrasya kara caraṇa ādi avayava saṃniveśa viśiṣṭasya asti tathā avabhāsaḥ
atas nyaḥ śarīrāt ātmā iti
tattva yuktam saṃniveśa pratibhāse pi śarīra pratibhāsa saṃbhavāt
nahi saṃniveśe eva śarīram

original: śarīradharmo hi saṃniveśaḥ saṃbhavati ca dharmāpratibhāso 'pi dharmiṇaḥ pratibhāsaḥ,
analyzed: śarīra dharmaḥ hi saṃniveśaḥ saṃbhavati ca dharma apratibhāsaḥ pi dharmiṇaḥ pratibhāsaḥ

original: anyathā ātmanopi pratibhāso na syāt taddharmāṇāṃ sarvagatatvādīnāmarthavittiṣvapratibhānāt /
analyzed: anyathā ātmanaḥ api pratibhāsaḥ na syāt tad dharmāṇām sarvagata tva ādīnām artha vittiṣu apratibhānāt
na ca aikāntikam artha vittiṣu vettṛ bhānam

original: artha eva hi tadā bhāsate na vettā //*//
analyzed: arthaḥ eva hi tadā bhāsate na vettā
na ca sva para vedyayoḥ anatiśayaḥ

original: na hi vedittṛbhāsanakṛto 'yamatiśayaḥ kintu kasyacideva kiñcidābhāsate nānyasya ityetāvānatiśayo nānyaḥ,
analyzed: na hi vedittṛ bhāsana kṛtaḥ yam atiśayaḥ kintu kasyacid eva kiñcid ābhāsate na anyasya iti etāvān atiśayaḥ na anyaḥ
tasmāt na jñātṛ pratibhāsena śarīra viveka siddhiḥ

original: kintu pūrvoktādeva kāraṇāt- jñānasukhādīnāṃ śarīraguṇatvāsaṃbhavāt tato 'nya
analyzed: kintu pūrva uktāt eva kāraṇāt jñāna sukha ādīnām śarīra guṇa tva asaṃbhavāt tatas nya
eteṣām āśrayaḥ saḥ eva ātmā
bauddha matena vijñāna ātma vādaḥ
saugatāḥ tu āhuḥ siddhe jñāna sukha ādīnām guṇa tve guṇa kalpanā
na tu tat siddham asmākam tāvat mātra upapattitaḥ

original: nahyāśrayamantareṇa jñānamātramanupapannaṃ svatantrameva jñānaṃ kiṃ neṣyate sukhādayo 'pi jñānaviṣayāḥ svatantrā eva anyasyāśrayasyānupalabdheḥ
analyzed: nahi āśrayam antareṇa jñāna mātram anupapannam svatantram eva jñānam kim nā iṣyate sukha ādayaḥ pi jñāna viṣayāḥ svatantrāḥ eva anyasya āśrayasya anupalabdheḥ

original: jñānameva ca nīlamahaṃ jānāmīti jñātṛtvena viparyāsitadarśanairadhyavasīyate nānyaḥ pramāṇābhāvāt //*//
analyzed: jñānam eva ca nīlam aham jānāmi iti jñātṛ tvena viparyāsita darśanaiḥ adhyavasīyate na anyaḥ pramāṇa abhāvāt

original: nanu jñānasyāpi kṣaṇikatvātkathaṃ pūrvedyurupalabdhe paredyuḥsmaraṇamicchā pratyabhijñā ca /
analyzed: nanu jñānasya api kṣaṇika tvāt katham pūrvedyus upalabdhe paredyus smaraṇam icchā pratyabhijñā ca

original: nahi svayamanupalabdhe tāni saṃbhavanti- nahi devadattenopalabdher'the yajñadattasya smaraṇādīni saṃbhavanti /
analyzed: nahi svayam anupalabdhe tāni saṃbhavanti nahi devadattena upalabdha ṛthe yajñadattasya smaraṇa ādīni saṃbhavanti

original: satyam- na saṃbhavanti saṃtānabhede samānāyāṃ tu saṃtatāvekenopalabdhe 'nyasya smaraṇādyupapannaṃ dṛṣṭatvāt,
analyzed: satyam na saṃbhavanti saṃtāna bhede samānāyām tu saṃtatau ekena upalabdhe nyasya smaraṇa ādi upapannam dṛṣṭa tvāt
nahi upalabdhuḥ smartuḥ ca eka tvam kvacid api dṛṣṭam
ekasya sthāsnoḥ puruṣasya kvacid api anupalabdha tvāt
tasmāt jñānam eva jñātṛ na anyaḥ jñātā asti iti
atrā ucyate pratyabhijñāyate kartā yaḥ pūrva apara kālayoḥ
tasya sthāsnoḥ bhedaḥ vijñānāt kṣaṇa bhaṅgurāt
viṣaya pratyabhijñāna anupapatteḥ jñātuḥ eka tva kalpanāyām syāt api etat uttaram saṃtāna ekatvāt eva upapadyate iti

original: yadā tu jñātaivaikaḥ pūrvāparakālayoḥ pratyabhijñāyate- yo 'haṃ pūrvamadrākṣaṃ sa evāhamanupaśyāmīti tadā pratyabhijñayaiva jñāturekatvāvagamāt,
analyzed: yadā tu jñātā eva ekaḥ pūrva apara kālayoḥ pratyabhijñāyate yaḥ ham pūrvam adrākṣam saḥ eva aham anupaśyāmi iti tadā pratyabhijñayā eva jñātuḥ eka tva avagamāt

original: vijñānasya ca kṣaṇikatvāttato 'nyo jñātā siddho bhavatīti //*//
analyzed: vijñānasya ca kṣaṇika tvāt tatas nyaḥ jñātā siddhaḥ bhavati iti
kim aham pratyaya gocaraḥ jñātā syāt

original: tathā sati śarīrameva jānāmi kṛśo 'haṃ gacchāmyahamiti kārśyādibuddhisāmānādhikaraṇyādahaṃbuddhergocaraḥ,
analyzed: tathā sati śarīram eva jānāmi kṛśaḥ ham gacchāmi aham iti kārśya ādi buddhi sāmānādhikaraṇyāt aham buddheḥ gocaraḥ
ātmanaḥ ca sarvagatasya kārśya ādi anupapatteḥ
ucyate jñātṛ viśayaḥ tāvat ahaṃpratyayaḥ iti avivādam

original: yo hi parāmṛśati sa svātmānamahamiti parāmṛśati parānidamiti /
analyzed: yaḥ hi parāmṛśati sa sva ātmānam aham iti parāmṛśati parān idam iti

original: tena niḥsaṃśayamasya jñātṛgocaratvaṃ śarīrasya ca jñātṛtvaṃ nirākṛtaṃ,
analyzed: tena niḥsaṃśayam asya jñātṛ gocara tvam śarīrasya ca jñātṛ tvam nirākṛtam
tyanta saṃsṛṣṭayoḥ ekatva bhrāntyā sāmānādhikaraṇya pratītiḥ uṣṇa toya pratīti vat bhāsvara ayaḥ piṇḍa pratīti vat ca
śarīra ātmanoḥ bheda upapādanam

original: tathā vyatirkabuddhirapi dṛśyate mamedaṃ śarīraṃ kṛśamiti ṣaṣṭhyāsmadarthasya śarīravyatirekāt,
analyzed: tathā vyatirka buddhiḥ api dṛśyate mama idam śarīram kṛśam iti ṣaṣṭhyā asmadarthasya śarīra vyatirekāt
śarīrasya ca para viṣaya idaṅkāra āspada tvāt
tatas smāt viveka avabhāsāt pūrva ukta nyāyena ca śarīrasya ajñātṛ tvāt
abheda avagamasya ca saṃsarga doṣa vaśena bhrāntyā api upapatteḥ
pūrva abhyasta smṛti anubandhena ca vinā jātasya harṣa bhaya śoka pratipatti anupapatteḥ

original: jātismarāśca kecidadyatve 'pi dehāntararahovṛttaṃ vṛttāntaṃ saṃbodhayanta upalabhyanta ityupalabdhisiddhaḥ śarīrātmanabhedaḥ /
analyzed: jātismarāḥ ca kecid adya tve pi deha antara rahaḥ vṛttam vṛttāntam saṃbodhayantaḥ upalabhyante iti upalabdhi siddhaḥ śarīra ātmana bhedaḥ

original: yadyapi cānena prakāreṇa śarīrātmanorvispaṣṭo bhedo na siddhyet tathāpi tāvadabhedo 'pi na vispaṣṭaḥ- mama śarīramiti vivekasyāpi pratibhāsāt
analyzed: yadi api ca anena prakāreṇa śarīra ātmanoḥ vispaṣṭaḥ bhedaḥ na siddhyet tathā api na vispaṣṭaḥ mama śarīram iti vivekasya api pratibhāsāt

original: tatra saṃmugdhe tattve śrutārthāpattyā sākṣācchrutyā vā nirṇayaḥ /
analyzed: tatra saṃmugdhe tattve śruta arthāpattyā sākṣāt śrutyā vā nirṇayaḥ

original: tābhiścākṣiptaṃ sākṣādevopaniṣadaḥ samarthayanti avanāśi vā are 'yamātmā ityevamādaya
analyzed: tābhiḥ ca ākṣiptam sākṣāt eva upaniṣadaḥ samarthayanti avanāśi vai are yam ātmā iti evamādaya
iti siddhaḥ śarīra atiriktaḥ mānasa pratyakṣa rūpaḥ haṃ pratyaya gamyaḥ jñātā
katham punar jñātuḥ jñeya tvam

original: nahyekasya kartṛtvaṃ karmatvaṃ ca svātmani kriyāvirodhātsaṃbhavaci,

asti tāvat phalam

original: karmavibhaktiṃśca na bhavatītyucyate parasamavāyikriyāphalabhāgitvaṃ karmatvam ityabhidhānāt taccāyuktam /

original: asti cātmanaḥ svakartṛkāyāmeva kriyāyāṃ karmavyavahāro loke vede ca- yadhā tāvadbhāṣya
analyzed: asti ca ātmanaḥ sva kartṛkāyām eva kriyāyām karma vyavahāraḥ loke vede ca yadhā tāvat bhāṣya

original: eva svasaṃvedyaḥ saṃbhavatīti karmavācī kṛtyapratyayaprayogaḥ vedepi ātmānamupāsīta
analyzed: eva sva saṃvedyaḥ saṃbhavati iti karma vācī kṛtya pratyaya prayogaḥ vede api ātmānam upāsīta

original: ātmānaṃ veda ātmā jñātavyaḥ ityanekaśaḥ prayogaḥ //

original: na ca ganturgamane karmatvaṃ prayogābhāvāt śabdasādhutve hi prayogaparavaśā vayaṃ na svayamīśmahe /

original: tathopaniṣatsvapi- brahma vā idamagra āsīt tadātmānamevāvedahaṃ brahmāsmi iti mantravarṇopi ahaṃ manurabhavaṃ sūryaśca iti /

original: yattu nirmuktāhaṅkāramamakāravacanaṃ tadapi paurvāparyeṇa parāmṛṣyamāṇaṃ nāhaṅkārasvarūpaniṣedhārtha bhavati,

original: evaṃ hi tadvacanaṃ- nāsya kaścinnāyaṃ kasyacit nirmuktāhaṅkāramamakāra evāyamiti /

tat ayam arthaḥ yasmāt na asya kaścid tasmāt nirmukta mamakāraḥ
yasmāt na ayam kasyacid tasmāt nirmukta ahaṅkāraḥ iti
yadi ahaṅkāra svarūpa niṣedhaḥ syāt

original: na pūrveṇa saṃbadhyeta- yasmānnāyaṃ kasyacittasmādasminnahaṃbhāvo bhrāntiriti kiṃ kena saṃgatam,

original: tasmānnāyamahantāsvarūpaniṣedhaḥ kiṃ tarhi janmaṃsaṃbandhitayātmanyahaṃmatiḥ ahamasya pitāhamasya putra ityādiḥ sa bhrama ityevaṃ saṃgataṃ

tat idam asya anya saṃbandhi niṣedhena putra ādi viṣaya sneha nivartanena vairāgya janana artham ucyate

original: na ca sāṃparte smaraṇe pūrvakālasaṃbandhinaḥ kartṛtvaṃ saṃbhavatīti kathaṃ kartṛtayā siddhyet,

original: syādapyeṣā kalpanā yadyekātmatve dṛḍhaṃ pramāmaṃ syāt /
analyzed: syāt api eṣā kalpanā yadi eka ātma tve dṛḍham syāt
na tu tat asti

original: yetvātmaikatvavādāḥ śrutiṣu smṛtiṣu purāṇeṣu vā te nirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyamupaiti
analyzed: ye tu ātma eka tva vādāḥ śrutiṣu smṛtiṣu purāṇeṣu vā te nirañjanaḥ paramam sāmyam upaiti

original: mama sādharmyamāgatāḥ uttamaḥ puruṣastvanyaḥ ityādibhirātmabedavacanaiḥ pratyakṣādibhiśca
analyzed: mama sādharmyam āgatāḥ uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ tu anyaḥ ityādibhiḥ ātma beda vacanaiḥ pratyakṣa ādibhiḥ ca
virodhāt na ekāntataḥ śaknuvanti ātma ekatvam niścāyayitum

original: vacanānāṃ hi mitho virodhe siddhavastuviṣayatvena ca vikalpāsaṃbhave pramāṇāntarānnirṇayaḥ syāt,
analyzed: vacanānām hi mithas virodhe siddha vastu viṣaya tvena ca vikalpa asaṃbhave pramāṇa antarāt nirṇayaḥ syāt
tat ca pramāṇa antaram bhede eva samartham iti aikātmya vādānām availakṣaṇya para tvam pūrvokta nyāyena avagantavyam
vispaṣṭam ca etat vāyu dṛṣṭānta upādānāt veṇu randhra ādi bhedena bhedaḥ ṣaṣ jāti saṃjñitaḥ
abheda vyāpinaḥ vāyoḥ tathā tasya mahātmanaḥ iti

original: na hi vāyudravyaṃ sarvatraikaṃ vyaktibhedasya spaṣṭatvāt,
analyzed: na hi vāyu dravyam sarvatra ekam vyakti bhedasya spaṣṭa tvāt
a vilakṣaṇa svabhāvasya tu vāyoḥ veṇu randhrākṛtam ṣaḍja ādi vailakṣaṇyam
eva ātmanaḥ pi paśu manuṣya ādi vailakṣaṇyam deha saṃbandha kṛtam na svābhāvikam iti ayam eva arthaḥ
vāyoḥ iti tasya iti ca ekavacanam sāmānya abhiprāyam

iti ātma vādaḥ

original: avidyānirmito hi prapañcaḥ svapnaprapañcavat prabodhenaiva brahmavidyayā avidyāyāṃ vilīnāyāṃ svayameva vilīyate /

original: tathāhi śrutiḥ yatra hi dvaitamiva bhavati taditara itaraṃ paśyati yatra tvasya sarvāmātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet
analyzed: tathā hi śrutiḥ yatra hi dvaitam iva bhavati tat itaraḥ itaram paśyati yatra tu asya sarvām ātmā eva abhūt tat kena kam paśyet

original: tadidamapi prapañcasyāvidyānirmitatvanirāraṇena paramārthatvapratipādanānnirastameveti ātmaivedaṃ sarvamiti sarvasyātmā bhoktetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: tat idam api prapañcasya avidyā nirmita tva nirāraṇena paramārtha tva pratipādanāt nirastam eva iti ātmā eva idam sarvam iti sarvasya ātmā bhoktā iti arthaḥ

original: yathā yaḥ kāmayeta rāṣṭraṃ syāmiti rāṣṭrasya bhoktetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: yathā yaḥ kāmayeta rāṣṭram syām iti rāṣṭrasya bhoktā iti arthaḥ

original: yathā kāmayeta sarvamidaṃ bhaveyamiti sarvasya bhoktā bhaveyamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: yathā kāmayeta sarvam idam bhaveyam iti sarvasya bhoktā bhaveyam iti arthaḥ
tathā ātmā sarvam iti sarvasya ātmā bhoktā iti arthaḥ

original: yattu yatra hi dvaitamiva bhavatīti dvaitabhāvasya bhrāntitvavacanaṃ tadaupacārikam-
analyzed: yat tu yatra hi dvaitam iva bhavati iti dvaita bhāvasya bhrānti tva vacanam tat aupacārikam

paścāt vilīnaḥ bhogya tām ativartate tathā ayam śarīra indriya viṣaya rūpa prapañcaḥ pyasya ātmanaḥ
kiyantañcid kālam upabhogyaḥ san paścāt vināśāt anupabhogyaḥ bhavati iti anena sādṛśyena
bhrāntiḥ iti upacāreṇa ucyate puruṣāṇām viṣaya bhogeṣu āsthā nivartanena muktau abhirucim janayitum

original: yadapi yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūditi muktāvātmano 'dvitīyatvacanaṃ tadapi na prapañcasvarūpaniṣedhārthaṃ kitu sata eva prapañcasyātmasaṃbandhaniṣedhārthaṃ,

asya itivacanāt
na hi atra etāvat ucyate yatra sarvam ātmā eva abhūt iti
kim tarhi
yatra tu asya sarvam ātmā eva iti
tena asya ayam arthaḥ yatra yasyām avasthāyām muktau iti arthaḥ

original: asya ātmano dṛśyatvena darśanasādhanatvena darśanāyatanatvena vā na kiñcidanyasaṃbandhi vidyate kintvātmaivāsya sarvaṃ nānyakiñcit tadā kena  #
analyzed: asya ātmanaḥ dṛśya tvena darśana sādhana tvena darśana āyatana tvena vā na kiñcid anya saṃbandhi vidyate kintu ātmā eva asya sarvam na anya kiñcid tadā kena
kam paśyet iti

original: yathā loke yasya na kiñcidapi bāndhavo vittaṃ vāsti sa evaṃ vadati- na me kañcidasti ahameva sarvaṃ tatra saṃbandhyantaraṃ na kiñcidastītyetāvadvivakṣitam,
analyzed: yathā loke yasya na kiñcid api bāndhavaḥ vittam vā asti saḥ evam vadati na me kañcid asti aham eva sarvam tatra saṃbandhi antaram na kiñcid asti iti etāvat vivakṣitam

original: evaṃ muktāvātmaivātmanaḥ sarvamiti saṃbandhyantarābhāvamātraṃ vivakṣitaṃ na prapañcasvarūpabhāvaḥ,

original: tredhā hi prapañcaḥ puruṣaṃ badhnāti bhogāyatanaṃ śarīraṃ bhogasādhanānīndriyāṇi bhogyāḥ śabdādayo viṣayāḥ /

bhogaḥ iti ca parokṣa anubhava

original: ucyate tadasya trividhasyāpi bandhasyātyantiko vilayo mokṣaḥ //*//

kim idam ātyantika tvam pūrva utpannānām śarīra indriya viṣayāṇām vināśaḥ
anutpannānām ca ātyantikaḥ nutpādaḥ
katham atyanta anutpattiḥ
utpādakayoḥ dharma adharmayoḥ niḥśeṣayoḥ parikṣāyāt

ānanda mokṣa vādaḥ
nanu evam aśeṣa dharma kṣayāt muktasya na kicid sukham syāt

original: naiṣa doṣaḥ- na hi dharmajanyo muktasyātmanaḥ tathā satyutpattimattvāt vināśī syāt tatrāpunarāvṛttiśrutervirodhaḥ syāt /

original: svābhāvikastvātmānandaḥ saṃsāreṇābhibhūtaḥ san nirmuktasaṃsārasyābhivyaktau bhogyo bhavati svābhāvikatve cānandasya ānandaṃ brahme tyādiśrutisahasraṃ  #

original: yadi saṃsāriṇo 'pi paramānandamanubhaveyustato muktasya na kaścidatiśaya iti tadevāpuruṣārthatvaṃ mokṣasyāpadyeta,

original: yadi tu naiva prakāśate saṃsārāvasthāyāṃ tasyāmavasthāyāmasataḥ prakāśasya muktāvasthāyāmutpadyamānasya kāraṇaṃ vaktavyam,

original: avināśitvāt na tu taddvitīyamasti tato 'nyadvibhaktaṃ yatpaśyet evamanyānyapi vākyāni jighranvai
analyzed: avināśi tvāt na tu tat dvitīyam asti tatas yat paśyet evam anyāni api vākyāni jighran vai

original: tanna jighrati na hi ghrātughrāterviparilopo vidyate,

na śrotuḥ śruteḥ viparilopaḥ vidyate
na spraṣṭuḥ spṛṣṭeḥ viparilopaḥ vidyate
na jñātuḥ jñāteḥ viparilopaḥ vidyate tatra tatra dṛṣṭi ghrāti śruti spṛṣṭi śabdāḥ cakṣuḥ ghrāṇa śrotra tvac indriya janyānām
rūpa gandha śabda sparśa viṣayāṇām vācakāḥ na artha antara viṣayāṇām na api vijñāna sāmānyasya

original: nacaiṣāṃ jñānaviśeṣāṇāṃ vācakāḥ nārthāntaraviṣayāṇāṃ nāpi vijñānasāmānyasya,
analyzed: na ca eṣām jñāna viśeṣāṇām vācakāḥ na artha antara viṣayāṇām na api vijñāna sāmānyasya

original: nacaiṣāṃ jñānaviśeṣāṇāṃ suṣuptau muktau vā kathañcidapyaparilopaḥ saṃbhavati,
analyzed: na ca eṣām jñāna viśeṣāṇām suṣuptau muktau vā kathañcid api aparilopaḥ saṃbhavati

original: nahi tadānīmindriyāṇi santi nāpi gandhādayo jñāyante tadubhayābhāve ca na śrutyādiśabdavācyajñānaviśeṣāḥ saṃbhavanti //*//

original: nanu yathā prakāśyāsannidhāvapi savituḥ prakāśakatvaṃ nityam,

original: sayādevam- yadi jñānamātraṃ dṛṣṭyādiśabdānāṃ vācyaṃ syāt,
analyzed: yadi jñāna mātram dṛṣṭi ādi śabdānām vācyam syāt
na tu tathā asti
loka prasiddhi abhāvāt

original: yathā lokaṃ ca śabdārthāvadhāraṇaṃ na yatheccham /
analyzed: yathā lokam ca śabda artha avadhāraṇam na yatheccham
na hi loke gandhāt anyat ghrāṇam jighrati iti ucyate

original: gandhamapi yadā ghrāṇādanyenānumānādinā jānāti tadā na jighratītyucyate,
analyzed: gandham api yadā ghrāṇāt anyena anumāna ādinā jānāti tadā na jighrati iti ucyate

original: na ca teṣāṃ suṣuptau muktau vā saṃbhavatyaparilopaḥ,
analyzed: na ca teṣām suṣuptau muktau vā saṃbhavati aparilopaḥ
tasmāt ghrāṇa ādi śaktau eva prarocana artham ghrāṇa ādi upacāraḥ

original: yathā tema hyannaṃ kriyate iti śaktivartamānatvena prarocanārthaṃ kriyate iti vartamānatvopacāraḥ,
analyzed: yathā hi annam kriyate iti śakti vartamāna tvena prarocana artham kriyate iti vartamāna tva upacāraḥ

original: tasmāt na jñātujñāterviparilopo vidyata ityedapi śaktyabhiprāyameva //*//
analyzed: tasmāt na jñātu jñāteḥ viparilopaḥ vidyate śakti abhiprāyam eva
yat tu āditya prakāśaka tva vat iti
kim tasya prakāśaka tvam abhipretam
yadi timira utsāraṇam
tat nityam asya iva sarvadā hi asau avyavahiteṣu deśeṣu timiram utsādayati eva
nanu evam ātmā sarvadā śṛṇoti suṣupta avaśravaṇāt
atha jñāna janaka tvam āditya deśeṣu timiram utsādayati eva
na tu evam ātmā sarvadā śṛṇoti suṣupta avaśravaṇāt
atha jñāna janaka tvam ādityasya prakāśaka tvam na tat nityam
tasmāt sāmarthyam eva tatra api nityam
tasmāt jñānaśakti abhiprāyam idam nitya tva abhidhānam

original: eṣā hyatra vacanavyaktiḥ- yadetatsuṣuptau muktau vātmā na paśyati paśyanneva draṣṭuṃ śaknuvanneva na paśyati /
analyzed: eṣā hi atra vacana vyaktiḥ yat etat suṣuptau muktau vā ātmā na paśyati paśyan eva draṣṭum śaknuvan eva na paśyati

original: na hi draṣcurātmano yā darśanaśaktistasyāḥ kadācidapi lopo vidyate sāhyavināśinīti
analyzed: na hi draṣcuḥ ātmanaḥ yā darśana śaktiḥ tasyāḥ kadācid api lopaḥ vidyate sā ahyavināśinī iti

original: na draṣṭurdvitīyamanyaddarśanasādhanaṃ cakṣurvyāpārarūpaṃ dṛśyaṃ vā tasyāmavasthāyāsamasti yato darśanaṃ syāt,
analyzed: na draṣṭuḥ dvitīyam anyat darśana sādhanam cakṣuḥ vyāpāra rūpam dṛśyam vā tasyām avasthāyāsam asti yatas darśanam syāt

original: yadyapi dṛśyaṃ rūpādikaṃ svarūpatastasyāmavasthāyāmasti tathāpi dṛśyatā darśanayogyatā tasyāmavasthāyāṃ nāstīti tena rūpeṇābhāvāddṛśyaṃ nāstītyucyate,
analyzed: yadi api dṛśyam rūpa ādikam svarūpataḥ tasyām avasthāyām asti tathā api dṛśya tā darśana yogya tā tasyām avasthāyām na asti iti tena rūpeṇa abhāvāt dṛśyam na asti iti ucyate
tasmāt sādhana antara vaikalyāt tasyām avasthāyām na paśyati na śakti vaikalyāt
śaktiḥ tu na kadācid api lupyate iti
evam anyeṣām api vākyānām yojanā
tathā jñāna śakti aparilopaḥ eva ucyate
jñāti śabdaḥ ca atra anumāna ādi jñāna paraḥ cakṣuḥ ādi jñānānām sva śabdaiḥ ukta tvāt

original: evaṃ vijñānaṃ brahma vijñānaghana ityādīnāmapi śaktiparatvaṃ veditavyam /
analyzed: evam vijñānam brahma vijñāna ghanaḥ ityādīnām api śakti para tvam veditavyam

original: svayameva śrutyā śaktiparatvaṃ vyākhyātaṃ vijñānaghana evaitebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāyatānyevānu vinaśyatīti bhūtendriyanāśādātmāpi pramāṇāgocaratvamāpanno  #
analyzed: svayam eva śrutyā śakti paratvam vyākhyātam vijñāna ghanaḥ eva etebhyaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāyata ani eva anu vinaśyati iti bhūta indriya nāśāt ātmā api pramāṇa agocara tvam āpannaḥ
vinaṣṭaḥ iva bhavati iti
na tasya itas pretasya muktasya saṃjñā asti iti

original: evaṃ yājñavalkyemanokte maitreyī codayatisma atraiva ṅagavān(?)
analyzed: evam maitreyī codayati sma atra eva ṅagavān

original: māmohitavān vijñānaghana iti na cāsti saṃjñeti viruddhābhidhānāt iti /
analyzed: māmohitavān vijñāna ghanaḥ iti na ca asti saṃjñā iti viruddha abhidhānāt iti
ṣaṣṭha adhyāye tu vināśa avināśa virodhaḥ codayiṣyate iti vivekaḥ

original: evaṃ codito yājñavalkyaḥ parihāramāha- na vā are ahaṃmoha parasparaviruddhaṃ bravīmi,
analyzed: evam coditaḥ yājñavalkyaḥ parihāram āha na vai are aham moha paraspara viruddham bravīmi

original: alaṃ vā are idaṃ vijñānāya atrātmatattvaṃ sarvāsvavasthāsu vijñānāya samarthamityarthastena vijñānaghanatvābhidhānaṃ sāmarthyābhiprāyamiti  #
analyzed: alam vai are idam vijñānāya atra ātma tattvam sarvāsu avasthāsu vijñānāya samartham iti arthaḥ tena vijñāna ghana tva abhidhānam sāmarthya abhiprāyam iti
vyākhyātam bhavati

original: saṃbhavati ca śaktasyāpi jñānābhāva iti nāsti virodha ityabhiprāyaḥ /
analyzed: saṃbhavati ca śaktasya api jñāna abhāvaḥ iti nā asti virodhaḥ iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: anayā ca śrutyā sarvavijñānaśrutayaḥ śaktyabhiprāyā vyākhyātāḥ //*//
analyzed: anayā ca śrutyā sarva vijñāna śrutayaḥ śakti abhiprāyāḥ vyākhyātāḥ

original: yadi śaktirasti tatastasyāvasthāyāṃ tataḥ kena jñānānutpattiḥ jñānasādhanānāmindriyāṇāṃ jñeyānāṃ ca viṣayāṇāmabhāvāt /
analyzed: yadi śaktiḥ asti tatas tasya avasthāyām tatas kena jñāna anutpattiḥ jñāna sādhanānām indriyāṇām jñeyānām ca viṣayāṇām abhāvāt

original: tadāha yatra hi dvaitamiva bhavati taditara itaraṃ paśyati,
analyzed: tat āha yatra hi dvaitam iva bhavati tat itaraḥ itaram paśyati

original: yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet ityādi,
analyzed: yatra tu asya sarvam ātmā eva abhūt tat kena kam paśyet ityādi
tat etat prāk eva vyākhyātam

original: evamarthāntarajñāne sādhanābhāvānnirākṛte sati ātmānameva muktāvasthāyāṃ jānātvityāśaṅkyāha
analyzed: evam artha antara jñāne sādhana abhāvāt nirākṛte sati ātmānam eva mukta avasthāyām jānātu iti āśaṅkya āha

original: vijñātāramare kena vijānīyāt iti nahyātmāpi vināsādhanena jñātuṃ śakyate manasā khalvasau
analyzed: vijñātāram are kena vijānīyāt iti na hi ātmā api vinā a sādhanena jñātum śakyate manasā khalu asau

original: saṃsārāvasthāyāṃ jñāyate na ca muktasya manaḥsaṃbangho 'sti ataḥ kenātmānaṃ jānātviti
analyzed: saṃsāra avasthāyām jñāyate na ca muktasya manaḥ saṃbanghaḥ sti atas kena ātmānam jānātu iti

original: vyakta eva muktasyātmajñānasyābhāve jñānaśaktimātrasyāvasthānaṃ śrutyā darśitaṃ,
analyzed: vyakte eva muktasya ātma jñānasya abhāve jñānaśakti mātrasya avasthānam śrutyā darśitam
tasmāt niḥsaṃbandhaḥ nirānandaḥ ca mokṣaḥ
ātmanaḥ jñāna ānanda svarūpa tvasya khaṇḍanam

original: nanu nātmano 'nyadvijñānamānando vā kintvātmaiva jñānamānandaśca vijñānaṃ brahma ānandaṃ brahma iti śruteḥ,
analyzed: nanu na ātmanaḥ nyat vijñānam ānandaḥ vā kintu ātmā eva jñānam ānandaḥ ca vijñānam brahma ānandam brahma iti śruteḥ

original: ātmā ca suṣuptiturīyayorapi bhavatīti kathaṃ vijñānasya cānandasya cābhāvaḥ /
analyzed: ātmā ca suṣupti turīyayoḥ api bhavati iti katham vijñānasya ca ānandasya ca abhāvaḥ
na etat evam

original: yaddhi vastvantaraprakāśajananasvabhāvaṃ vastu yasminsati kimapyarthāntaraṃ prakāśata eva talloke vijñānaśabdenocyate,
analyzed: yat hi vastu antara prakāśa janana svabhāvam vastu yasmin sati kim api artha antaram prakāśate eva tat loke vijñāna śabdena ucyate
na ca ātmani sati kiñcid anyat prakāśate eva
vidyamāne pi
tasmin suṣupti avasthāyām artha antarasya kasyacid api adarśanāt atas na jñānam ātmā
nanu prakāśa janana svabhāvaḥ sahakāri vaikalyāt na janayet
satyam na janayati

original: yasmiṃstu sahakārisaṃnidhāne tatkṛte vānyasminnāgantuke sati niyamena prakāśata evārthāntaraṃ tajjñānaśabdavācyam /
analyzed: yasmin tu sahakāri saṃnidhāne tad kṛte vā anyasmin āgantuke sati niyamena prakāśate eva artha antaram tat jñāna śabda vācyam
tathā gīti śravaṇa priya āliṅgana candra darśana madhura āsvāda surabhi ghrāṇa ādi janyam āhlādam ānanda sukha śabdau abhidadhāte
na ca evaṃrūpa tvam ātmānaḥ sti

original: yathā hyanyasukheṣu sukharūpaṃ pratyabhijñāyate naivamātmani pratyabhijānīmo yenānandamiti ca saṃjñetyucyate na sā laukikī nāpi vaidikī /
analyzed: yathā hi anya sukheṣu sukha rūpam pratyabhijñāyate na evam ātmani pratyabhijānīmaḥ yena ānandam iti ca saṃjñā iti ucyate na sā laukikī na api vaidikī
yadi param vṛddhi ādi vat paribhāṣyeta tat astu yathākāmam

original: yattu vijñānaṃ brahma ānandaṃ brahma iti ca sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ taddharmamātravacanatvena vartante,
analyzed: yat tu vijñānam brahma ānandam brahma iti ca sāmānādhikaraṇyam tad dharma mātra vacana tvena vartante
satyam
na bāhulyena vartante

original: kadācittu guṇamātravacanānāmapi guṇini prayogo bhavati yathā śīto madhuro rasaḥ snigdho guruśceti rasaśabdo dravye prayujyate,
analyzed: kadācid tu guṇa mātra vacanānām api guṇini prayogaḥ bhavati yathā śītaḥ madhuraḥ rasaḥ snigdhaḥ guruḥ ca iti rasa śabdaḥ dravye prayujyate
anyathā śīta ādi śabda sāmānādhikaraṇya ayogāt
kim ca rasam hi eva ayam vidvān
saḥ ekaḥ brahmaṇaḥ ānanda
iti ṣaṣṭhī ānandāt brahma vyatiricyate

original: kiṃ ca na me sāṃprataṃ kiñcidapi sukhaṃ duḥkhameva tu sarvātmanā mameti sukhābhāve duḥkhānubhave cānusaṃdhīyamānasyātmanaḥ kathamānandarūpatā  #
analyzed: kim ca na me sāṃpratam kiñcid api sukham duḥkham eva tu sarva ātmanā mama iti sukha abhāve duḥkha anubhave ca anusaṃdhīyamānasya ātmanaḥ katham ānanda rūpa tā  /
syāt
kim ca sva prakāśa ānanda rūpam ātmānam abhyupagacchatām asmākam ca etāvat avivādam suṣupti tulyā muktiḥ iti
saṃsāra anuvṛtti anuvṛtti mātram bhidyate anyat sarvam tulyam

original: tathā ca śrutirapi- tā etāḥ prajā aharaharbrahmalokaṃ yanti /
analyzed: tathā ca śrutiḥ api tāḥ etāḥ prajāḥ ahar ahar brahma lokam yanti

original: aharaharāgacchanti iti suṣuptiṃ brahmalokaśabdena vadantī tulyatvametayordarśayati,
analyzed: ahar ahar āgacchanti iti suṣuptim brahma loka śabdena vadantī tulya tvam etayoḥ darśayati

original: suṣuptiścāsmākamapi gocaro na ca tatrānandānubhavo 'stīti vyaktametat,
analyzed: suṣuptiḥ ca asmākam api gocaraḥ na ca tatra ānanda anubhavaḥ sti iti vyaktam etat
tasmāt nirānandaḥ mokṣaḥ
duḥkha parilopāt ca puruṣa arthantvam

original: sukhalopādapuruṣārthatvamapīticet- naivamalpaṃ hi saṃsāre sukhaṃ tadapi sūrayaḥ //
analyzed: sukha lopāt apuruṣa artha tvam api iti ced nā evam alpam hi saṃsāre sukham tat api sūrayaḥ

ye dṛṣṭa loka parāvarāḥ

original: aśarīraṃ vā vasantaṃ smapṛśato na priyāpriye //

original: tāveva(?) sa mokṣe 'pi nādhikyaṃ tasya kiñcana //
analyzed: tau eva sa mokṣe na ādhikyam tasya kiñcana

iti
mukti svarūpa kathanam
kim idam svasthaḥ iti

original: ye hyāgamamāpāyino dharmā buddhisukhaduḥkhecchādveṣaprayatnadharmāgharmāsaṃskārastānapahāya yadasya svaṃ naijaṃ jñānaśaktisattādravyatvādi  #
analyzed: ye hi āgamam āpāyinaḥ dharmāḥ buddhi sukha duḥkha icchā dveṣa prayatna dharma a gharma a saṃskāraḥ tān apahāya yat asya svam naijam jñāna śakti sattā dravya tva ādi
tasmin avatiṣṭhate iti arthaḥ

original: yadi tu saṃsārāvasthāyāmavidyamāno 'pyānando muktāvasthāyāṃ janyata ityucyate tato janimattvādanityo mokṣaḥ syāt /
analyzed: yadi tu saṃsāra avasthāyām avidyamānaḥ pi ānandaḥ mukta avasthāyām janyate iti ucyate tatas janimat tvāt anityaḥ mokṣaḥ syāt
kena ca asau anubhāvyaḥ
na hi sva prakāśa tvam kasyacid saṃbhavi iti uktam

original: na ca manasānubhavaḥ saṃbhavatīti muktasya manaso 'bhāvāt amanalaskatvaśruterityuktam /
analyzed: na ca manasā anubhavaḥ saṃbhavati iti muktasya manasaḥ bhāvāt a manalaska tva śruteḥ iti uktam

original: ata eva nityo 'pyānandaḥ saṃsāradaśāyāmabibhūtatvādanubhūtopi muktāvabhibhave nivṛtte manasānubhūyate ityedapi nirastam //*//
analyzed: atas eva nityaḥ pi ānandaḥ saṃsāra daśāyām a bibhūta tvāt anubhūtaḥ api muktau abhibhave nivṛtte manasā anubhūyate nirastam

original: kiṃ ca sukhaviśiṣcātmānubhavaḥ puruṣārtho na sukhamātrānubhavaḥ,
analyzed: kim ca sukha viśiṣca ātma anubhavaḥ puruṣa arthaḥ na sukha mātra anubhavaḥ

original: na ca muktāvātmānubhavaḥ saṃbhavati vijñātāramare kena vijānīyāt iti kaṇṭhenaiva
analyzed: na ca muktau ātma anubhavaḥ saṃbhavati vijñātāram are kena vijānīyāt iti kaṇṭhena eva

original: śrutyā niṣiddhatvāt alaṃ vā are idaṃ vijñānāya iti ca śrutyā vijñānaśabdasya muktasya
analyzed: śrutyāḥ niṣiddha tvāt alam vai are idam vijñānāya iti ca śrutyāḥ vijñāna śabdasya muktasya
vijñānam aśakyam abhyupagantum

original: nahyasyāḥ śruteḥ priyāpriyāsparśaśruteśca tattvakathanaṃ muktvā kathañcidanyaparatvaṃ saṃbhavati /
analyzed: na hi asyāḥ śruteḥ priya apriya asparśa śruteḥ ca tattva kathanam muktvā kathañcid anya para tvam saṃbhavati
vijñāna āśrutayaḥ tu śaktau eva vijñāna upacāram kurvanti prarocana artha tayā iti upapannam
evam ānanda śrutayaḥ pi puruṣa artha tva sāmānyāt sukha tva upacāreṇa prarocana artha tayā pravṛttāḥ
yuktam ca etat vacanayoḥ virodhe nyatas nirṇayaḥ iti
virodhaḥ ca atra ānanda priya abhāva vacanayoḥ
na ca abhāva vacanam vaiṣayika abhiprāyam
itarat tu svābhāvika abhiprāyam iti śakyam vaktum
ubhayatra api sāmānya upādānāt atyanta samāna viṣaya tvāt
atas pramāṇa antara vaśāt ānanda vacanam duḥkha abhāva param
itarat tu yathāśrutam iti nyāyyam
tasmāt sukha duḥkha ādi samasta vaiśeṣika ātma guṇa ucchedaḥ mokṣaḥ
sukha duḥkha ucchedaḥ ca dharma adharmayoḥ ucchedāt
dharma adharmayoḥ ucchedaḥ ca utpannānām dharma adharmāṇām upabhogena nitya naimittika karma anuṣṭhānena ātma jñānena ca virodhāt
utpādyānām ca kāmya anuṣṭhāna nimittānām dharmāṇām tad anuṣṭhānena anutpādāt

original: vihitākaraṇapratiṣiddhānuṣṭhānanimittānāṃ cādharmāṇāṃ vihitānuṣṭhānena pratiṣiddhākaraṇena ca parihārāt,
analyzed: vihita akaraṇa pratiṣiddha anuṣṭhāna nimittānām ca adharmāṇām vihita anuṣṭhānena pratiṣiddha akaraṇena ca parihārāt

original: asati śarīrārambhe pūrvaśarīranipāte cāśarīro 'vasthito mukto bhavati //
analyzed: asati śarīra ārambhe pūrva śarīra nipāte ca aśarīraḥ vasthitaḥ muktaḥ bhavati
ātma jñānasya kratu mokṣa ubhaya upayogi tvam
nanu ātma jñānam kratu artham
satyam
puruṣa artham api ca tat saṃyoga bhedāt
yat tāvat avināśī vai are yama ātmā ityādinā śarīrāt vyatirikta nitya ātma svarūpa sadbhāva jñānam
tat pāralaukika phala karma anuṣṭhāna aupayika tvāt karma jñāna vat eva sāmarthyataḥ kratu saṃyogāt kratu artham
yathā hi jyotiṣṭoma udi vākya adhyayanam dṛṣṭena eva anuṣṭhāna aupayika tvam jñānam janayati iti

original: tadarthatayādhyayanavidhinā vidhīyate tathā avināśī vā areyamātmā ityādivākyānāmapyadhyayanavidhireva
analyzed: tad artha tayā adhyayana vidhinā vidhīyate tathā avināśī vai are yam ātmā ityādi vākyānām api adhyayana vidhiḥ eva
karma anuṣṭhāna upayogi ātma jñāna artha tām vidhatte

original: tadyadi pramāṇāntareṇātmanaḥ śarīrādiviveko naikāntataḥ siddhyati tato dṛḍhavivekapratipādakānāmupaniṣadvākyānāṃ vispaṣṭameva phalam /
analyzed: tat yadi pramāṇa antareṇa ātmanaḥ śarīra ādi vivekaḥ na ekāntataḥ siddhi ati tatas dṛḍha viveka pratipādakānām upaniṣad vākyānām vispaṣṭam eva phalam
yathā uktam iti āha nāstikya nirākariṣṇuḥ ātma astitām bhāṣyakṛt atra yuktyā
dṛḍha tvam etad viṣayaḥ prabodhaḥ prayāti vedānta niṣevaṇena iti
atha tu anyatas siddhi ati
tatas yathā eva anyathā api kratu jñāna saṃbhave dhyayana upātta veda vākya avagata karma rūpāṇām eva
puṃsām karmasu adhikāraḥ tathā eva adhyāyana upātta upaniṣad vākya avagata ātma tattvānām eva adhikāra
iti adhyayana vidhi balāt eva kalpyate

original: yattvātmasadbhāvapratipādanopakrame vidhisarūpaṃ vākyam ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ ityādi
analyzed: yat tu ātma sadbhāva pratipādana upakrame vidhi sarūpam vākyam ātmā vai are draṣṭavyaḥ ityādi
tat vakṣyamāṇasya arthasya ati gahana tvāt mahā upayoga tvāt ca katham hi nāma ālasyam hitvā śraddhā viśeṣeṇa
vakṣyamāṇam artham pratipadyeta iti ā tāvat mātra artham
tasmāt etat jñānam dṛṣṭa upayogi tvāt kratu artham
yāni punar itikartavya tā viśeṣa yuktāni upāsana ātmakāni vidhīyante teṣām kratau dṛṣṭa upayoga abhāvāt adṛṣṭa phala tvam

original: adṛṣṭaṃ ca phalaṃ vākyaśeṣāddvividhaṃ abhyudayarūpaṃ niḥśreyasarūpaṃ ca,
analyzed: adṛṣṭam ca phalam vākyaśeṣāt dvividham abhyudaya rūpam niḥśreyasa rūpam ca
sarvan kāmān āpnoti saḥ u śnute sarvān kāmān ityādi abhyudaya phalam

original: na sa punarāvartate ityādi niḥśreyasaphalamiti vivekaḥ //
analyzed: na sa punar āvartate ityādi niḥśreyasa phalam iti vivekaḥ
ātma nitya tvena adhikaraṇa upasaṃhāraḥ

original: yattu vijñānaghana evaitebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tānyevānuvinaśyati na pretya
analyzed: yat tu vijñāna ghane eva etebhyaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tāni eva anuvinaśyati na pretya

original: saṃjñāsti ityanena brāhmaṇena bhūtacaitanyamuktamityāśaṅkyate tatsvayameva brāhmaṇenātreva
analyzed: saṃjñā asti iti anena brāhmaṇena bhūta caitanyam uktam iti āśaṅkyate tat svayam eva brāhmaṇena atra eva
mā bhagavat moha antam prāpitavān pūrvam ajara amṛtvam abhidhāya adhunā vināśi iti abhidhānāt iti
pūrvapakṣam codya ākhyam uktvā siddhānta parihāraḥ uktaḥ

original: avināśī vā are 'yamātmānucchittidharmā ityuktvā kathaṃ tarhi vināśavacanamityāśaṅkya mātrāsaṃsargatvasya bhavatītyuktam /
analyzed: avināśī vai are yam ātmā an ucchitti dharmā iti uktvā katham tarhi vināśa vacanam iti āśaṅkya mātrā saṃsarga tvasya bhavati iti uktam

original: mātrāśabdena bhūtendriyāṇi dharmādharmau ca vikāraśabdavācyā ucyante //*//
analyzed: mātrā śabdena bhūta indriyāṇi dharma adharmau ca vikāra śabda vācyāḥ ucyante
etat uktam bhavati vijñāna ghana śabdena jñāna śakti svabhāvasya ātmanaḥ bhidhānam

original: sa hyetebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya mukto bhūtvā tānyevānuvinaśyati bhūtavināśātso 'pi vinaṣṭa iva bhavatīti,
analyzed: sa hi etebhyaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya muktaḥ bhūtvā tāni eva anuvinaśyati bhūta vināśāt saḥ u pi vinaṣṭaḥ iva bhavati iti
bhūta sthaḥ hi asau svayam pratyakṣeṇa vinaśyati iti ucyate

original: tadanena prakāreṇa mātrāṇāmeva vināśa ityucyate nātmana ityavirodhaḥṣa /

original: teṣu prayatnotthāpitaiḥ kauṣṭhyairvāyubhirutsāriteṣūpalabhyate śabda iti cet /

original: atha saṃskārādhānaṃ tatrāpi traividhyaṃ- śabdasya vā saṃskāramādadhyuḥ kauṣṭhyā vāyavaḥ śrotrasya vā ubhayorvā /

original: śabdasya cet tasyaikatvātsarvagatatvādanavayavasaṃskārāyogāt srudhnasthairvāyubhiḥ saṃskṛtaḥ śabdaḥ pāṭaliputrepyupalabhyeta,

śrotra saṃskāra pakṣe pi ayam eva doṣaḥ

original: sarvapaṃsāmekameva śrotraṃ syāttaccaikadeśasthairapi dhvānābhiḥ saṃska-tamiti kaḥ

sarveṣām śabda upalabdhim vārayet
tat idam śrotra ādeḥ iyam eva diś iti antena darśitam

original: asmiṃśca pakṣe śrotrasya sarvaśabdasādharaṇatvādekaśabdopalabdhyarthamapi saṃskṛtaṃ śrotraṃ prasaṅgātsarvānśabdānghaṭārthonmīlitamiva netraṃ  #

samāna deśa sthān paṭa ādīn avabodhayet
tat idam sakṛt ca saṃskṛtam śrotram ityādinā darśitam

original: ayaṃ ca doṣaḥ pūrvopakṣipte 'pi śabdasaṃskārapakṣe darśayitavyaḥ- sarve hi śabdāḥ śrotradeśe 'vasthitāstatraikasminsaṃkriyamāṇe balādanyeṣāmapi  #

saṃskāraḥ syāt eva

original: na hi samānadeśānāṃ samānendriyagrāhyāṇāṃ kasyacitsaṃskāraḥ kasyaciccāsaṃskāra iti vyavasthā saṃbhavati ghaṭādāvadarśanāt,
analyzed: na hi samāna deśānām samāna indriya grāhyāṇām kasyacid saṃskāraḥ kasyacid ca asaṃskāraḥ iti vyavasthā saṃbhavati ghaṭa ādau adarśanāt
tat idam uktam etat eva prasaṃktavyam ityādinā
ubhaya saṃskāra pakṣe tu ubhaye doṣāḥ samuccitya darśayitavyāḥ

original: tathā sati hi kaiścideva kaścideva śabdaḥ śrūyata ityupapadyate,

anyathā śrotra vyavasthā ca ubhayam api na syāt

original: kica nānādeśasthaiśca vaktṛbhiruccāritaḥ śabdo yugapannānādeśeṣūpalabhyate tadekasya nityasyānupapannamiti śā0 bhāṣyam /
analyzed: kica nānā deśa sthaiḥ ca vaktṛbhiḥ uccāritaḥ śabdaḥ yugapad nānā deśeṣu upalabhyate tat ekasya nityasya anupapannam iti śā bhāṣyam
tatra nityasya anupapannam iti pratijñā
ekasya iti hetuḥ
nityaḥ hi asevakaḥ syāt ekasya anupapannam nānā deśeṣu upalambhanam iti
nanu nā avaśya tvam nitya tve sati ekatvam bhavati

original: anekānyeva hi gakārādīni nityāni bhavantvityata āha- asati viśeṣe nityasya nānekatvam(śābhā) iti /
analyzed: anekāni eva hi gakāra ādīni nityāni bhavantu iti atas āha asati viśeṣe nityasya na aneka tvam śābhāḥ iti
etat uktam bhavati pratyabhijñā ākhya viśeṣya pratyaya balena hi astana adyatana gakārayoḥ eka tva avagamāt nitya tvam āśrīyate

original: asticāsāvaviśeṣapratyayo yugapannānāvaktṛbhiruccārite 'pi gakāre nahi tatrāpi pratyayaviśeṣo 'sti,
analyzed: asti ca asau aviśeṣa pratyayaḥ yugapad nānā vaktṛbhiḥ uccārite gakāre nahi tatra api pratyaya viśeṣaḥ sti

original: asati ca viśeṣe nityasya nānekatvaṃ saṃbhavati /

original: anekatve hi pratyabhijñāyā aprāmāṇyamasmākamiva bhavato 'pi syāt tadaprāmāṇyeca
analyzed: aneka tve hi pratyabhijñāyāḥ aprāmāṇyam asmākam iva syāt tad aprāmāṇye ca
nitya tva anupapattiḥ
tasmāt nitya tve sati ekatvam aṅgīkartavyam
ekasya ca anupapannam nānā deśa upalambhanam iti

original: vārtike 'pi- yaugapadyopalambhādvā bhedo bhedācca kāryateti dvayamupakṣipya yathāyaugapadyopalambhādbhedo
analyzed: vārtike pi yaugapadya upalambhāt vā bhedaḥ bhedāt ca kārya tā iti dvayam upakṣipya yathā yaugapadya upalambhāt bhedaḥ

original: bhavati tathā darśitam- avibhutve hi yugapadityādinā tathā darśitam- nityatve tvekabuddhiḥ syāditi /
analyzed: bhavati tathā darśitam avibhu tve hi yugapad ityādinā tathā darśitam nitya tve tu eka buddhiḥ syāt iti

original: tathā ca vakṣyate- api caikarūpye sati deśabhedena kāmaṃ deśā eva bhinnāḥ syurnatu śabdaḥ iti /
analyzed: tathā ca vakṣyate api ca aikarūpye sati deśa bhedena kāmam deśāḥ eva bhinnāḥ syuḥ na tu śabdaḥ iti

original: na hi tadaprāmāṇye nityatvaṃ siddhyati pramāṇāntarābhāvāt,

original: ato nityatve satyekatvaṃ syāttacca nānādeśopalambhena virudhyata iti,

original: tataśca yaugapadyopalambhādbhedo bhede ca pratyabhijñāyā aprāmāṇyaṃ tadaprāmāṇye ca nityatvābhāvātkāryatvaṃ- tadetadānupūrvyaṃ svatantrasiddham
analyzed: tatas ca yaugapadya upalambhāt bhedaḥ bhede ca pratyabhijñāyāḥ aprāmāṇyam tad aprāmāṇye ca nitya tva abhāvāt kārya tvam tat etat ānupūrvyam svatantra siddham

original: dṛḍhe cānityatve jīpavatsādṛśyātpratyabhijñā bhavati tasmādanityaḥ śabda iti prāpte //

original: nanvekatvesatīndriyasya yadyapyadhiṣṭhānāni bhinnāni tathāpyekenāpyadhiṣṭhānena saṃskṛtenendriyasya saṃskṛtatvātsarvapuṃsāmindriyaṃ saṃskṛtamiti  #

analyzed: deha antara vartinaḥ puruṣasya yaḥ tu adehe niṣpādayitavyam vijñānam tasya tad deha gata

a darśanāt
na hi ekasmin adhiṣṭhāne sarveṣām jñānam upalabhyate

original: ataḥ sādhāraṇamapīndriyaṃ vijñānasamānadesasaṃskārasacivameva jñānamukatpādayati nānyatheti darśanabalādadhyavasīyate tato nātiprasaṅgaḥ //*//

original: nacāvaśyamekamevendriyaṃ- yadyapyākāśamekamanavayavaṃ ca tathāpi tasya prādeśikairghaṭādibhirye
analyzed: na ca avaśyam ekam eva indriyam yadi api ākāśam ekam anavayavam ca tathā api tasya prādeśikaiḥ ghaṭa ādibhiḥ ye
saṃyogāḥ te pi prādeśikāḥ tatas ca karṇa śaṣkulī saṃyogānām prati puruṣam bhinna tvāt tad avacchinnasya
ca ākāśasya śrotra tvāt sati api svarūpa ekatve vacchinna rūpāṇām śrotrāṇām bhedāt vyavasthā siddhiḥ

yat tu sakṛt ca saṃskṛtam śrotram sarva śabdān prakāśayet iti uktam
tatra ucyate dhvanayaḥ hi tālu ādi sthāna viśeṣa saṃparkāt vijātīyāḥ vilakṣaṇa sāmarthyāt niṣpadyante

original: tataśca kaścideva dhvaniḥ kasyacicchabdasyānuguṇaṃ saṃskāramādhatte na sarvasādhāraṇamityupalabdhivyavasthā kalpyate śabdasaṃskārapakṣe 'pi  #
analyzed: tatas ca kaścid eva dhvaniḥ kasyacid śabdasya anuguṇam saṃskāram ādhatte na sarva sādhāraṇam iti upalabdhi vyavasthā kalpyate śabda saṃskāra pakṣe pi
kaścid eva dhvaniḥ kañcid śabdam

original: saṃskaroti na sarvaḥ sarvamiti yuktataraiva vyavasthā /
analyzed: saṃskaroti na sarvaḥ sarvam iti yuktatarā eva vyavasthā

original: dṛṣṭāca samānendriyagrāhyāṇāmapyabhivyañjakavyavasthā- sāvitraṃ hi tejo ghaṭādīnāmevābhivyañjakaṃ na nakṣatrāṇāṃ,
analyzed: dṛṣṭā ca samāna indriya grāhyāṇām api abhivyañjaka vyavasthā sāvitram hi tejaḥ ghaṭa ādīnām eva abhivyañjakam na nakṣatrāṇām
nimba tvac candana gandhasya eva abhivyañjikā na gandha antarāṇām
tasmāt adoṣaḥ

original: na ca śabdasaṃskāre sarvapuṃsāmupalabdiprasaṅgaḥ- dhvanīnāṃ prādeśikatvāttaddeśe śabdaḥ saṃskriyate na sarvatra,
analyzed: na ca śabda saṃskāre sarva puṃsām upalabdi prasaṅgaḥ dhvanīnām prādeśika tvāt tad deśe śabdaḥ saṃskriyate na sarvatra

original: ataḥ saṃskṛtena śabdena yasyendriyaṃ saṃnikṛṣṭaṃ sa eva śṛṇoti nānya ityupapannam //
analyzed: atas saṃskṛtena śabdena yasya indriyam saṃnikṛṣṭam saḥ eva śṛṇoti na anyaḥ iti upapannam
śabdasya aneka deśa upalambhaḥ
yugapad deśa bhedaḥ ca syāt ekasya sūrya vat

original: ye vindhyanilayā ye ca kāmarūpe vyavasthitāḥ //
analyzed: ye vindhya nilayāḥ ye ca kāmarūpe vyavasthitāḥ
prāgbhāge hi ātmanaḥ sarvaiḥ udyan bhāsvān nirīkṣyate
pratyagbhāve tathā astam yat madhyāhne ca upari sthitaḥ
bhinnāḥ ca teṣām prāgbhāgāḥ tathā pratyak tathā upari
teṣu asya dṛśyamānasya vispaṣṭā bhinna deśa tā

original: tathā yasminyāvaddūre deśe kaiścitsūryodayo dṛśyate taddeśavartino 'nyepi tataḥ parastāttāvati paśyanti tato 'pyasti bhedābhedaḥ /
analyzed: tathā yasmin yāvat dūre deśe kaiścid sūrya udayaḥ dṛśyate tad deśa vartinaḥ nye pi tatas parastāt tāvati paśyanti tatas u pi asti bheda abhedaḥ
na ca sūrya nānātvam āśaṅkanīyam
na hi kecid bhinnam sūryam paśyanti
ki punar eka deśa sthasya eva savituḥ nānā deśa upalambhe kāraṇam

original: ucyate- atidūravartino 'sya yathāvaddeśamajānantaḥ svasaṃnidhimadhyasyanto deśabhedaṃ manyante /
analyzed: ucyate yathāvat deśam a jānantaḥ sva saṃnidhim adhyasyantaḥ deśa bhedam manyante
vispaṣṭam ca etat

original: tathāhi- yo 'parāhne yasminyāvaddūre deśe sūryaṃ paśyati- asminkṣetre 'sminparvate sūryaḥ iti,
analyzed: tathā hi parāhne yasmin yāvat dūre deśe sūryam paśyati asmin kṣetre smin parvate sūryaḥ iti

original: sa savitāramīkṣamāṇa eva taddeśe gatastataḥ parastāttathaiva taṃ paśyati tenāvagamyate sarveṣāṃ deśānāmagrataḥ sthito 'sau saṃnihitavadavabhāsata  #
analyzed: sa savitāram īkṣamāṇaḥ eva tad deśe gataḥ tatas parastāt tathā eva tam paśyati tena avagamyate sarveṣām deśānām agratas sthitaḥ u sau saṃnihita vat avabhāsata  /
iti

original: ye cādityāpekṣayā stokadeśāḥ parvatāste 'pi dviyojanasthitānāṃ triyojanasthitānāṃ ca puruṣāṇāṃ tulyavadavabhāsante,
analyzed: ye ca āditya apekṣayā stoka deśāḥ parvatāḥ te dvi yojana sthitānām tri yojana sthitānām ca puruṣāṇām tulya vat avabhāsante
tasmāt eka tve pi saṃbhavati nānā deśa upalambhaḥ
tathā ekam eva mukham bhinneṣu ādarśeṣu yugapad dṛśyate

original: nanu pratibimbaṃ nāmārthāntaraṃ tatra dṛśyate / na /
analyzed: nanu pratibimbam nāma artha antaram tatra dṛśyate na
tasya abhāvāt anupalambhāt ca
na hi mūrta madhye mūrta antaram saṃbhavati

original: kiṃ ca śarāvasthamudakaṃ bhūmerupari nābhidadhne dhārayitvā tasyopariṣṭādaratridadhne svamukhaṃ kurvannudakasyādhastādaratrimātre mukhapratibimbaṃ
analyzed: kim ca śarāva stham udakam bhūmeḥ upari nābhi dadhne dhārayitvā tasya upariṣṭāt ara tri dadhne sva mukham kurvan udakasya adhastāt ara tri mātre mukha pratibimbam

original: tasmiṃśca deśe pārśvasthāḥ puruṣā na kañcidapi paśyanti tena dṛśyādarśananirastaḥ pratibimbākhyor'tho na śakyo 'bhyupagantum /
analyzed: tasmin ca deśe pārśva sthāḥ puruṣāḥ na kañcid api paśyanti tena dṛśya adarśana nirastaḥ pratibimba ākhyaḥ arthaḥ na śakyaḥ abhyupagantum

original: tasmādādarśatejasā jalena ca pratihataṃ nāyanaṃ tejaḥ parāvṛttyā gṛhṇātīti yuktam /
analyzed: tasmāt ādarśa tejasā jalena ca pratihatam na ayanam tejaḥ parāvṛttyā gṛhṇāti iti yuktam

original: tasmādanaikāntiko nānādeśopalambho na nānātvaṃ śabdasya sādhayati //*//
analyzed: tasmāt anaikāntikaḥ nānā deśa upalambhaḥ na nānātvam śabdasya sādhayati

original: nanu savituḥ sāṃnidhyādhyāsādyuktā nānādeśāvagatiḥ śabde tu katham /
analyzed: nanu savituḥ sāṃnidhya adhyāsa ādi uktā nānā deśa avagatiḥ śabde tu katham

original: sarvagatatvāt- sarvagato hi śabdo bhinnadeśairdhvanibhiḥ svesve deśe 'bhivyajyamāno bhinnadeśo 'vabhāsate,
analyzed: sarva gata tvāt sarva gataḥ hi śabdaḥ bhinna deśaiḥ dhvanibhiḥ sve sve deśe bhivyajyamānaḥ bhinna deśaḥ vabhāsate

original: dhvanayo hi śrotradeśamāgatyāpi śabdaṃ vyañjayantaḥ svotpattidesamiva śabdaṃ bhāsayantīti darśanabalādabhyupagamyate //*//
analyzed: dhvanayaḥ hi śrotra deśam āgatya api śabdam vyañjayantaḥ śabdam bhāsayanti iti darśana balāt abhyupagamyate
nanu prāpya kāri śrotram

original: na ca dhvanyutpattideśaḥ śrotreṇa prāpyata iti kathaṃ tasya śrotreṇa grahaṇam,
analyzed: na ca dhvani utpatti deśaḥ śrotreṇa prāpyate iti katham tasya śrotreṇa grahaṇam
tad agrahe ca katham tad viśiṣṭa śabda grahaḥ
ucyate na ayam śrotrataḥ tad viśiṣṭa śabda pratyayaḥ

original: kiṃ tu śrotraṃ gi svadeśasthitaṃ śabdaṃ bodhayadapi na deśaviśiṣṭaṃ bodhayati kintu svarūpamātreṇa,
analyzed: kim tu śrotram gi sva deśa sthitam śabdam bodhayat api na deśa viśiṣṭam bodhayati kintu sva rūpa mātreṇa

original: yatastu diśa āgatā dhvanayastayā viśiṣṭaṃ śabdaṃ bodayanti,
analyzed: yatas tu diśaḥ āgatāḥ dhvanayaḥ tayā viśiṣṭam śabdam bodayanti

original: sā hi dik śrotraprāptā śakyate śrotreṇa grahītum,
analyzed: sā hi diś śrotra prāptā śakyate śrotreṇa grahītum

original: yadyapi na svātantryeṇa diśaḥ śrotragrāhyatvaṃ tathāpi rāve gṛhyamāṇe tadviśeṣaṇatayā atha ca viṣayeṣu sveṣu gṛhyamāṇeṣu tadviśeṣaṇatayā sarvairapīndriyairgṛhyate  #
analyzed: yadi api na svātantryeṇa diśaḥ śrotra grāhya tvam tathā api rāve gṛhyamāṇe tad viśeṣaṇa tayā atha ca viṣayeṣu sveṣu gṛhyamāṇeṣu tad viśeṣaṇa tayā sarvaiḥ api indriyaiḥ gṛhyate  /
tadvat

original: tataścāsyāṃ diśi śabda iti viśiṣṭagrahaṇaṃ tāvatsiddham /
analyzed: tatas ca asyām diśi śabdaḥ iti viśiṣṭa grahaṇam tāvat siddham
